de-altar_of_urlain.title: Altar of Urlain
de-altar_of_urlain.def: The model gains Channel (2), Emplacement, Exclusive, Fearless, Unstable, Stubborn, its HP are set to 6 and its Cha and Mob are always set to 0". Enemy units that are Engaged in Combat and within Range 24" of the model suffer -1 Cou.

de-altar_of_nabh.title: Altar of Nabh
de-altar_of_nabh.def:
The model gains Attached, Exclusive (Height 1), Frenzy, Fury, Stubborn, WarPlatform.
Friendly units within Range 6" (Range 12" for units with Temple) of the model gain Fury.

de-altar_of_tila.title: Altar of Tila
de-altar_of_tila.def:
The model gains Attached, Exclusive (Height 1), Stubborn, WarPlatform.
When a friendly unit within Range 12" (Range 18" for units with Temple) of the model suffers one or more unsaved wounds from an enemy attack, the Altar of Tila may choose to cause 3 hits with Str 4 and AP 2 onto the enemy unit which caused the wounds. This effect can only be used once per phase.

de-altar_of_yema.title: Altar of Yema
de-altar_of_yema.def: The model gains Light Troops, Exclusive, Impact Hits (D6), Petrifying Stare, Swiftstride and its Cha is set to 6". Friendly units within Range 6" (Range 12" for units with Temple) of the model gain Strider.

de-academy_commander.title: Academy Commander
de-academy_commander.def: The model part gains Academy. Friendly models with Academy in the model's unit gain Artistry of Death.

de-beastmaster.title: Beastmaster
de-beastmaster.def: The model part gains Slaver. Friendly units with Beast gain Dying Blow while within range of the model's Commanding Presence.

de-cut_one_off_.title: Cut one off ...
de-cut_one_off_.def: For each successfull Fortitude Save roll of a natural ‘6’, the model disregards another simultaneously suffered wound. If there aren't enough simultaneously suffered wounds to disregard, the model immediately Recovers 1 HP instead.

de-meeting_of_minds.title: Meeting of Minds
de-meeting_of_minds.def: The model gains Scent of Blood and treats all friendly models with Beast as Insignificant.

de-coastal_predator.title: Coastal Predator
de-coastal_predator.def: The model gains Hard Target (1) while in contact with Water Terrain.

de-colossal_kraken.title: Colossal Kraken
de-colossal_kraken.def: The model's base size is changed to 100×150 mm, its HP is set to 8, and the model gains 2 additional Lashmasters.

de-extraordinary_specimen.title: Extraordinary Specimen
de-extraordinary_specimen.def: The Manticore gains Stomp Attacks (D3) and its base size is changed to 50×100 mm.

de-under_the_cover_of_mists.title: Under the Cover of Mists
de-under_the_cover_of_mists.def: Enemy units within 8" of one or more Mist Leviathans suffer -1 to hit with Shooting Attacks. During the first Game Turn, friendly Height 1 models gain Hard Target (1) while within 8" of one or more Mist Leviathans.

de-dancers_of_yema.title: Dancers of Yema
de-dancers_of_yema.def: The model gains Aegis (5+, against Melee Attacks), First Strike (+1 Att), Elven Finesse, Weapon Master. It also gains Shield, Hand Weapon, Great Weapon, Halberd, Spear.

de-temple_acolytes.title: Temple Acolytes
de-temple_acolytes.def: The Dread Acolyte model part gains Artistry of Death, Paired Weapons and Temple.

de-warlock_acolytes.title: Warlock Acolytes
de-warlock_acolytes.def: The unit gains Wizard Conclave (2), Irresistible Will and the Dread Acolyte model part gains Warlock. The unit selects spells from:

de-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
de-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Scent of Blood.

de-big_brother.title: Big Brother
de-big_brother.def: - Universal RuleThe model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

de-giant_club.title: Giant Club
de-giant_club.def: - Melee WeaponAttacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

de-dread_mask.title: Dread Mask
de-dread_mask.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains Devastating Charge (Distracting) and can cast Illusory Paths (Witchcraft) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8). In addition, Fear Tests caused by the model and rolls for Flee Distance of enemy units that Break from Combat while in base contact with the model are subject to Maximised Roll.

de-monstrous_whip.title: Monstrous Whip
de-monstrous_whip.def: - Universal RuleRolls for Charge Range of other friendly Gigantic models that are within 12" of one or more models with Monstrous Whip are subject to Maximised Roll.

de-daeb_warfare.title: Daeb Warfare
de-daeb_warfare.def: When a unit containing Daeb Warfare is part of a Combined Charge, it must reroll failed Charge Range rolls. When multiple units containing Daeb Warfare are engaged in the same Combined Combat, each unit is considered to have one additional Proper Rank for Steady, Steadfast, Surrounded and Rank Bonus purposes in it's first Round of Combat.

de-irresistible_will.title: Irresistible Will
de-irresistible_will.def: When casting a Learned spell with 4 or more Magic Dice, any Dispelling rolls made against the spell cast suffer a -2 modifier.

de-scent_of_blood.title: Scent of Blood
de-scent_of_blood.def: The model must reroll failed Charge Range rolls when charging units containing a Health Pool that has fewer Health Points than its starting value.

de-krakens_hide.title: Kraken's Hide
de-krakens_hide.def: The wearer gains +1 Arm and Strider (Water Terrain).

de-artistry_of_death.title: Artistry of Death
de-artistry_of_death.def: Standard Melee Attacks gain +1 to wound.

de-petrifying_stare.title: Petrifying Stare
de-petrifying_stare.def: At the model's Agility Step, each enemy unit in contact with the model suffers 2 hits. The to-wound rolls are set to 5+ and the hits always have AP 10 and Magical Attacks.

de-repeater_crossbow.title: Repeater Crossbow
de-repeater_crossbow.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Repeater CrossbowX18"230
[Attacks made at Short Range have their AP set to 1.]

de-harpoon_launcher.title: Harpoon Launcher
de-harpoon_launcher.def:
Harpoon Launcher - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Harpoon Launcher318"363Accurate, Quick to Fire, Harpoon Launcher


Harpoon Launcher
Units that suffer one or more hits from this weapon lose Swiftstride, and cannot gain it in any way until the start of the next friendly Player Turn.

de-daeb_bolt_thrower.title: Daeb Bolt Thrower
de-daeb_bolt_thrower.def:
Daeb Bolt Thrower - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Daeb Bolt Thrower324"852 - Artillery WeaponRange 24", Shots 8, Str 5, AP 2.
Note that the model can move and shoot.

de-professional_courtesy.title: Professional Courtesy
de-professional_courtesy.def: The model cannot join units that contain another model from the same unit entry.

de-ruthless_efficiency.title: Ruthless Efficiency
de-ruthless_efficiency.def: The attack gains +1 to wound during the First Round of Combat.

de-curse_of_the_phantom_queen.title: Curse of the Phantom Queen
de-curse_of_the_phantom_queen.def: Attacks made by the target suffer -1 AP, and attacks made against the target gain +1 AP. Attacks from spells are not affected.

de-transcendence.title: Transcendence
de-transcendence.def: For each HP loss the wielder inflicts with this weapon on enemy models, the wielder gains +1 Str and +1 AP, up to a maximum of +2 each, with Duration: Permanent.

de-mastery_of_slaughter.title: Mastery of Slaughter
de-mastery_of_slaughter.def: <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/artistry_of_death">Artistry of Death</nuxt-link>, Fury, Lethal Strike, Multiple Wounds (2).

de-seal_of_the_republic.title: Seal of the Republic
de-seal_of_the_republic.def: For each HP loss the wielder inflicts with this weapon on enemy models, the wearer gains +1 Arm with Duration: Permanent.

de-moithirs_mirror.title: Moithir's Mirror
de-moithirs_mirror.def:
The bearer gains Aegis (5+, against Melee Attacks). If one or more Melee Attacks are allocated towards the bearer*, the bearer gains Grind Attack (3, Str 4, AP 2, Magical Attacks) until the end of the Round of Combat. The Grind Attack is resolved with Agi 0.

*Note that attacks with Agi 0 can trigger this.

de-beastmasters_vial.title: Beastmaster's Vial
de-beastmasters_vial.def: May be activated at the start of any friendly Charge Phase. Friendly models with Beast or Slaver within 6" of the bearer must reroll failed Charge Range rolls.

de-ceinrans_scales.title: Ceinran's Scales
de-ceinrans_scales.def: The bearer can cast Whispers of the Veil (Evocation) as a Bound Spell (3+).

de-ring_of_the_obsidian_thrones.title: Ring of the Obsidian Thrones
de-ring_of_the_obsidian_thrones.def: Unless the bearer is Shaken, Break Tests and Panic Tests taken by friendly units within 6" of the bearer are Minimised.

de-banner_of_the_war_crow.title: Banner of the War Crow
de-banner_of_the_war_crow.def: While the bearer's unit is part of a Combined Combat, the unit and all other friendly units part of this Combined Combat must reroll natural to-wound rolls of '1' with their Standard Melee Attacks.

de-eye_of_the_gorgon.title: Eye of the Gorgon
de-eye_of_the_gorgon.def: The bearer's unit gains Horror. When Choosing Equipment and Abilities at the start of a Round of Combat, nominate one Rank-and-File model in the front rank of the bearer's unit. The nominated model gains Petrifying Stare.

de-caedhrens_pennon.title: Caedhren's Pennon
de-caedhrens_pennon.def: While the bearer's unit is part of a Combined Charge, the unit and all other units part of this Combined Charge gain Swiftstride.

ong-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
ong-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Born to Fight.

ong-big_brother.title: Big Brother
ong-big_brother.def: The model's HP are set to 9, its base size is changed to 75×100 mm, and its rolls for the number of hits for Stomp Attacks is Maximised.

ong-armed_to_the_teeth.title: Armed to the Teeth
ong-armed_to_the_teeth.def:
The model gains Weapon Master and its Arm is set to 2.
At the start of each Round of Combat that the model is fighting, if the model is within 12" of one or more other friendly models that are equipped with Great Weapon, Paired Weapons, and/or Shield, the model gains the corresponding equipment until the end of the Round of Combat.

ong-gnasher_dashers.title: Gnasher Dashers
ong-gnasher_dashers.def: The model gains Fly, Hard Target (1), Light Troops, Skirmisher, Extra Support (2).

ong-git_launcher.title: Git Launcher
ong-git_launcher.def: A unit hit by a Git Launcher suffers 2D6 hits with Str 4 and AP 2. However, on a natural to-hit roll of ‘6’, instead, place a Mad Git within 3" of the target, following the rules for Summoned Units.

ong-goblin_gardens.title: Goblin Gardens
ong-goblin_gardens.def: During Pre-game Selections, you may choose a Terrain Type from: Fields, Forests, Ruins, Water Terrain. All models (friend and foe) treat Terrain Features of the chosen Terrain Type as Dangerous Terrain. In addition, friendly models with Goblin gain Strider (X), where X is the chosen Terrain.

ong-spies.title: Spies
ong-spies.def: The model gains Feigned Flight, Light Troops, Vanguard.

ong-beastie_whisperer.title: Beastie Whisperer
ong-beastie_whisperer.def: Immediately before choosing a unit to join using the Hidden rule, the model may gain a Beastie mount without any upgrade for free. If the model joins a unit with at least one Rank-and-File model with Creepy-Crawlies, the model's mount gains Creepy-Crawlies.

ong-headhunter.title: Headhunter
ong-headhunter.def: The model part with Goblin gains March and Shoot, Poison Attacks, and gains Throwing Weapons (4+) with Shots 3.

ong-mauler.title: Mauler
ong-mauler.def: The model part with Goblin gains Fury, First Strike (Hatred), and gains Great Weapon.

ong-netter.title: Netter
ong-netter.def:
When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, roll a D6 for each model with Netter. Each model that rolls a 3+ gains Afflict (-1 AP, -2 Agi*).
*To a minimum of 1.

ong-creepers.title: Creepers
ong-creepers.def: The model gains Hard Target (1), Light Troops, Scout, Skirmisher, Strider.

ong-green_tide.title: Green Tide
ong-green_tide.def: Natural to-wound rolls of ‘1’ with Melee Attacks from friendly units within 8" must be rerolled.

ong-symbol_of_the_warborn_alliance.title: Symbol of the Warborn Alliance
ong-symbol_of_the_warborn_alliance.def: The model can cast Guile and Fury (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell (5+). When attempting to cast the Bound Spell, the owner can choose which version to cast.

ong-ramshackle_breaks.title: Ramshackle Breaks
ong-ramshackle_breaks.def: Before rolling the distance as part of a Random Move, the model may choose to replace its Random Movement (3D6") with Random Movement (1D6").

ong-immense_bulk.title: Immense Bulk
ong-immense_bulk.def: The model's HP are set to 8, its base size is changed to 100×150 mm, and the number of Rider model parts is set to 8.

ong-slithering_frame.title: Slithering Frame
ong-slithering_frame.def: The model gains Fortitude (5+) and Random Movement (3D6").

ong-wicked_horns.title: Wicked Horns
ong-wicked_horns.def: The model gains Frenzy, Impact Hits (D6), Unruly.

ong-surprise.title: Surprise
ong-surprise.def: The model cannot be deployed normally. Instead, at the start of any Player Turn, the owner may choose a friendly non-Fleeing unengaged unit of Goblin Rabble or Gogtuk Neophytes. Any unit can be chosen up to three times per Player Turn. Deploy the model with Surprise within 3" of the chosen unit and more than 1" away from Impassable Terrain and other units. If the model is not deployed by the end of Game Turn 4, it counts as a casualty and cannot be deployed for the rest of the game.

ong-huntsman_spider.title: Huntsman Spider
ong-huntsman_spider.def: The model gains Creepy-Crawlies, and its base size is changed to 50×50 mm.

ong-troll_toll.title: Troll Toll
ong-troll_toll.def: For each Fortitude Save the model fails against enemy Melee Attacks, the model immediately performs a Standard Melee Attack against the unit that caused the wound, before any casualties are removed, that is allocated onto the attacking model's Health Pool.

ong-cave_troll.title: Cave Troll
ong-cave_troll.def: The model's Arm is set to 3 and it gains Strider (Ruins).

ong-bridge_troll.title: Bridge Troll
ong-bridge_troll.def: The model gains Distracting (1), Strider (Water Terrain).

ong-forest_troll.title: Forest Troll
ong-forest_troll.def: The model gains Magic Resistance (3), Strider (Forest).

ong-big_wing.title: Big Wing
ong-big_wing.def: The model gains Stomp Attacks (D3) and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm.

ong-belly_flop.title: Belly Flop
ong-belly_flop.def:
- When declaring a Charge, the model may declare to perform a Belly Flop in the First Round of Combat. If so, this Special Attack must be made against the Charged unit at the model's Agility.
  • The Charged unit suffers 1 hit with Str 5, AP 2, and Area Attack (3×4).
  • The model's Defensive Skill is set to 1, it cannot perform any other Special Attacks nor Close Combat Attacks, and it becomes Shaken.
The effects last until the end of the Round of Combat.

ong-tribe_leader.title: Tribe Leader
ong-tribe_leader.def:
If the General is a Tribe Leader, apply the following changes to Army List creation:


  • Max. 10% of the Army Points may be spent on units with Goblin.

  • The -1. Death From Above Army Category Limit is decreased to 20%.

  • The Duplication Limits Max. X items/army (i.e. Max. X units/army, Max. X models/army, and ) in the unit profiles of certain units with Orc are modified, as indicated by TL Max. X.
For example, Max. 1 units/army means that if the General is a Tribe Leader, the Duplication Limit becomes Max. 2 units/army.

ong-darrmu.title: Darrmu
ong-darrmu.def:
If the General is a Darrmu, apply the following changes to Army List creation:


  • Max. 10% of the Army Points may be spent on units with Orc.

  • The -1. Death From Above Army Category Limit is increased to 30%.

  • The Duplication Limits Max. X items/army (i.e. Max. X units/army, Max. X models/army, and ) in the unit profiles of certain units with Goblin are modified, as indicated by D Max. X.
For example, Max. 1 units/army means that if the General is a Darrmu, the Duplication Limit becomes Max. 2 units/army.

ong-goblin_cunning.title: Goblin Cunning
ong-goblin_cunning.def:
Apply the following rules to any unit consisting entirely of models with Goblin Cunning:


  • Its Flee Distance rolls are Maximised.

  • Before rolling any dice for any Courage Test, that is not automatically passed, it may choose to fail it instead.

  • If it Flees voluntarily, either with a Flee! Charge Reaction or due to choosing to fail a Panic or Break Test, it automatically passes its next Rally Test. Note that this does not apply if the unit Flees involuntarily.

  • Remember that a voluntary Flee Move does not cause a Panic Test in friendly units that the Fleeing unit moves through.

ong-creepycrawlies.title: Creepy-Crawlies
ong-creepycrawlies.def: The model gains Ghost Step, and model parts with Mount gain Poison Attacks.

ong-headbashers.title: Headbashers
ong-headbashers.def:
One of a Kind.
The model gains Bodyguard (General), Lethal Strike. If the model's unit would normally count towards Core, it counts towards Special instead.

ong-unprofessional_courtesy.title: Unprofessional Courtesy
ong-unprofessional_courtesy.def: Each unit can only be chosen up to three times per Player Turn for the deployment of models with Hidden, <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/surprise">Surprise</nuxt-link>.

ong-crude_weapons.title: Crude Weapons
ong-crude_weapons.def: The model cannot benefit from Parry. After the First Round of Combat, and until the model is no longer Engaged in Combat, all its Melee Weapons count as Hand Weapon for all rules purposes.

ong-brood_rivalry.title: Brood Rivalry
ong-brood_rivalry.def: The model part gains +1 Att while another friendly unit is Engaged in Combat, anywhere on the Battlefield. Units composed entirely of Characters cannot benefit from this rule.

ong-force_of_destruction.title: Force of Destruction
ong-force_of_destruction.def:
The model cannot declare any Charges, and other units cannot Declare any Charges against the model. The model and other units ignore each other regarding the Unit Spacing rule for all movement and can touch and move through one another during any movement (excluding Ambush). The model never treats units outside its Front Arc as obstacles when performing Random Movement.

When the model touches another unit, the model is immediately removed as a casualty, and the other unit immediately suffers X hits with the model's Str and AP. If several units are touched simultaneously, the owner of the model with Force of Destruction chooses which unit suffers the hits.

If the model was removed due to another unit moving into contact with it, that unit suffers an additional D6 hits.

ong-skewerer.title: Skewerer
ong-skewerer.def: The model's base is changed to 60×60 mm.

ong-war_cry.title: War Cry!
ong-war_cry.def:
One use only. May be activated at the start of any friendly Player Turn, provided the General is on the Battlefield and not Shaken. Apply the following effects until the start of the next friendly Player Turn:

  • Friendly units gain +1" Cha and +1" Mob.

  • If the General is a Goblin Demagogue or a Goblin Witch, friendly units with Goblin, while not Engaged in Combat, gain Light Troops.

  • If the General is an Orc Warlord or an Orc Shaman, friendly units with Orc have their Charge Range rolls Maximised.

ong-omen_of_the_apocalypse.title: Omen of the Apocalypse
ong-omen_of_the_apocalypse.def: +X Att, +X Str, and +X AP. X is equal to the number of friendly units containing Orc that are Engaged in Combat anywhere on the Battlefield, up to a maximum of 3.

ong-attack_gnasher.title: Attack Gnasher
ong-attack_gnasher.def: The wielder must perform 3 additional Standard Melee Attacks, that have their Str always set to 5 and AP always set to 2.

ong-tazreks_guard.title: Tazrek's Guard
ong-tazreks_guard.def: +1 HP and Res is set to 6.

ong-troll_hide.title: Troll Hide
ong-troll_hide.def: Fortitude (4+). Mob is set to 6". The model's base is changed to 40×40 mm and its Height is set to 3. The model fails all its Armour Save rolls and cannot take Weapon Enchantments.

ong-goga_cauldron.title: Goga Cauldron
ong-goga_cauldron.def: One use only. May be activated at the start of any Player Turn. Until the end of the Player Turn, the bearer’s unit gains Fearless, Unstable.

ong-skull_fetish.title: Skull Fetish
ong-skull_fetish.def: During the Siphon the Veil of your Magic Phase, the bearer may gain Channel (D3) with Duration: One Turn. If a ‘3’ is rolled for this, the bearer loses 1 HP, and this Magic Item stops working, Duration: Permanent.

ong-monster_munch.title: Monster Munch
ong-monster_munch.def: The bearer can cast Totemic Summon (Shamanism) as a Bound Spell (7+).

ong-pan_of_protection_pinchin.title: Pan of Protection Pinchin'
ong-pan_of_protection_pinchin.def:
When successfully wounded, the bearer may choose to use the attacker's Arm and/or its Special Save:
  • Use the Arm that the attacking model would have against the attack that inflicted the wound (including Conditional Application, modifiers, etc.). If so, the bearer cannot use its own Arm (including any modifiers), if available.
  • Use the Special Save that the attacking model would have against the attack that inflicted the wound (including Conditional Application, modifiers, etc.). If so, the bearer cannot use its own Special Save (including any modifiers), if available.

ong-gnasher_bait.title: Gnasher Bait
ong-gnasher_bait.def: Friendly Gnashers units within 18" gain Frenzy, Fury, and their Charge Range rolls are Maximised.

ong-moon_shrooms.title: Moon Shrooms
ong-moon_shrooms.def: Cannot be activated at the same turn as the War Cry! The bearer's unit acts as if the General had used the War Cry! this turn.

ong-splatterer.title: Splatterer
ong-splatterer.def:
Splatterer
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Splatterer460"163Artillery, Area Attack (2×2), Multiple Wounds (2)


Git Launcher
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Git Launcher448"1--Artillery, Git Launcher


Skewerer
The model's base is changed to 60×60 mm.

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Skewerer448"1310Direct Hit (D3), Area Attack (1×5)

id-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
id-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Infernal Armour and Infernal Brand.

id-big_brother.title: Big Brother
id-big_brother.def: The model's HP are set to 9, its base size is changed to 75×100 mm, and its roll for the number of hits for Stomp Attacks is Maximised.

id-tower_shield.title: Tower Shield
id-tower_shield.def: The model gains Parry, Hard Target (1, against attacks from models located in its Front Arc).

id-infernal_lash.title: Infernal Lash
id-infernal_lash.def:
+2 Agi. Once per Melee Phase, when Choosing Equipment and Abilities in a combat within 6" of the wielder, you may activate the following ability:

Choose a single friendly unit within 6" of the wielder (which could be the wielder itself). The chosen unit gains Flaming Attacks (Melee), Magical Attacks (Melee) until the end of the Melee Phase.

id-theocratic_litigators.title: Theocratic Litigators
id-theocratic_litigators.def: The model's unit and enemy units in contact with the model's unit gain Magic Resistance (2), which is also applied to friendly spells. This Magic Resistance value cannot be increased.

id-higher_calibre.title: Higher Calibre
id-higher_calibre.def: The Range of the model's Shooting Weapon is doubled. Enemy units hit by the weapon suffer -1" Cha and -1" Mob, both to a minimum of 3" until the end of the affected model's Player Turn.

id-firing_platform.title: Firing Platform
id-firing_platform.def:
Shooting Attacks against the model's unit are all resolved against the Infernal Bastion. In addition, they may draw Line of Sight as if they were Height 5, and from any point of the Infernal Bastion's Front Facing when shooting or casting spells. If so, as long as the unit has at least one Proper Rank:
  • A maximum of 20 models can shoot from the unit. These models can shoot regardless of the rank they are positioned in.
  • Measure their range from the Infernal Bastion.

id-full_steam_ahead.title: Full Steam Ahead!
id-full_steam_ahead.def: The model always passes Restrain Pursuit Tests and cannot choose to Pursue, unless it is the first Round of Combat, in which case it always fails Restrain Pursuit Tests.

id-rock_crusher.title: Rock Crusher
id-rock_crusher.def: The Chassis's Str is set to 6 and its AP is set to 3.

id-walking_earthquake.title: Walking Earthquake
id-walking_earthquake.def: The model gains Swiftstride, Volcanic Embrace (D6+1), and its Mob is set to 7".

id-walking_volcano.title: Walking Volcano
id-walking_volcano.def: The model gains Volcanic Embrace (2).

id-riddle_of_the_lamassu.title: Riddle of the Lamassu
id-riddle_of_the_lamassu.def:
During Pre-game Selections, the opponent must choose Power or Wisdom.
  • Power: the model gains Channel (1).
  • Wisdom: Immediately choose up to two units from the opponent's Army List. The chosen units begin the game with an Incendiary Marker.

id-keys_to_the_citadel.title: Keys to the Citadel
id-keys_to_the_citadel.def: The model must buy Weapon Enchantments for two of its mundane weapons. The Point Cost of one of the Weapon Enchantments (the cheapest if applicable) is halved, rounding fractions up.

id-prophet_of_ashuruk.title: Prophet of Ashuruk
id-prophet_of_ashuruk.def:
During Pre-game Selections, regardless of its chosen Path of Magic, the model may exchange one of its spells for the Apprentice Spell of either Alchemy, Pyromancy, Occultism.
The model gains access to the options below.

id-prophet_of_lugar.title: Prophet of Lugar
id-prophet_of_lugar.def: The model gains Aegis (4+) and -3 Arm, and loses Metal Armour and Infernal Armour. The model part gains Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks. If on foot, the model gains Ghost Step, its Cha is set to 4" and its Mob is set to 6". The model gains access to the options below.

id-prophet_of_nezibkesh.title: Prophet of Nezibkesh
id-prophet_of_nezibkesh.def: The model gains Engineer (Gunnery Team, Infernal Artillery or Infernal Engine). The model gains access to the options below.

id-vassal_governor.title: Vassal Governor
id-vassal_governor.def: Friendly units containing Vassal within 12" of one or more models with Vassal Governor gain +1" Mob.

id-chained_together.title: Chained Together
id-chained_together.def: The model's unit may never voluntarily change its number of files. After performing a March Move, the unit suffers D6 hits that wound automatically, with no saves of any kind allowed.

id-unbranded.title: Unbranded
id-unbranded.def: The model cannot take any Army specific Magic Items, and cannot choose Curse of Nezibkesh (Hereditary Spell).

id-oil_kegs.title: Oil Kegs
id-oil_kegs.def: - Universal RuleThe model loses Infernal Brand and Infernal Armour and gains Light Armour, Oil Flasks, Flammable, Insignificant, and Throwing Weapons (4+) with Shots 4.

id-first_amongst_inferiors.title: First Amongst Inferiors
id-first_amongst_inferiors.def: The model is a Champion that loses First Amongst Equals and that has the same Model Rules as the other Rank-and-File models in its unit. For the purpose of receiving Commanding Presence and Rally Around the Flag from friendly models, as well as for benefiting from <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/vassal_governor">Vassal Governor</nuxt-link> from friendly models, the model counts as 6" closer to those models.

id-taurukh_ritual.title: Taurukh Ritual
id-taurukh_ritual.def:
Apply the following to the model:
  • It gains Impact Hits (1), Swiftstride, and its Height is set to 2.

  • Its Cha and Mob are both set to 7".

  • Its base size is changed to 25×50mm.

id-volcanic_embrace.title: Volcanic Embrace
id-volcanic_embrace.def:
The model part gains Grind Attack (X, Str 3[4*], AP 3[4*], Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks).
*When the Grind Attack is allocated towards a model with Metal Armour, the Str and AP are both set to 4.

id-oil_flasks.title: Oil Flasks
id-oil_flasks.def: If one or more simultaneous attacks with Oil Flasks hit, after resolving these attacks, the target unit gains one Incendiary Marker.

id-flintlock_axe.title: Flintlock Axe
id-flintlock_axe.def: Counts as Halberd when Engaged in Combat

id-blunderbuss.title: Blunderbuss
id-blunderbuss.def: Always hit on a roll equal to or greater than its Aim

id-naphtha_thrower.title: Naphtha Thrower
id-naphtha_thrower.def: The hits from an Explosion! Misfire Effect gain Flaming Attacks.

id-rocket_battery.title: Rocket Battery
id-rocket_battery.def: When rolling to hit, if two or more dice rolled a natural ‘1’, all hits are ignored and the weapon Misfires.

id-vassal_slingshot.title: Vassal Slingshot
id-vassal_slingshot.def:
Vassal Slingshot - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Vassal Slingshot448"1310Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit (D3), Oil Flasks

id-arrogance.title: Arrogance
id-arrogance.def: The model's unit automatically passes Fear Tests.

id-prophet_of_shamut.title: Prophet of Shamut
id-prophet_of_shamut.def: The model gains access to the options below.

id-ziggurat_regulars.title: Ziggurat Regulars
id-ziggurat_regulars.def: The model gains Fight in Extra Rank and Great Weapon.

id-incendiary.title: Incendiary
id-incendiary.def:
Place one Incendiary Marker for each instance of Incendiary next to the unit. A unit with one or more Incendiary Markers gains Weakness (Flaming Attacks). Remove one Incendiary Marker:
  • Immediately when the unit suffers one or more wounding hits (before saves are performed) from Ranged Attacks that are Flaming Attacks.
  • At the end of a Round of Combat in which the unit suffers one or more wounding hits (before saves are performed) from Melee Attacks that are Flaming Attacks.
A Character leaving a unit affected by Incendiary is no longer affected, unless the Character was a single model unit when it gained Incendiary. In that case, the Character keeps those Incendiary Markers.

id-furnace_breach.title: Furnace Breach
id-furnace_breach.def:
Instead of rolling on the Misfire Table as normal, apply the following Misfire Effects, ignoring any modifiers of the roll on the Misfire Table:

  • 2 or less: The model may not shoot its Artillery Weapon until the end of the game. In addition, the model's Grind Attacks become Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks.
  • 3+: The model loses 1 Health Point with no saves of any kind allowed.

id-airborne_legends.title: Airborne Legends
id-airborne_legends.def: All models with Fly share a common Max. 2 models/army restriction.

id-curse_of_nezibkesh.title: Curse of Nezibkesh
id-curse_of_nezibkesh.def: The target gains one <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/incendiary">Incendiary</nuxt-link> Marker that is not removed when the spell ends. The target suffers -1 Def and -1 Off for every <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/incendiary">Incendiary</nuxt-link> Marker on it, up to a maximum of -3.

id-onyx_core.title: Onyx Core
id-onyx_core.def: Str is always set to 6. Flaming Attacks, Multiple Wounds (D3, towards Weakness (Flaming Attacks)).

id-eye_of_the_bull.title: Eye of the Bull
id-eye_of_the_bull.def: Affects both Shooting and Standard Melee Attacks. Att is always set to 1, Str is always set to 5, and AP is always set to 10. Hits automatically (no to-hit roll required). Multiple Wounds (2, Melee).

id-kadim_binding.title: Kadim Binding
id-kadim_binding.def: Aegis (+1, against Flaming Attacks, max. 3+), Parry. The bearer's weapons lose Two-Handed if they had it.

id-blaze_of_protection.title: Blaze of Protection
id-blaze_of_protection.def: Arm is set to 6. Every enemy model in contact with the wearer's model that could allocate attacks towards it but doesn't, suffers 1 hit with Str 4, AP 0, and Flaming Attacks.

id-banner_of_the_twicebranded.title: Banner of the Twice-Branded
id-banner_of_the_twicebranded.def:
Models in the bearer's unit gain Shoot in Extra Rank. In addition, the bearer may activate the following One Use Only effect in the Charge Phase, immediately after all Charge Moves have been resolved, and if the bearer's unit was successfully Charged during this phase:

The bearer's unit may perform a Combat Reform (following the normal rules for Combat Reforms).

id-banner_of_shamut.title: Banner of Shamut
id-banner_of_shamut.def: Models in the bearer's unit gain +1 Off and +1 Combat Score.

id-their_masters_banner.title: Their Master's Banner
id-their_masters_banner.def:
Apply the following effects while the bearer's unit is within range of a friendly model's Commanding Presence:
  • Model parts with Vassal gain Fury.
  • The bearer's unit must reroll failed Charge Range rolls in the Charge Phase.

id-mask_of_ages.title: Mask of Ages
id-mask_of_ages.def: The bearer gains Aegis (5+, against Grind Attack, Impact Hits, Magical Attacks, and Stomp Attacks), Terror, Hatred.

id-golden_idol_of_shamut.title: Golden Idol of Shamut
id-golden_idol_of_shamut.def: If the bearer's model is Height 1 it gains Ghost Step, its Cha is set to 4" and its Mob is set to 6". In addition, the bearer can cast Flaming Swords (Pyromancy) as a Bound Spell (3+).

id-tablet_of_vezodinezh.title: Tablet of Vezodinezh
id-tablet_of_vezodinezh.def: When the bearer attempts to cast a Learned Spell using four or more Magic Dice, treat a single rolled ‘1’ or ‘2’ as a natural ‘3’.

id-lugars_dice.title: Lugar's Dice
id-lugars_dice.def: A single model part of the bearer's model can reroll a single failed to-hit, to-wound, or Armour Save roll per Player Turn. This cannot be used for Crush Attacks.

id-breath_of_the_brass_bull.title: Breath of the Brass Bull
id-breath_of_the_brass_bull.def: The bearer's model gains +1 HP and First Strike (Grind Attack (X, Magical Attacks, Toxic Attacks)). X is equal to the number of models in contact with the bearer's unit's Front Facing.

id-ring_of_desiccation.title: Ring of Desiccation
id-ring_of_desiccation.def: When Choosing Equipment and Abilities at the start of a Round of Combat, each enemy unit in contact with the bearer's model gains one <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/incendiary">Incendiary</nuxt-link> Marker.

dl-falling_star.title: Falling Star
dl-falling_star.def: The model's Def and Off are set to twice the model's current number of HP. The model counts as a Character for the purpose of Duels.

dl-acid_blood.title: Acid Blood
dl-acid_blood.def: Whenever this model fails a Fortitude Save against enemy Melee Attacks, it inflicts 1 hit with Toxic Attacks on the Health Pool of the attacking model, before any casualties are removed.

dl-malodorous_swarm.title: Malodorous Swarm
dl-malodorous_swarm.def: The unit is never considered to have more than one Proper Rank.

dl-razor_tentacles.title: Razor Tentacles
dl-razor_tentacles.def: The model gains +5 Att while Engaged with one or more Flank or Rear Facings of enemy units.

dl-tightening_grasp.title: Tightening Grasp
dl-tightening_grasp.def:
The model gains Grind Attack (X). When in the second rank and not in contact with any enemy model, the model can make Grind Attack across models in the first rank directly in front of it.
When the model is not in combat, X is set to 0.

After each Round of Combat, X increases by 1 (e.g., Grind Attack (1) becomes Grind Attack (2)).

dl-engine_of_damnation.title: Engine of Damnation
dl-engine_of_damnation.def: The model's base size is changed to 150×100 mm, its Height is changed to 5, and it loses WarPlatform. Its HP are set to 9 and its Cha is set to 5. The model gains Terror, Stomp Attacks (D6), Exclusive.

dl-firestarter.title: Firestarter
dl-firestarter.def: The Standard Bearer can cast the spell stated in brackets as a Bound Spell (3).

dl-know_thyself.title: Know Thyself
dl-know_thyself.def: At the begining of the Agility Step when the model's Standard Melee Attacks are made, select one model part from each enemy model in contact. Add their Attack Value Characteristics, excluding any modifiers, to the Attack Value of the Kuulima's Deceiver. At the end of each Round of Combat, the model's Attack Value is set to 1.

dl-devour.title: Devour
dl-devour.def:
For each Health Point loss the model causes with Melee Attacks towards enemy units, roll a D6 at the end of the Agility Step. For each rolled 4+, the model gains +1 Health Point.
When the model has 20 Health Points or more, all units within 9" immediately suffer 2D6 hits with Toxic Attacks, and the model is removed as a casualty.

dl-abyssal_armour.title: Abyssal Armour
dl-abyssal_armour.def: For each Magic Dice stored by this model, hits against the wearer suffer -1 AP, up to a maximum of -3. The model may store up to 3 Magic Dice instead of the usual 1.

dl-divine_right.title: Divine Right
dl-divine_right.def: The model must issue a Duel whenever possible. This cannot be prevented by issuing a Duel with another friendly model first. This duel must, if possible, be accepted. While this model is a Duellist, it gains Distracting (1), Lethal Strike.

dl-omniscience.title: Omniscience
dl-omniscience.def: When there are one or more models with Omniscience that have not marched or charged in this Player Turn, each Magic Dice rolled for Excess Magic gains a +1 modifier. Note that dice that roll a natural ‘1’ are still transferred to the opponent.

dl-strixian_spirit.title: Strixian Spirit
dl-strixian_spirit.def: The model's Height is set to 5, its HP are set to 8 and its Cha and Mob are both set to 7". It gains Fly, Light Troops, Terror, Stomp Attacks (D6), Exclusive, and replaces its Grind Attack (3) with Grind Attack (5).

dl-horde_thresher.title: Horde Thresher
dl-horde_thresher.def:
Changes to the model's profile:


  • *Base size changed to 100×100mm.

  • HP set to 6.

  • Number of Tillers and Hellsteeds is set to (3).

  • Chassis gains Impact Hits (3D3).

dl-legion_thresher.title: Legion Thresher
dl-legion_thresher.def:
Changes to the model's profile:


  • *Base size changed to 100×150mm.

  • HP set to 8.

  • Number of Tillers and Hellsteeds is set to (4).

  • Chassis gains Impact Hits (4D3).

dl-mountain_breaker.title: Mountain Breaker
dl-mountain_breaker.def:
The model's Charge Range rolls towards units containing Height 4 or 5 are Maximized.
When the model part allocates its Impact Hits towards a target with Height 4 or 5, the roll for the number of hits caused is Maximized, and the hits gain Multiple Wounds (D3, towards Height 4 and 5).

dl-morphlings.title: Morphlings
dl-morphlings.def: During Pre-game Selections, each unit of Veil Serpents must choose a <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/manifestation">Manifestation</nuxt-link> from the list below and apply the effects during the game:

dl-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
dl-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Fearless, Frenzy, and Supernal.

dl-big_brother.title: Big Brother
dl-big_brother.def: - Universal RuleThe model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

dl-greater_dominion.title: Greater Dominion
dl-greater_dominion.def: At the beginning of your Player Turn, choose a unit with Daemon within 18" of the model. The chosen unit gains Disciplined, with Duration One Turn.

dl-smother.title: Smother
dl-smother.def: Melee Attacks towards a model with the same Height as the model with Smother gain +1 to hit and +1 to wound.

dl-dark_fire.title: Dark Fire
dl-dark_fire.def: Armour Save rolls of ‘1’, ‘2’, ‘3’, and ‘4’ are always considered failed when saving wounds caused by <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/dark_fire">Dark Fire</nuxt-link>.

dl-dominionofsloth.def: In the Charge Phase, enemy units gain Minimised (Charge Range) for Charges against units with one or more models with Dominion of Sloth.

dl-dominionofwrath.def: The model's unit gains Devastating Charge (+1" Adv).

dl-rising_star.title: Rising Star
dl-rising_star.def: Each time attacks made by the model kill an enemy model in a Duel, the model gains a +1 Combat Score modifier for the rest of the game.

dl-elusive.title: Elusive
dl-elusive.def: Units consisting entirely of models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/elusive">Elusive</nuxt-link> may declare a Flee Charge Reaction despite being Fearless.

dl-aether_battery.title: Aether Battery
dl-aether_battery.def:
Aether Battery
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Aeth. Battery318"3D641Before rolling for the number of Shots, the owner may discard a Magic Dice from any friendly model to gain one instance of Maximized on the roll.

dl-manifestation.title: Manifestation
dl-manifestation.def: During Pre-game Selections, each Exalted Herald must choose two different Manifestations from the list below and apply the effects during the game. The model must select two spells out of those indicated for the chosen Manifestations, Wrath of God (Thaumaturgy), and Hellfire (Hereditary Spell). This replaces the normal rules for Spell Selection connected to being a Wizard Adept.

dl-writhing_nightmares.title: Writhing Nightmares
dl-writhing_nightmares.def: Enemy units in contact with one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/writhing_nightmares">Writhing Nightmares</nuxt-link> suffer -1 Discipline.

dl-guiding_manifestations.title: Guiding Manifestations
dl-guiding_manifestations.def:
Daemonic Manifestations that have options for Guiding Manifestations have two point costs. Use point cost and rules stated with this colour-coding and notation. Guiding versions must be noted on your Army List.
Guiding Manifestations affect both the bearer and all Rank-and-File models in the bearer's unit (as long as the bearer remains in the unit), as if the models themselves had the Daemonic Manifestation. Note that Guiding and non-Guiding Manifestations are considered to be the same Daemonic Manifestation.

dl-living_shield.title: Living Shield
dl-living_shield.def: One use only. Can be activated at the start of any phase or when Choosing Equipment and Abilitites in the Melee Phase. When activated: +2 Def. Effects last until the end of the Player Turn.

dl-unnatural_roots.title: Unnatural Roots
dl-unnatural_roots.def: A side with one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/unnatural_roots">Unnatural Roots</nuxt-link> Engaged in Combat adds +1 to its Combat Score.

dl-mark_of_the_eternal_champion.title: Mark of the Eternal Champion
dl-mark_of_the_eternal_champion.def: If taken by a Wizard, the model knows Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell) as an additional spell. If taken by a unit or model that is not a Wizard, it gains Wizard Conclave (1) with Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell) instead.

dl-mirrored_scales.title: Mirrored Scales
dl-mirrored_scales.def: Each Melee Attack allocated towards the model  for which a natural ‘1’ is rolled to hit hits the attacking model's Health Pool instead.

dl-dark_hide.title: Dark Hide
dl-dark_hide.def: Ambush (Terrain Feature touching your Deployment Zone). The roll for this Ambush is done in Game Turn 1, and it is automatically successful.

dl-hellish_larynx.title: Hellish Larynx
dl-hellish_larynx.def: The bearer gains Breath Attack (Str 3, AP 2, Magical Attacks). This Manifestation only affects the model part taking it, not its mount.

dl-visage_of_cosmic_horror.title: Visage of Cosmic Horror
dl-visage_of_cosmic_horror.def: One use only. Can be activated at the start of any phase or when Choosing Equipment and Abilities in the Melee Phase. When activated, all friendly units within 6" gain Horror. Effects last until the end of the Player Turn.

dl-greenfire_eyes.title: Greenfire Eyes
dl-greenfire_eyes.def: The model's Charge Range rolls when made towards a unit containing Light Armour or Metal Armour are Maximised.

dl-digestive_vomit.title: Digestive Vomit
dl-digestive_vomit.def: If the model has previously been on the winning side of a combat while having this <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/manifestation">Manifestation</nuxt-link>, it gains +1 Str and +1 AP.

dl-broodmother.title: Broodmother
dl-broodmother.def: For each Health Point loss the model causes with Melee Attacks towards enemy units, roll a D6 at the end of the Agility Step. For each rolled 6+, the model's Health Pool Raises 1 Health Point.

dl-divining_snout.title: Divining Snout
dl-divining_snout.def: Charge Range rolls made towards units containing at least one Enchanted Item are Maximised.

dl-segmented_shell.title: Segmented Shell
dl-segmented_shell.def: When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds (X), reduce X by 1, to a minimum of 1.

dl-hidden_knives.title: Hidden Knives
dl-hidden_knives.def: Attacks allocated towards an enemy unit's Flank or Rear Facing from the model  gain +1 Str and +1 AP.

dl-golden_helm.title: Golden Helm
dl-golden_helm.def: Courage Tests taken by the unit are subject to Minimised Roll.

dl-sorcerous_antennae.title: Sorcerous Antennae
dl-sorcerous_antennae.def: Add one additional Magic Dice to your pool during Siphon the Veil in your Magic Phase for each unit containing this <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/manifestation">Manifestation</nuxt-link>.

dl-incendiary_ichor.title: Incendiary Ichor
dl-incendiary_ichor.def: Aegis (3+, against Flaming Attacks) and Flaming Attacks. The model automatically fails any Fortitude Saves it takes.

dl-curved_tusks.title: Curved Tusks
dl-curved_tusks.def: The model's Melee Attacks gain +1 Str and +1 AP. For each Melee Attack for which a natural ‘1’ is rolled to wound, this model suffers a hit that wounds automatically, with AP 10.

dl-immortal_denizens.title: Immortal Denizens
dl-immortal_denizens.def: Casting Rolls made by a model with Daemon in this army using two or three Magic Dice gain a +1 modifier. In games involving a Daemon Legions Army, add one additional Magic Dice to the Active Player's pool during Siphon the Veil in their Magic Phase (i.e. both playes gain one additional Magic Dice in their Player Turn).

dl-spear_of_infinity.title: Spear of Infinity
dl-spear_of_infinity.def:
The target suffers 1 hit with Str 2, AP 2, Area Attack (1×5), Magical Attacks, and Direct Hit (2).
The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Str for each spell successfully cast in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

dl-energy_bolts.title: Energy Bolts
dl-energy_bolts.def:
Energy Bolts - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Energy Bolts424"150-

cl-falling_star.title: Falling Star
cl-falling_star.def:
The model's Offensive Skill and Defensive Skill are set to twice the model's current number of Health Points.
The model counts as a Character for the purpose of issuing, accepting, and refusing Duels. When the model fights a Duel during a Round of Combat, it gains Stubborn until the end of the Round of Combat.

cl-acid_blood.title: Acid Blood
cl-acid_blood.def: For each Fortitude Save the model fails against Melee Attacks, the model immediately inflicts 1 hit with Toxic Attacks against the model that caused the wound, before any casualties are removed, distributed onto the model's Health Pool.

cl-eldritch_tome.title: Eldritch Tome
cl-eldritch_tome.def:
Units with Champion only.

The unit gains Wizard Conclave that knows only Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell).

cl-abyssal_conduit.title: Abyssal Conduit
cl-abyssal_conduit.def: One model in the unit that is not a Champion or Musician becomes a Standard Bearer with Channel (1) and Daemonic Summon.

cl-infiltrators.title: Infiltrators
cl-infiltrators.def: The model gains Light Troops, Scout, and Skirmisher and loses Scoring.

cl-master_of_ritual.title: Master of Ritual
cl-master_of_ritual.def: The model gains +1 Discipline, Daemonic Summon, Scout, and Commanding Presence (18").

cl-hideout.title: Hideout
cl-hideout.def:
The Cultists army gains +6 to the roll for choosing the Deployment Zone.
Immediately after determining who deploys first (after step 1 of the Deployment Phase Sequence), the owner must place a single Ruins Terrain Feature with its centre in the friendly Deployment Zone and not in contact with any other Terrain Feature except Open Terrain.
This Terrain Feature may not be larger than 8" in length and 8" in width.

cl-dark_fire.title: Dark Fire
cl-dark_fire.def: Armour Save rolls of ‘1’, ‘2’, ‘3’, and ‘4’ are always considered failed when saving wounds caused by Dark Fire.

cl-tightening_grasp.title: Tightening Grasp
cl-tightening_grasp.def: The model gains X, and can make as Supporting Attacks, ignoring the maximum number of Supporting Attacks. When the model is not Engaged in Combat, X is set to 1.At the start of each Round of Combat other than the First Round of Combat, if the model is Engaged, X is increased by +1 (e.g. 1 becomes 2).

cl-aether_battery.title: Aether Battery
cl-aether_battery.def: Before rolling for the number of shots, the owner may choose to discard 1--3 Veil Tokens from their Veil Token pool. If so, the number of shots is increased by +3 per discarded Veil Token.

cl-energy_bolts.title: Energy Bolts
cl-energy_bolts.def: - Shooting WeaponRange 24", Shots 1, Str 5, AP 0, Reload!, Volley Fire.

cl-firestarter.title: Firestarter
cl-firestarter.def: The Standard Bearer can cast the spell stated in brackets as a Bound Spell with Power Level (5/8).

cl-spell_craving.title: Spell Craving
cl-spell_craving.def: The model can perform up to 3 Supporting Attacks. When determining Combat Score, a side with at least one model with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/spell_craving">Spell Craving</nuxt-link> Engaged in Combat adds +X to its side's Combat Score, where X is the number of non-Bound non-Attribute Spells known by enemy Wizards in units in base contact with it (note that multiple instances of the same spell count as 1 each).

cl-doomsday_colossus.title: Doomsday Colossus
cl-doomsday_colossus.def: The model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

cl-apostate_automaton.title: Apostate Automaton
cl-apostate_automaton.def: The model gains +1 Resilience, Crush Attack, and its Armour is set to 3.

cl-heretic_golem.title: Heretic Golem
cl-heretic_golem.def: The model gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

cl-wicker_man.title: Wicker Man
cl-wicker_man.def: The model gains Flammable, Flaming Attacks, and 3D3. These Grind Attacks are resolved with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 0, and Flaming Attacks.

cl-dark_conclave.title: Dark Conclave
cl-dark_conclave.def:
Spells cast by the model gain +3" range for each additional friendly Wizard within 12" of the Caster. This bonus can never increase the combined modifier beyond +9", however other sources may.
The model must select 2 spells from: Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell), Umbral Majesty (Occultism), and Smite the Unbeliever (Thaumaturgy) during Spell Selection. This overrides the normal Spell Selection rules connected to being a Wizard Adept.
When performing a Daemonic Summon with the model, divide the chosen unit's Point Cost by 300 (instead of 200), rounding fractions up, for determining the number of discarded Veil Tokens.

cl-grand_council.title: Grand Council
cl-grand_council.def:
The model's Health Points and Attack Value are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 120 mm round.
The model can also select Rain of Fire (Thaumaturgy) as one of its 2 spells.

cl-elusive.title: Elusive
cl-elusive.def: Units composed entirely of models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/elusive">Elusive</nuxt-link> may declare a Flee Charge Reaction despite being Fearless.

cl-horde_thresher.title: Horde Thresher
cl-horde_thresher.def:
Changes to the model's profile:


  • Its base size is changed to 100×100mm.

  • Its Health Points are set to 6.

  • It gains 1 additional Tiller.

  • It gains 1 additional Draft Beast.

  • It gains Colossal Stature.

  • The Chassis gains Impact Hits (3D3).

cl-legion_thresher.title: Legion Thresher
cl-legion_thresher.def:
Changes to the model's profile:


  • Its base size is changed to 100×150mm.

  • Its Health Points are set to 8.

  • It gains 2 additional Tillers.

  • It gains 2 additional Draft Beasts.

  • It gains Colossal Stature.

  • The Chassis gains Impact Hits (4D3).

cl-colossal_stature.title: Colossal Stature
cl-colossal_stature.def: The model counts as Gigantic for the purpose of determining the number of Full Ranks.

cl-mountain_breaker.title: Mountain Breaker
cl-mountain_breaker.def: In the Charge Phase, the model gains Maximised (Charge Range) for Charges against units consisting entirely of models with Towering Presence. In addition, the model's Impact Hits gain Multiple Wounds (D3, against Towering Presence).

cl-morphlings.title: Morphlings
cl-morphlings.def: During Spell Selection, each unit of Veil Serpents must choose a Manifestation from the list below and apply the effects during the game.

cl-pledged_to_darkness.title: Pledged to Darkness
cl-pledged_to_darkness.def:
Models with Pledged to Darkness gain Exclusive (Pledged to Darkness). While joined by one or more Characters, models with Pledged to Darkness gain Fearless.Certain units with Pledged to Darkness can choose one of the following 4 Species Archetypes, which give the models the changes stated below. If any unit chooses one of these Species Archetypes, all units capable of doing so must choose the same Species Archetype.

Wayward Children

  • +1" Cha

  • +2" Mob

  • +1 Agility

Fallen Heroes

  • Base : 25×25mm

  • Resilience set to 4

  • -1 Agi

The Dishonoured

  • -1" Cha

  • Mobility set to at least 9"*

  • Resilience set to 4

  • -1 Agi

Kinslayers

  • Base : 25×25mm

  • +1 Off

  • +1 Def

*The March Rate of Daemon Symbiotes and Possessed is set to at least 12" instead.

cl-sacrificial_offerings.title: Sacrificial Offerings
cl-sacrificial_offerings.def: Immediately before performing a Casting Attempt with a Wizard in a unit containing one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/sacrificial_offerings">Sacrificial Offerings</nuxt-link>, you may inflict 1 hit against that unit. This hit wounds automatically with no saves of any kind allowed. If a Health Point loss was caused against a model with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/sacrificial_offerings">Sacrificial Offerings</nuxt-link>, the Casting Attempt gains a +1 Casting Modifier. Each unit can be affected by <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/sacrificial_offerings">Sacrificial Offerings</nuxt-link> only once per Magic Phase.

cl-daemonic_summon.title: Daemonic Summon
cl-daemonic_summon.def:
At the end of step 3 of the owner's Magic Phase (Siphon the Veil), before Veil Token Limits are applied, each non-Fleeing model with Daemonic Summon may perform a single Daemonic Summon:


  • Choose a unit from the Summoned Daemons Army Category on your Army List.

  • Discard a number of Veil Tokens from your Veil Token pool corresponding to the chosen unit's Point Cost divided by 200, rounding fractions up. In the first Game Turn, if the owner has the first Player Turn, a maximum of 2 Veil Tokens may be discarded, and if the owner has the second Player Turn, a maximum of 4 Veil Tokens may be discarded. In all other Game Turns, a maximum of 6 Veil Tokens may be discarded per Player Turn.

  • The chosen unit is deployed with Special Ambush (within 12" of the model that performed the Daemonic Summon). Contrary to the general rules for Special Ambush (X), the unit does not count as having performed a March Move for the purpose of shooting.

cl-smother.title: Smother
cl-smother.def: If the attack is allocated towards a model that has the same Height as the attacker, it gains +1 to hit and +1 to wound.

cl-fury.title: Fury
cl-fury.def: If the attack hits with a natural to-hit roll of ‘6’, the attack causes one additional hit usually this means it causes two hits instead of one.

cl-talon_scythes.title: Talon Scythes
cl-talon_scythes.def: Attacks made with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/talon_scythes">Talon Scythes</nuxt-link> ignore Parry and, if allocated towards Standard or Large Infantry, gain a +1 to-hit modifier.

cl-hellish_growl.title: Hellish Growl
cl-hellish_growl.def: At the start of each Round of Combat, enemy units in base contact with one or more models with Hellish Growl must take a Discipline Test with a -1 modifier.Failed to-wound rolls from attacks made by the model against units that fail this test must be rerolled. The effect lasts until the end of the Round of Combat.

cl-veil_stalker.title: Veil Stalker
cl-veil_stalker.def:
The model follows the rules for Ambush with the following exceptions:
When the unit arrives, the owner may choose to place it within 6" of an enemy model with Channel (instead of entering the Battlefield from the Board Edge). If so, it cannot perform any Advance Moves this Movement Phase (note that this does not prevent the unit from performing a Reform).

cl-manifestation.title: Manifestation
cl-manifestation.def: During Pre-game Selections, each Exalted Herald must choose two different Manifestations from the list below and apply the effects during the game. The model must select two spells out of those indicated for the chosen Manifestations, Wrath of God (Thaumaturgy), and Hellfire (Hereditary Spell). This replaces the normal rules for Spell Selection connected to being a Wizard Adept.

cl-writhing_nightmares.title: Writhing Nightmares
cl-writhing_nightmares.def: Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/writhing_nightmares">Writhing Nightmares</nuxt-link> suffer -1 Discipline.

cl-chitinous_scales.title: Chitinous Scales
cl-chitinous_scales.def: The model gains +2 Armour, to a maximum of 3.

cl-unnatural_roots.title: Unnatural Roots
cl-unnatural_roots.def: A side with one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/unnatural_roots">Unnatural Roots</nuxt-link> Engaged in Combat when Combat Scores are calculated adds +1 to its Combat Score.

cl-mark_of_the_eternal_champion.title: Mark of the Eternal Champion
cl-mark_of_the_eternal_champion.def: If the bearer is not a Wizard, it becomes a Wizard Apprentice that does not select spells as normal but always knows Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell). If the bearer is already a Wizard, it knows Spear of Infinity in addition to its other spells and cannot select it during Spell Selection.

cl-mirrored_scales.title: Mirrored Scales
cl-mirrored_scales.def: Each Close Combat Attack allocated towards the model for which a natural ‘1’ is rolled to hit is distributed onto the attacking model's Health Pool.

cl-dark_hide.title: Dark Hide
cl-dark_hide.def: The model gains Scout with the following exception: it must be deployed fully inside the owner's Deployment Zone, and the owner must have deployed at least one unit normally.

cl-iron_husk.title: Iron Husk
cl-iron_husk.def: The model's Resilience is set to 6.

cl-venom_sacs.title: Venom Sacs
cl-venom_sacs.def: The model gains Poison Attacks. If the model's Close Combat Attacks already were Poison Attacks from another source than this Manifestation, they wound automatically on a successful natural to-hit roll of '5' or '6', unless the target has Immune (Poison Attacks).

cl-greenfire_eyes.title: Greenfire Eyes
cl-greenfire_eyes.def: Units containing one or more models with Greenfire Eyes must reroll any natural rolls of ‘1’ when rolling for Charge Range and Pursuit Distance.

cl-piercing_spike.title: Piercing Spike
cl-piercing_spike.def: Close Combat Attacks made by the model gain +1 Armour Penetration.

cl-unhinging_jaw.title: Unhinging Jaw
cl-unhinging_jaw.def: Failed to-wound rolls from Close Combat Attacks against Large or Gigantic models made by the model must be rerolled.

cl-digestive_vomit.title: Digestive Vomit
cl-digestive_vomit.def: The first time the model is on the winning side of a combat, it gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration until the end of the game.

cl-broodmother.title: Broodmother
cl-broodmother.def: For each Health Point loss the model causes with Close Combat Attacks against enemy units, roll a D6 at the end of the Initiative Step. For each rolled 6+, the model's Health Pool Raises 1 Health Point.

cl-divining_snout.title: Divining Snout
cl-divining_snout.def: The model gains Devastating Charge (+2" Adv) for Charges against units that contain at least one Special Item. The effects only apply if all models in the unit are affected by Divining Snout.

cl-smothering_coils.title: Smothering Coils
cl-smothering_coils.def: The model gains +1 to-wound with Close Combat Attacks against models with Scoring.

cl-segmented_shell.title: Segmented Shell
cl-segmented_shell.def: When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds (X), reduce X by 1, to a minimum of 1.

cl-hot_blood.title: Hot Blood
cl-hot_blood.def: The model gains Devastating Charge (+2 Agi).

cl-mesmerising_plumage.title: Mesmerising Plumage
cl-mesmerising_plumage.def: Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with this <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/manifestation">Manifestation</nuxt-link> suffer -1 Offensive Skill and -1 Defensive Skill.

cl-hidden_knives.title: Roaming Hands
cl-hidden_knives.def: While the unit is Engaged with an enemy unit's Flank or Rear Facing, the model gains +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

cl-golden_helm.title: Stiff Upper Lip
cl-golden_helm.def: Units with at least one model with this Manifestation gain Minimised (Discipline Tests).

cl-torporous_tendrils.title: Chilling Yawn
cl-torporous_tendrils.def: Enemy units in base contact with one or more models with this <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/manifestation">Manifestation</nuxt-link> suffer -2 Agility.

cl-sorcerous_antennae.title: Sorcerous Antennae
cl-sorcerous_antennae.def: At the start of Siphon the Veil in each of your Magic Phases, choose a single model part in each unit with one or more instances of this Manifestation. The chosen model part gains Channel (1) until the end of the Magic Phase.

cl-incendiary_ichor.title: Incendiary Ichor
cl-incendiary_ichor.def: The model gains Aegis (3+, against Flaming Attacks). All Melee Attacks (including Special Attacks) and Shooting Attacks made by the model with Incendiary Ichor become Flaming Attacks. The model automatically fails all Fortitude Saves.

cl-curved_tusks.title: Red Haze
cl-curved_tusks.def: The model's Close Combat Attacks gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration, but each of its Close Combat Attacks with a natural to-hit roll of ‘1’ is distributed onto the attacking model's Health Pool.

cl-the_dishonoured.title: The Dishonoured
cl-the_dishonoured.def:
• -1" Cha

  • Mobility set to at least 9"*

  • Resilience set to 4

  • -1 Agi

cl-spear_of_infinity.title: Spear of Infinity
cl-spear_of_infinity.def:
The target suffers 1 hit with Strength 2 [5], Armour Penetration 2, Area Attack (1×5), and [Multiple Wounds (2)].
The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Strength for each other non-Attribute Spell successfully cast in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).

cl-lifeforce_talisman.title: Lifeforce Talisman
cl-lifeforce_talisman.def: Whenever the bearer Miscasts, the owner may choose to inflict D3 hits on the bearer's unit. These hits wound automatically with no saves of any kind allowed. If so, the owner may choose to apply a +1 or a -1 Miscast Modifier.

cl-ledger_of_souls.title: Ledger of Souls
cl-ledger_of_souls.def: Immediately before removing a friendly model without Insignificant in a unit within 9" of the bearer's model due to enemy attacks, you gain one Veil Token for each Health Point that model had the first time it entered the Battlefield.

cl-crown_of_hubris.title: Crown of Hubris
cl-crown_of_hubris.def: At the start of any friendly Magic Phase, the bearer may choose to inflict 3 hits on its unit that wound automatically with no saves of any kind allowed. If so, the owner gains 3 additional Veil Tokens.

cl-scurrying_veil.title: Scurrying Veil
cl-scurrying_veil.def:
The bearer's March Rate is set to 20".
In addition, the bearer's model ignores friendly units when moving in the Charge and Movement Phase, but must follow the Unit Spacing rule at the end of the move.

cl-gem_of_faiths_tithe.title: Gem of Faith's Tithe
cl-gem_of_faiths_tithe.def: Whenever the bearer attempts to cast a spell, the owner may choose a friendly Champion with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/pledged_to_darkness">Pledged to Darkness</nuxt-link> within 12". If so, use the position of the Champion when drawing Line of Sight and measuring range. For Direct spells, also use the Champion's Front Arc. The owner must use all of these or none at all.

cl-fiendish_snares.title: Fiendish Snares
cl-fiendish_snares.def: Immediately after Deployment Zones are chosen, the owner nominates a Terrain Feature other than Impassable Terrain or Open Terrain with its centre in their half of the Battlefield. The chosen Terrain Feature becomes Dangerous Terrain (2).

cl-lugars_dice.title: Lugar's Dice
cl-lugars_dice.def: A single model part of the bearer's model can reroll a single failed to-hit, to-wound, or Armour Save roll per Player Turn. Crush Attacks are not affected.

cl-army_organisation.def:

cl-army_organisation.title: Army Organisation

cl-army_specific_rules.def: AegisUnit profiles in this Army Book contain an additional Characteristic, which corresponds to the units' Aegis Saves, shortened Aeg. This Characteristic is treated as if the unit has the Personal Protection Aegis (X+) written on its profile, where X is the Aeg Characteristic value. Not having an Aeg value does not prevent a unit from being the target of an Aegis modifier.
cl-army_specific_rules.title: Army Specific Rules

cl-daemonic_manifestations.def:
Cultists armies possess an additional version of Special Items called Daemonic Manifestations. They follow the rules for Special Items, with the exception that they are not One of a Kind and that models cannot be affected by more than one instance of each Manifestation, unless specifically stated otherwise.

chaosManifestations of Father Chaos

cl-hereditary_spell.def:
Spear of Infinity
4+

Instant
The target suffers 1 hit with Strength 2 [5], Armour Penetration 2, Area Attack (1×5), and [Multiple Wounds (2)].
The hits from Spear of Infinity gain +1 Strength for each other non-Attribute Spell successfully cast in this Magic Phase (including other instances of Spear of Infinity).
cl-hereditary_spell.title: Hereditary Spell

cl-army_model_rules.def:
Universal Rules



Pledged to DarknessModels with Pledged to Darkness gain Exclusive (Pledged to Darkness). While joined by one or more Characters, models with Pledged to Darkness gain Fearless.Certain units with Pledged to Darkness can choose one of the following 4 Species Archetypes, which give the models the changes stated below. If any unit chooses one of these Species Archetypes, all units capable of doing so must choose the same Species Archetype.

Wayward Children

  • +1" Cha

  • +2" Mob

  • +1 Agility

Fallen Heroes

  • Base : 25×25mm

  • Resilience set to 4

  • -1 Agi

The Dishonoured

  • -1" Cha

  • Mobility set to at least 9"*

  • Resilience set to 4

  • -1 Agi

Kinslayers

  • Base : 25×25mm

  • +1 Off

  • +1 Def

*The March Rate of Daemon Symbiotes and Possessed is set to at least 12" instead.
Sacrificial OfferingsImmediately before performing a Casting Attempt with a Wizard in a unit containing one or more models with Sacrificial Offerings, you may inflict 1 hit against that unit. This hit wounds automatically with no saves of any kind allowed. If a Health Point loss was caused against a model with Sacrificial Offerings, the Casting Attempt gains a +1 Casting Modifier. Each unit can be affected by Sacrificial Offerings only once per Magic Phase.
Daemonic SummonAt the end of step 3 of the owner's Magic Phase (Siphon the Veil), before Veil Token Limits are applied, each non-Fleeing model with Daemonic Summon may perform a single Daemonic Summon:


  • Choose a unit from the Summoned Daemons Army Category on your Army List.

  • Discard a number of Veil Tokens from your Veil Token pool corresponding to the chosen unit's Point Cost divided by 200, rounding fractions up. In the first Game Turn, if the owner has the first Player Turn, a maximum of 2 Veil Tokens may be discarded, and if the owner has the second Player Turn, a maximum of 4 Veil Tokens may be discarded. In all other Game Turns, a maximum of 6 Veil Tokens may be discarded per Player Turn.

  • The chosen unit is deployed with Special Ambush (within 12" of the model that performed the Daemonic Summon). Contrary to the general rules for Special Ambush (X), the unit does not count as having performed a March Move for the purpose of shooting.


Attack Attributes



SmotherIf the attack is allocated towards a model that has the same Height as the attacker, it gains +1 to hit and +1 to wound.
cl-army_model_rules.title: Army Model Rules

bh-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
bh-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Drunkard and Strider (Forest). At the end of a friendly Movement Phase, if the model is in contact with a Forest Terrain Feature it may lose its current weapon (if applicable) and gain Uprooted Tree.

bh-big_brother.title: Big Brother
bh-big_brother.def: The model's HP are set to 9, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm, and its rolls for the number of hits for Stomp Attacks is Maximised.

bh-uprooted_tree.title: Uprooted Tree
bh-uprooted_tree.def: Attacks made with this weapon hit automatically and have their Str always set to 5 and their AP always set to 0.

bh-sleeper.title: Sleeper
bh-sleeper.def: Starting on Game Turn 1, the owner may decide whether its arrival from Ambush succeeds or fails, without rolling dice.

bh-strength_from_flesh.title: Strength from Flesh
bh-strength_from_flesh.def: Standard Melee Attacks that Roll ‘6’ to wound gain Multiple Wounds (D3). If at least one such Attack causes HP loss, this model Recovers 1 HP at the end of the Agility Step (unless the model was removed as a casualty).

bh-aura_of_madness.title: Aura of Madness
bh-aura_of_madness.def: Enemy units within 6" of one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/aura_of_madness">Aura of Madness</nuxt-link> suffer -1 Cou.

bh-hunting_horn.title: Hunting Horn
bh-hunting_horn.def: While within 6" of one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/hunting_horn">Hunting Horn</nuxt-link>, friendly units gain +1 Cha.

bh-blood_offering.title: Blood Offering
bh-blood_offering.def: A unit that includes at least one Character with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/blood_offering">Blood Offering</nuxt-link> may reroll failed Panic Tests at the cost of inflicting one wound with no saves of any kind allowed on a Character with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/blood_offering">Blood Offering</nuxt-link> in the unit.

bh-fame.title: Fame
bh-fame.def:
- Universal RuleThe Beast Giant model part gains Harnessed and the model gains an additional model part:

Friendly units within 6" of one or more models with Fame gain a +2 Discipline modifier for Discipline Tests for Primal Instinct. The model's range of Fame is increased to:
  • 9" the first time an enemy Large Height model is removed as a casualty due to the model's attacks.
  • 12" the first time an enemy Gigantic Height model is removed as a casualty due to the model's attacks.

bh-beer_barrel.title: Beer Barrel
bh-beer_barrel.def: The model gains Looted Booze. Once per game, the weapon may be used as a Shooting Weapon with the following profile:

bh-beast_axe.title: Beast Axe
bh-beast_axe.def:
+1 Str, +1 AP, +2 Def, Agi set to 0*. This weapon cannot be enchanted with Weapon Enchantments from the list of Common Enchanted Items.
*Always strike at Agility Step 0, regardless of the wielder's Agility.

bh-pack_tactics.title: Pack Tactics
bh-pack_tactics.def: Charge Range rolls made towards an enemy unit's Flank or Rear Facing are Maximised.

bh-drunkard.title: Drunkard
bh-drunkard.def: The unit may gain one of two different sets of effects depending on whether it shows up Sober or Drunk on the Battlefield. During Pre-game Selections, the player must choose whether a Drunkard unit is Sober or Drunk. Drunk Characters cannot join units containing any Sober models and vice versa (models without Drunkard are considered neither Drunk nor Sober).

bh-sober.title: Sober
bh-sober.def: The model gains Light Troops and Vanguard. A unit that has been Sober at any point during the game is never considered Scoring.

bh-drunk.title: Drunk
bh-drunk.def: The model gains Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP) and Fearless. Drunk units cannot Ambush.

bh-looted_booze.title: Looted Booze
bh-looted_booze.def: One use only. May be activated at the start of any Player Turn. All models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/drunkard">Drunkard</nuxt-link> in the model's unit change from <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/sober">Sober</nuxt-link> to <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/drunk">Drunk</nuxt-link>.

bh-hunting_call.title: Hunting Call
bh-hunting_call.def: If the Army List includes a model with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/hunting_call">Hunting Call</nuxt-link>, the owner may reroll Ambush rolls of ‘1’ and ‘2’. If the owner has the second Player Turn, any unit containing <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/pack_tactics">Pack Tactics</nuxt-link> may choose to roll for its Ambush starting from Player Turn 1.

bh-primal_instinct.title: Primal Instinct
bh-primal_instinct.def: During Choose Equipment and Abilities, each unit containing this Attack Attribute must take a Command test. If the test is passed, all model parts with Primal Instinct in the unit gain Hatred during this Round of Combat.

bh-echoes_of_the_dark_forest.title: Echoes of the Dark Forest
bh-echoes_of_the_dark_forest.def:
The target gains Fearless.
The target may perform a 4" Magical Move.

bh-hawthorne_curse.title: Hawthorne Curse
bh-hawthorne_curse.def: Devastating Charge (+2 Str, +2 AP). The weapon can be used as a Shooting Weapon (3+) with the following profile: Range 18", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 10, Area Attack (1×5), [Multiple Wounds (D3)]. This Shooting Attack never suffers negative to-hit modifiers.

bh-twin_hungers.title: Twin Hungers
bh-twin_hungers.def: Lethal Strike. Melee Attacks that roll ‘6’ to wound and cause HP loss allow the wielder to Recover 1 HP at the end of the Agility Step (unless their model was removed as a casualty). Only 1 HP can be regained per phase this way.

bh-fatal_folly.title: Fatal Folly
bh-fatal_folly.def: For each Melee Attack against the wielder's model that rolls a natural to-hit roll of ‘1’, the wielder must perform a Standard Melee Attack at the same Agility Step (this overrides the normal restriction that Beast Axe attacks always strike at Agility Step 0). This must be allocated towards the model or Health Pool that rolled the ‘1’ to hit.

bh-aaghors_affliction.title: Aaghor's Affliction
bh-aaghors_affliction.def: +1 Res and Fortitude (4). The model automatically fails all of its Armour Saves.

bh-obscuring_fog.title: Obscuring Fog
bh-obscuring_fog.def: Afflict (-1 Agi). The bearer's unit does not benefit from +1 Agi from Charging Momentum.

bh-wild_form.title: Wild Form
bh-wild_form.def: During Choose equipment and abilities, the bearer may choose to gain either of the following:+1 Str, +1 AP, and -1 Res-1 Str, -1 AP, and +1 Res

bh-banner_of_the_wild_herd.title: Banner of the Wild Herd
bh-banner_of_the_wild_herd.def: One use only. Duration: One phase. May be activated during Choose Equipment and Abilities. Rank-and-File models in the unit with Warherd set their Str to 4 and their AP to 1.

bh-rain_augur_brew.title: Rain Augur Brew
bh-rain_augur_brew.def: Duration: One Turn. This item is automatically activated at the start of the first Game Turn (if the bearer is not on the Battlefield at this time, the item cannot be used). All Ranged Attacks have -1 to hit.

bh-pillager_icon.title: Pillager Icon
bh-pillager_icon.def: All friendly units within 12" of the bearer comprised entirely of Razortusks or single model Chariots, excluding Characters, gain Vanguard.

bh-seed_of_the_dark_forest.title: Seed of the Dark Forest
bh-seed_of_the_dark_forest.def:
During Pre-game Selections, place a Forest:

  • Touching your Deployment Zone.
  • Not in contact with any other Terrain Feature except Open Terrain.

This Forest may not be larger than 10" in length and 6" in width.

bh-inscribing_burin.title: Inscribing Burin
bh-inscribing_burin.def: While the bearer is in contact with a Forest, all friendly units in contact with any Forest on the Battlefield gain Magic Resistance (2).

bh-eye_of_dominance.title: Eye of Dominance
bh-eye_of_dominance.def: The bearer gains Distracting (2, against Beasts and Mounts).

bh-crown_of_horns.title: Crown of Horns
bh-crown_of_horns.def: The bearer's unit and all units within range of its Commanding Presence (if applicable) automatically pass Command Tests taken due to <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/primal_instinct">Primal Instinct</nuxt-link>.

bh-gnarled_hide_totem.title: Gnarled Hide Totem
bh-gnarled_hide_totem.def: The target gains +1 Arm and Distracting (1).

bh-blooded_horn_totem.title: Blooded Horn Totem
bh-blooded_horn_totem.def: The target gains +1 Att and +2 AP.

bh-clouded_eye_totem.title: Clouded Eye Totem
bh-clouded_eye_totem.def: The target gains Hard Target (1) and Magic Resistance (3).

bh-black_wing_totem.title: Black Wing Totem
bh-black_wing_totem.def: The target gains +3 Agi and +D3+1 Cha.

bh-totem_bearers.title: Totem Bearers
bh-totem_bearers.def: The unit gains a single Bound Spell chosen from the list below, which must be noted on the Army List. When casting the spell, choose one Rank-and-File model in the unit as the model casting the spell. The spell can only target the unit itself.

bh-greater_totem_bearers.title: Greater Totem Bearers
bh-greater_totem_bearers.def: Model gains all four Bound Spells from the list below, with Range 18".

bh-hurl_attack.title: Hurl Attack
bh-hurl_attack.def:
Hurl Attack - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Hurl Attack424"163Artillery, Area Attack (2×2), Multiple Wounds (2), Hatred (towards Aegis)*

eos-holy_relic.title: Holy Relic
eos-holy_relic.def: Friendly units within 8" of the model gain First Strike (Hatred). Model parts with Mount are not affected. Bound Spells from Blessings cast by the rider change their Type to: Range 8", Aura. The model can cast Fate's Judgement (Divination) as a Bound Spell (3+).

eos-aura_of_power.title: Aura of Power
eos-aura_of_power.def: Units within 8" of one or more friendly models with Aura of Power gain +2 Def and +2 Off. Model parts with Mount are not affected. The model can cast its chosen spell as a Bound Spell (5+).

eos-master_artificer.title: Master Artificer
eos-master_artificer.def: The model may give the Order Ready! Aim! Fire! to a Parent Unit, Support Unit or Reiters it has joined.

eos-imperial_rocketeer.title: Imperial Rocketeer
eos-imperial_rocketeer.def: This weapon treats all results on the Misfire Table as Malfunction (each shot can cause a Misfire).

eos-meeting_of_minds.title: Meeting of Minds
eos-meeting_of_minds.def: The model may give two <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/orders">Orders</nuxt-link> per turn instead of one.

eos-beast_hunters.title: Beast Hunters
eos-beast_hunters.def: Attacks made with a Bow gain Lethal Strike (towards Height 5), Zeal (towards Height 5).
