eos-blessed_steel.title: Blessed Steel
eos-blessed_steel.def: The model Close Combat weapons gain Multiple Wounds (D3, Melee).

eos-silver_shots.title: Silver Shots
eos-silver_shots.def: The Shooting Attacks with a Crossbow, <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/brace_of_pistols">Brace of Pistols</nuxt-link>, <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/repeater_pistol">Repeater Pistol</nuxt-link> made by the model gain Lethal Strike, Zeal, Multiple Wounds (D3).

eos-first_knight.title: First Knight
eos-first_knight.def:
While the model is joined to a unit of Knightly Orders, the unit gains the following rules:

  • Fearless.
  • If the model is the General, the Rank-and-File models also gain Parent Unit.

eos-great_tactician.title: Great Tactician
eos-great_tactician.def: The model may give two <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/orders">Orders</nuxt-link> per turn instead of one.

eos-imperial_prince.title: Imperial Prince
eos-imperial_prince.def: The model part is equipped with a Hand Weapon enchanted with The Light of Sonnstahl, and may only take up to 50 pts of Magic Items.

eos-zealot.title: Zealot
eos-zealot.def: The model gains Exclusive (Flagellants), Fearless, Dying Blow, Unstable

eos-fire_on_impact.title: Fire on Impact!
eos-fire_on_impact.def: The model part gains Devastating Charge (always Str 4, always AP 2, always Agi 10).

eos-reserves.title: Reserves
eos-reserves.def: The unit is treated as Insignificant by Parent and Support Units.

eos-irregulars.title: Irregulars
eos-irregulars.def: The model gains Hard Target (1), Skirmisher.

eos-steam_powered.title: Steam Powered
eos-steam_powered.def:
The model may choose not to move despite having Random Movement. It always passes Restrain Pursuit Tests and cannot choose to Pursue, unless it is the first Round of Combat, in which case it always fails Restrain Pursuit Tests.

The model's rolls for Random Movement are Maximised.

eos-steam_cannon.title: Steam Cannon
eos-steam_cannon.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Steam Cannon336"152Artillery, Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit (D3+1), Unwieldy (1)

eos-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
eos-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Support Unit.

eos-big_brother.title: Big Brother
eos-big_brother.def: - Universal RuleThe model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

eos-giant_club.title: Giant Club
eos-giant_club.def: - Melee WeaponAttacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

eos-giant_repeater.title: Giant Repeater
eos-giant_repeater.def: - Volley Gun. Range 24", Shots 3D6×2, Str 4, AP 4.

eos-big_fan_of_sunna.title: Big Fan of Sunna
eos-big_fan_of_sunna.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains Fury, Fearless, and Fanatical (see Flagellants unit).

eos-blessings.title: Blessings
eos-blessings.def: A unit containing Blessings gains First Strike (Hatred). Model parts with Mount are not affected. The model can cast the following three Bound Spells (3+), these spells have Type: Caster, and Duration: One Turn.ullorUllor's BlessingThe target's unit gains Aegis (5+, against Melee Attacks).sunnaSunna's BlessingThe target's unit gains Flaming Attacks. Each enemy unit in contact with one the target's unit, when the spell is cast, suffers D6 hits with Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks.volundVolund's BlessingThe target's unit gains Zeal (Melee).

eos-orders.title: Orders
eos-orders.def:
At the start of a friendly Player Turn each of your models with Orders may choose an effect below (called an Order), and a single unit to apply it to, with Duration: One Turn. The chosen unit must:


  • Be a Parent or Support Unit.

  • Be within 8" of the model with Orders. If the model is the General, the range is increased to 12".

  • The chosen target cannot already be under the effect of an Order.


On The Double!The target gains +1" Cha and +2" Mob.
Steady, Men!The target gains Disciplined, and its Courage Tests are Minimised.
Ready! Aim! Fire!The target gains Accurate.Brace For Impact!The target gains Fight in Extra Rank.

eos-long_rifle.title: Long Rifle
eos-long_rifle.def: Range 48", 1, Str 5, AP 3, Multiple Wounds (2, contre taille Standard), Unwieldy.

eos-brace_of_pistols.title: Brace of Pistols
eos-brace_of_pistols.def: Counts as Paired Weapons when Engaged in Combat

eos-repeater_pistol.title: Repeater Pistol
eos-repeater_pistol.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Repeater Pistol312"342Stand and Shoot, Quick to Fire

eos-frontiersmen.title: Frontiersmen
eos-frontiersmen.def: The model automatically passes Panic Tests caused by Terror.

eos-fanatical.title: Fanatical
eos-fanatical.def: When a model with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/fanatical">Fanatical</nuxt-link> is killed by a Melee Attack during any Initiative Step of a Round of Combat it is fighting, remove it as a casualty only at the end of Initiative Step 0.

eos-zealots.title: Zealots
eos-zealots.def: Prelates may join the unit and gain Fearless and Unbreakable while joined to the unit.

eos-parent_unit.title: Parent Unit
eos-parent_unit.def: A unit containing a model with this rule is referred as a Parent Unit. Parent Units treat Support Units as Insignificant.

eos-support_unit.title: Support Unit
eos-support_unit.def:
A unit containing a model with this rule is referred as a Support Unit. A Support Unit with at least one Proper Rank is considered to have at least half the number of Proper Ranks as the friendly Parent Unit with the most Proper Ranks within 8", rounding fractions up, for Steady, Steadfast, Surrounded, and Rank Bonus purposes.

During the opponent's Charge Phase, Support Units may perform one of the following actions:


  • The Support Unit may perform a Stand and Shoot attack (even if the unit doesn't normally have this Model Rule) against an enemy unit that has performed a Charge Move into a friendly Parent Unit within 8". Apply the normal rules for Shooting Attacks, ignoring the Parent Unit for Cover and Line of Sight purposes.

  • After enemy units finish their Charge Moves, Support Units within 8" of a successfully charged friendly Parent Unit may Counter Charge: choose one enemy unit that Charged the Parent Unit and declare a Charge with the Support Unit, applying the normal rules for Charging (such as Line of Sight, Front Arc, rolls for Charge Range, etc).

eos-liberal_magics.title: Liberal Magics
eos-liberal_magics.def: During Spell Selection, if a Wizard from the Empire of Sonnstahl either selects the Hereditary Spell or gains it by any other means, it must instead choose a single Path of Magic from the ones available to it other than its own chosen Path. The Wizard gains the Apprentice Spell from that Path.

eos-death_warrant.title: Death Warrant
eos-death_warrant.def: +X Att, +X Str, and +X AP, where X is the number of friendly Parent Units and Support Units of Height 1 (including the bearer's unit if applicable) Engaged in the same Combat as the wielder.

eos-hammer_of_witches.title: Hammer of Witches
eos-hammer_of_witches.def: Att is set to 5. Fury (towards Channel (X)).

eos-imperial_seal.title: Imperial Seal
eos-imperial_seal.def: Arm is set to 6. +1 Cou. The wearer's unit cannot voluntarily declare Flee! as a Charge Reaction.

eos-blacksteel.title: Blacksteel
eos-blacksteel.def:
Immune (Flaming Attacks, Lightning Attacks). +1 Arm.

If the wearer is on foot, it gains an additional +1 Arm.

eos-regimental_colours.title: Regimental Colours
eos-regimental_colours.def: If the bearer's unit contains a Captain, the unit is considered to be within range of any model with Orders for the purposes of choosing a target to give an Order.

eos-banner_of_unity.title: Banner of Unity
eos-banner_of_unity.def: Whenever the bearer's unit is targeted by an Order, it may immediately give that same Order (for free) to up to two Support Units within 8" of the bearer's unit.

eos-marksmans_pennant.title: Marksman's Pennant
eos-marksmans_pennant.def: The bearer's unit gains Stand and Shoot.

eos-locket_of_sunna.title: Locket of Sunna
eos-locket_of_sunna.def: In a Duel, choose one model part without neither Construct nor Mount that the bearer is fighting with. The bearer and the chosen model part must swap their corresponding Characteristic values of Att, Str, AP, and Agi, and their models swap their Res values. This is done before applying other modifiers.

eos-winter_cloak.title: Winter Cloak
eos-winter_cloak.def: The bearer gains Aegis (3+, against Flaming Attacks), Aegis (5+), Distracting (1). The bearer automatically fails all Fortitude Saves.

eos-exemplars_flame.title: Exemplar's Flame
eos-exemplars_flame.def: The bearer can cast Living Steel (Alchemy) as a Bound Spell (5+).

eos-mantle_of_ullor.title: Mantle of Ullor
eos-mantle_of_ullor.def: Enemy units within 8" of the bearer lose the Charging Momentum Agi bonus and +1 Combat Score from Charging.

eos-scroll_of_conquest.title: Scroll of Conquest
eos-scroll_of_conquest.def: Friendly units within 6" of the bearer must reroll failed Charge Range rolls.

eos-brace_for_impact.title: Brace For Impact!
eos-brace_for_impact.def: The target gains Fight in Extra Rank.

eos-on_the_double.title: On the Double!
eos-on_the_double.def: The target gains +1″ Advance Rate and +4″ March Rate.

eos-steady_men.title: Steady, Men!
eos-steady_men.def: Discipline Tests taken by the target are subject to Minimised Roll. A unit that receives this Order and passes a Rally Test doesn’t become Shaken, and the Reform that is madeafter Rallying doesn’t prevent the unit from moving and/or shooting (but it still counts as having moved for shooting purposes).

eos-holy_relic_aura.title: Holy Relic
eos-holy_relic_aura.def: Friendly units within 6″ of the bearer gain Hatred. Model parts with Harnessed are not affected.

eos-arcane_shield_aura.title: Arcane Shield
eos-arcane_shield_aura.def: Friendly units within 6″ of the model gain Distracting.

eos-foresight_aura.title: Foresight
eos-foresight_aura.def: Friendly units within 6″ of the model gain Lightning Reflexes.

he-rebirth.title: Rebirth
he-rebirth.def:
When the model loses its last Health Point, unless it is a Summoned model, the owner must roll a D6. The roll is successful on a roll of 5+ (or 3+ if the model has Warden's Bond):


  • Before removing the model as a casualty, mark the centre of its final position.

  • At the start of the next friendly Movement Phase, Summon a new Phoenix within 3" of the marked point. The Summoned model has the same upgrades as the original Phoenix. Immediately after being deployed, the model loses 4 Health Points, which cannot be prevented or Recovered in any way.


If the roll fails, the model is removed as a casualty as normal.

he-fire_phoenix.title: Fire Phoenix
he-fire_phoenix.def:
The Phoenix model part gains Flaming Attacks, Grind Attack (D6, Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks), Sweeping Attack (XD3* + 1, Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks).
* Where X is the number of Ranks, on the targeted unit.

he-frost_phoenix.title: Frost Phoenix
he-frost_phoenix.def: The model gains Supernal, Fearless, Magical Attacks, Afflict (-2 Def, -2 Off and -2 Agi).

he-wardens_bond.title: Warden's Bond
he-wardens_bond.def: The model gains +1 Courage, Disciplined, and passes its Rebirth roll on 3+ instead of 5+. The Phoenix model part gains Mount. The model gains an additional model part:

he-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
he-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Light Armour and Martial Discipline.

he-big_brother.title: Big Brother
he-big_brother.def: - Universal RuleThe model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

he-giant_club.title: Giant Club
he-giant_club.def: - Melee WeaponAttacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

he-lion_cloak_and_axe.title: Lion Cloak and Axe
he-lion_cloak_and_axe.def: - Universal RuleThe model replaces its Light Armour with Lion's Fur and gains Multiple Wounds (2, against Large and Beasts, Large and Cavalry, Gigantic).

he-master_of_spellcrafting.title: Master of Spellcrafting
he-master_of_spellcrafting.def: The Wizard's Learned Spells have their Casting Value reduced by X, to a minimum Casting Value of 6.

he-valiant.title: Valiant
he-valiant.def: A unit including Valiant automatically passes Panic Tests caused by Terror.

he-meeting_of_minds.title: Meeting of Minds
he-meeting_of_minds.def: The Dragon model part gains Channel (1).

he-dragonforged_armour.title: Dragonforged Armour
he-dragonforged_armour.def:
Cannot be taken by models with Height 5.
The wearer gains Resistance (Flaming Attacks), Aegis (6+).

he-lions_fur.title: Lion's Fur
he-lions_fur.def: If the model is on foot, it gains +1 Arm, which is improved to +2 Arm against Shooting Attacks.

he-fae_miasma.title: Fae Miasma
he-fae_miasma.def:
Can only be used with Longbows and Paired Weapons.
When a unit suffers one or more wounds from attacks with Fae Miasma (before any Saves are taken), all models in the unit suffer a -1 to-hit modifier (both for Shooting Attacks and Melee Attacks) with Duration: One Turn.

he-moonlight_arrows.title: Moonlight Arrows
he-moonlight_arrows.def:
Can only be used with Longbows without Weapon Enchantments.
The attack gains Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, and its Str is set to 4.

he-elven_bolt_thrower.title: Elven Bolt Thrower
he-elven_bolt_thrower.def:
Elven Bolt Thrower - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Elven Bolt Thrower348"1310Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit (D3)


Elven Bolt Thrower - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Elven Bolt Thrower348"642

he-honour.title: Honour
he-honour.def: The bearer's unit Charge Range rolls are Maximised. While Engaged with an enemy unit’s Front Facing, the bearer gains Devastating Charge (+2 Att).

he-master_of_canreig_tower.title: Master of Canreig Tower
he-master_of_canreig_tower.def:
The model gains Master of Spellcrafting (1), Protean Magic (3), Wizard Apprentice.

The model has these Paths of Magic available: Alchemy, Cosmology, Druidism, Evocation, Shamanism, Witchcraft.

he-queens_cavalier.title: Queen's Cavalier
he-queens_cavalier.def:
The model part gains First Strike (+1 Att, +1 Off), and the model's unit may reroll Failed Charge rolls.

If the model has Height 5, Dragons (Regal and Ancient) replace their Ancient Allies value with Ancient Allies (1) and Phoenixes replace it with Ancient Allies (2).

he-fleet_officer.title: Fleet Officer
he-fleet_officer.def:
The model gains Strider (Water), Stand and Shoot, Quick to Fire. The model part also gains Lightning Attacks (Melee).

Panic and Rally tests taken by friendly units containing Elf within 12" of this model are Minimised. This cannot be used if the model is Shaken.

he-grandmaster_of_the_sword.title: Grandmaster of the Sword
he-grandmaster_of_the_sword.def: The model gains Distracting (1), Lethal Strike, and its Melee Attacks ignore Parry, Distracting.

he-high_warden_of_the_flame.title: High Warden of the Flame
he-high_warden_of_the_flame.def: The model gains Aegis (4+), Fearless, Immune (Divine Attacks), Stubborn.

he-queens_companion.title: Queen's Companion
he-queens_companion.def:
The model's Longbow Shots are set to 3 and the model's unit gains Accurate.

Must choose one option only:
•Fae Miasma, Scout,

Exclusive (Grey Watchers): free

•Moonlight Arrows: free

he-royal_huntsman.title: Royal Huntsman
he-royal_huntsman.def: The model gains Lion's Fur, Valiant, and the model part gains Multiple Wounds (2, towards Height 4--5).

he-asfad_scholar.title: Asfad Scholar
he-asfad_scholar.def: The model gains Channel (1). The range of the Wizard's Learned Spells is increased by 6". Aura spells gain +3" Range instead, and spells with type Caster are unaffected.

he-order_of_the_fiery_heart.title: Order of the Fiery Heart
he-order_of_the_fiery_heart.def:
The model gains Flaming Attacks, Metal Armour, and the model part's Arm is set to 2.

The model replaces its available Paths of Magic with Alchemy, Pyromancy, and ignores the Missile, Damage spell types for Learned Spells when targeting units that are Engaged in Combat with the model.

he-ancient_allies.title: Ancient Allies
he-ancient_allies.def:
Units marked Ancient Allies count toward this category.The sum of the 1 per 1500 Army Points (round fractions up)
For example, at 4000 Army Points the Army List is restricted to Ancient Allies (3).
values stated in brackets of all models in the army is restricted to .

he-favour_of_meladys.title: Favour of Meladys
he-favour_of_meladys.def:
The player gains 2 Protection Tokens which are removed when the Spell ends.
When a friendly unit within 18" of the Caster suffers a wound, before any Special Saves are taken, you may discard a Protection Token and ignore the wound applying the following rules:

  • Rank-and-File models of Height 1 ignore up to 2 wounds per token, provided they are suffered simultaneously.
  • Characters, and models of Height 4 or 5, can each only ignore a single wound per Phase.
  • Wounds from attacks with Multiple Wounds are not ignored, they inflict one less wound instead.

he-nova_flare.title: Nova Flare
he-nova_flare.def:
Devastating Charge (+1 Att), Lethal Strike, Divine Attacks.

One use only. May be activated when choosing equipment and abilities in the Melee Phase. The wielder counts as Charging for the purpose of Devastating Charge.

he-sliver_of_the_blazing_dawn.title: Sliver of the Blazing Dawn
he-sliver_of_the_blazing_dawn.def: +1 Str and +2 AP. Each successful to-hit roll with this weapon causes two hits instead of one.

he-elus_heartwood.title: Elu's Heartwood
he-elus_heartwood.def: Shots 3, Str as user +1, and AP as user +1.

he-elemental_blade.title: Elemental Blade
he-elemental_blade.def: +1 Att, +1 Str. When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, choose to gain either Flaming Attacks, Lightning Attacks. The effects last until the end of the Round of Combat.

he-gleaming_robe.title: Gleaming Robe
he-gleaming_robe.def: Aegis (3+). Armour is set to 1 and can never be improved beyond this. If the wearer Miscasts and rolls Witchfire, the number of hits is halved (rounding fractions up) for the wearer and its unit.

he-protection_of_dorac.title: Protection of Dorac
he-protection_of_dorac.def: +3 Arm, +3 Def, and Attached. Arm can never be improved beyond 5.

he-star_metal_alloy.title: Star Metal Alloy
he-star_metal_alloy.def: The first time the bearer's model suffers an unsaved wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds, the number of wounds is halved, rounding fractions up.

he-navigators_banner.title: Navigator's Banner
he-navigators_banner.def: The bearer's unit gains First Strike (Aegis (5+)).

he-banner_of_becalming.title: Banner of Becalming
he-banner_of_becalming.def: In the opponent's Magic Phase, after Excess Magic has been rolled, remove one dice from the opponent's dice pool.

he-war_banner_of_rym.title: War Banner of Rymâ
he-war_banner_of_rym.def: A unit with one or more War Banners of Rymâ gains +1" Cha and Rank-and-File model parts with Elf in the bearer's unit gain Devastating Charge (+1 Str).

he-book_of_meladys.title: Book of Meladys
he-book_of_meladys.def: The first time in each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell cast with two or three dice, the bearer may reroll all Magic Dice from this Casting Roll.

he-scroll_of_the_pearl_throne.title: Scroll of the Pearl Throne
he-scroll_of_the_pearl_throne.def:
Choose a Magic Item from an enemy unit that is in contact with the bearer. This Magic Item is ignored.

If it was an Enchanted Weapon or Shield, the mundane effects of the Weapon or Shield can still be used.

he-amethyst_crystal.title: Amethyst Crystal
he-amethyst_crystal.def: Dispelling rolls made by the bearer's army gain a +1 modifier.

he-sky_reaper.title: Sky Reaper
he-sky_reaper.def:
Sky Reaper - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Sky Reaper124"453Quick to Fire

koe-hooded_men.title: Hooded Men
koe-hooded_men.def: The model gains Hard Target (1) and Skirmisher.

koe-champion_of_the_green_knight.title: Champion of the Green Knight
koe-champion_of_the_green_knight.def:
One of a Kind.

The Fey Rider gains a Bastard Sword. The model gains Stubborn and counts as a Character for the purpose of Duels.

koe-chosen_of_the_snow_childe.title: Chosen of the Snow Childe
koe-chosen_of_the_snow_childe.def:
One of a Kind.

When performing its Standard Melee Attacks, the Fey Rider gains +1 Att for each enemy model in contact with it. The Fey Rider’s Standard Melee Attacks ignore Parry.

koe-warden_of_the_hooded_man.title: Warden of the Hooded Man
koe-warden_of_the_hooded_man.def:
One of a Kind.

The model gains Terror. The Fey Rider gains a Lance and its Standard Melee Attacks gain Multiple Wounds (2, towards Height 4-5).

koe-traits_of_a_hero.title: Traits of a Hero
koe-traits_of_a_hero.def: The Folk Hero must choose 1 or 2 different Heroic Traits.

koe-the_quest.title: The Quest
koe-the_quest.def:
During Pre-game Selections, choose a unit entry from the opponent’s Army Book, which cannot be a Character mount (but can be a Character entry). Mark all units in the opponent’s Army List that are of the chosen unit entry with a Quest Marker.

Model parts with The Quest gain Lethal Strike ((towards units containing a model marked by Quest Marker)) and Zeal (towards units containing a model marked by Quest Marker).

koe-solemn_oath.title: Solemn Oath
koe-solemn_oath.def: The model gains Bodyguard (Duke, General with Sainted). Any Duke, or General with Sainted that is joined to the unit gains Attached.

koe-stalwart_defense.title: Stalwart Defense
koe-stalwart_defense.def: Enemy units in contact with a unit containing Stalwart Defense never count as Charging for the purpose of Devastating Charge.

koe-knights_forlorn.title: Knights Forlorn
koe-knights_forlorn.def: The model gains Nobility and Bastard Sword.

koe-ordo_wardens.title: Ordo Wardens
koe-ordo_wardens.def: The model gains Clergy and Great Weapon.

koe-castle_guard.title: Castle Guard
koe-castle_guard.def: The model gains Commonfolk and Spear.

koe-forest_guide.title: Forest Guide
koe-forest_guide.def: The model's unit gains Magical Attacks and Strider (Forest).

koe-sacred_relic.title: Sacred Relic
koe-sacred_relic.def:
A unit containing Sacred Relic gains Fight in Extra Rank, and when the unit is the target of an Orison while Engaged in Combat, add one Blessing Token to the your pool.
Ignore this effect if a Character with the Faith Knightly Principle is part of the model’s unit.

koe-courtier_of_the_dawn.title: Courtier of the Dawn
koe-courtier_of_the_dawn.def:
Gallantry (2)

The model gains Fly, Wizard Apprentice. It uses Shamanism as its Path of Magic, and cannot select the Hereditary Spell.

koe-courtier_of_the_dusk.title: Courtier of the Dusk
koe-courtier_of_the_dusk.def:
Gallantry (1)

The model gains Wizard Conclave (2).

The model selects its spells from the following:

koe-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
koe-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Shield, , The Blessing, and Ordeal, and its Aegis can never be improved beyond Aegis (5+).

koe-big_brother.title: Big Brother
koe-big_brother.def: - Universal RuleThe model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

koe-giant_club.title: Giant Club
koe-giant_club.def: - Melee WeaponAttacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

koe-knighted_giant.title: Knighted Giant
koe-knighted_giant.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains Devastating Charge (+3 Str, +3 AP), , Light Armour, and Courage, and loses Ordeal and Shield.

koe-knight_banneret.title: Knight Banneret
koe-knight_banneret.def: A unit containing a <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/knight_banneret">Knight Banneret</nuxt-link> adds +1 to the Combat Score of its side. It can take a single Banner Enchantment, and can only do so from the list of Army Specific Magic Items.

koe-ordo_minister.title: Ordo Minister
koe-ordo_minister.def:
At the start of each friendly Magic Phase, each unit containing Ordo Minister may choose one:

  • Raise 1 HP on a Rank-and-File Health Pool in the unit.

  • Discard 1 Blessing Token and Recover 1 HP on an Character model in the unit.

koe-prepared_position.title: Prepared Position
koe-prepared_position.def: When deploying the unit, you may place a Wall fully within 1" of the unit’s Front Facing but not in contact with any other Terrain Features. This Wall cannot be wider than 8". It follows the normal rules for Walls, with the exception that it is Covering Terrain (Height 1) instead of (Height 3).

koe-sainted.title: Sainted
koe-sainted.def: The model gains Fearless and the model part gains +1 Att. The model is always considered to be under the effect of all Orison effects (i.e. Aegis (5+), Magical Attacks, +2 Off, Cou 9). This does not prevent the model’s unit from being the target of an Orison, but the model does not benefit from this additional Orison.

koe-nobility.title: Nobility
koe-nobility.def:
The model gains Aegis (5+, against no Armour Save*).

*The Aegis can only be used against attacks against which the model cannot take or would automatically fail its Armour Saves.

koe-clergy.title: Clergy
koe-clergy.def: The model gains Aegis (5+, against Magical Attacks).

koe-commonfolk.title: Commonfolk
koe-commonfolk.def: The model gains Aegis (5+) while engaged in the same Combined Combat as other friendly units.

koe-bastard_sword.title: Bastard Sword
koe-bastard_sword.def: Counts as a Hand Weapon with the following additional rules: +1 Str, Devastating Charge (+1 AP).

koe-beloved.title: Beloved
koe-beloved.def: While the model is joined to a unit with at least one Full Rank, it gains Stand Behind.

koe-expert_bowmen.title: Expert Bowmen
koe-expert_bowmen.def: Unless making a Stand and Shoot Charge Reaction, the model gains Accurate if it did not move during this Player Turn.

koe-archery_drills.title: Archery Drills
koe-archery_drills.def: During a Player Turn in which the model has not moved, if the model's unit has at least one Full Rank, the model gains two instances of Shoot in Extra Rank.

koe-band_of_brothers.title: Band of Brothers
koe-band_of_brothers.def: Unless Charging out of the unit, Characters joined to units with one or more Knights of the Courts gain Devastating Charge (+1" Cha).

koe-bannerman.title: Bannerman
koe-bannerman.def: The model becomes the Battle Standard Bearer.

koe-quin.title: Quin
koe-quin.def:
The model is a Wizard Adept that chooses Witchcraft as its Path of Magic.
If on foot, the model gains Scout.

koe-minstrel.title: Minstrel
koe-minstrel.def: The model gains Musician and is a Wizard Apprentice that uses Divination as its Path of Magic.

koe-cleric.title: Cleric
koe-cleric.def: The model gains Clergy, Ordo Minister, Holy Vows, and loses Commonfolk.

koe-castellan.title: Castellan
koe-castellan.def: The model part gains Captain, Commanding Presence (6", Commonfolk) and Disciplined.

koe-excellence.title: Excellence
koe-excellence.def: Duels issued by the bearer must (whenever possible) be accepted. The bearer part gains Lethal Strike, and when its Standard Melee Attacks Roll a natural ‘6’ to wound, the attack gains Multiple Wounds (2).

koe-forbearance.title: Forbearance
koe-forbearance.def: When using a Shield, the model gains Distracting (1).

koe-generosity.title: Generosity
koe-generosity.def:
The model gains Attached, Exclusive (Rank-and-File).
Rank-and-File models with Nobility in the unit that the bearer is deployed in gain a Bastard Sword and Weapon Master until the end of the game.

koe-justice.title: Justice
koe-justice.def: At Agility Step 0, the model performs X additional Standard Melee Attack, where X is equal to the number of HP losses suffered in the Round of Combat by Rank-and-File models in the bearer’s unit. X can never be greater than 3.\textitNote that HP losses suffered at Agility step 0 are applicable, and that if the model is unable to perform these additional attacks, the attacks are lost.

koe-valour.title: Valour
koe-valour.def: The bearer gains Fearless and its Standard Melee Attacks gain Multiple Wounds (2, towards Res 5 or more).

koe-honour.title: Honour
koe-honour.def: The bearer's unit Charge Range rolls are Maximised. While Engaged with an enemy unit’s Front Facing, the bearer gains Devastating Charge (+2 Att).

koe-faith.title: Faith
koe-faith.def: The bearer gains Holy Vows and Fearless. If the bearer’s unit is the target of an Orison while Engaged in Combat, add one Blessing Token to your pool.

koe-the_blessing.title: The Blessing
koe-the_blessing.def: Unit profiles in this Army Book contain an additional Characteristic: Aegis (Aeg). This gives the unit rule Aegis (X+), where X is the Aeg value. Lack of an Aeg value doesn't prevent a unit from being affected by Aegis modifiers.

koe-orisons.title: Orisons
koe-orisons.def:
During Pre-game Selections, a Kingdom of Equitaine army creates a pool with Blessing Tokens, one Blessing Token for each unit in your Army List with Holy Vow. There can never be more than 6 tokens in the pool.
In each Magic Phase, immediately after Siphon the Veil, Blessing Tokens can be used, by discarding a token and choosing a friendly unit and one of the following effects to apply to the unit. All effects have Duration : One Turn.

  • Orison of Shielding: Aegis (5+).

  • Orison of Striking: Magical Attacks and +2 Off. Model parts with Mount are not affected.

  • Orison of Discipline: Courage is set to 9.

No unit or models can be affected by more than one of above effects simultaneously, unless specifically stated otherwise. Only apply the effects of the most recently used one.

koe-lance_formation.title: Lance Formation
koe-lance_formation.def: A unit with Lance Formation needs only to be 3 models wide to form Proper Ranks, but is never be considered to have more than two Proper Ranks for Steady, Steadfast, Surrounded, and Rank Bonus purposes. Models with Lance Formation gains two instances of Fight in Extra Rank when in a unit that is only 3 models wide.

koe-breath_of_the_lady.title: Breath of the Lady
koe-breath_of_the_lady.def: Add 2 Blessing Tokens to your Blessing Token pool.

koe-divine_judgement.title: Divine Judgement
koe-divine_judgement.def: After the wielder successfully completes a Charge, apply the following until the wielder is no longer Engaged in Combat: +2 Str and +2 AP.

koe-tristans_resolve.title: Tristan's Resolve
koe-tristans_resolve.def: +1 Att and +1 AP. After a successful to-hit roll, the attacker may discard one of the hits with this weapon and choose an Enchanted Weapon carried by the model the attack was allocated towards. This Weapon Enchantment is ignored for the rest of the game.

koe-uthers_mettle.title: Uther's Mettle
koe-uthers_mettle.def: +X Att, where X is equal to the number of ranks of a single enemy unit on contact with the wielder up to a maximum of 4. If multiple units, use the unit with the most ranks. These extra Attacks can only be allocated towards Rank-and-File models. If the attacks cannot be allocated towards Rank-and-File models, such as when the wielder is in a Duel, the attacks are lost.

koe-fortress_of_faith.title: Fortress of Faith
koe-fortress_of_faith.def: Immune (Lethal Strike) while the bearer's unit contains at least one Rank-and-File model.

koe-banner_of_roland.title: Banner of Roland
koe-banner_of_roland.def: The bearer’s unit gains Devastating Charge (Aegis (5+)). In addition, enemy units with Stand and Shoot cannot use this rule against the bearer’s unit.

koe-lords_arms.title: Lord's Arms
koe-lords_arms.def: The restriction on the maximum number of Proper Ranks (for Steady, Steadfast, Surrounded, and Rank Bonus purposes) from Lance Formation is increased to three for the bearer's unit.

koe-castellans_crest.title: Castellan's Crest
koe-castellans_crest.def: One use only. May be activated immediately before declaring a Charge with the bearer or the bearer’s unit in the Charge Phase. Failed Charge Range rolls of the bearer or the bearer’s unit must be rerolled until the end of the phase. Other Characters Charging out of the bearer’s unit are not affected.

koe-relic_shroud.title: Relic Shroud
koe-relic_shroud.def: The bearer can cast Breath of the Lady (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell (5+).

koe-sacred_chalice.title: Sacred Chalice
koe-sacred_chalice.def: The bearer gains Magic Resistance (1). When the bearer’s unit is the target of an enemy Spell the bearer gains Channel (1) until the end of following Magic Phase.

koe-black_knights_tonic.title: Black Knight's Tonic
koe-black_knights_tonic.def: The first time the bearer’s model suffers an unsaved wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds (X), the model gains Immune (Multiple Wounds) until the end of the phase.

koe-scorpion.title: Scorpion
koe-scorpion.def:
Scorpion
- Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Scorpion448"1310Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit (D3)


Trebuchet
- Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Trebuchet472"163Artillery, Area Attack (2×2), Multiple Wounds (2)

ok-freezing_aura.title: Freezing Aura
ok-freezing_aura.def: The model can cast Clouded Sight (Witchcraft) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (7). Enemy units within 12" of one or more Frost Mammoths suffer -3 Agi, to a minimum of 1. While in contact with one or more Frost Mammoths, enemy units that Break from Combat suffer Minimised roll on Flee Moves.

ok-animal_master.title: Animal Master
ok-animal_master.def: The model gains Commanding Presence (12", Sabretooth Tigers).

ok-wildheart.title: Wildheart
ok-wildheart.def:
Core limit is reduced to Min. 20% and Mammoth Hunter becomes Max. 4 units/army.
The Armylist may not include any Great Khans, Khans, Bruisers, Bombardiers, Mercenary Veterans, Mercenary Gunners or Thunder Cannons.

ok-leader_of_the_pack.title: Leader of the Pack
ok-leader_of_the_pack.def:
The Mammoth Hunter's base size is changed to 50×50 mm.

The model replaces Exclusive (Yetis) with Exclusive (Sabretooth Tigers). While joined to a unit of Sabretooth Tigers, the unit gains Vanguard, loses Unruly, and the Mammoth Hunter counts as being Height 1 for the purposes of allocating enemy Ranged Attacks to its unit.

ok-its_a_trap.title: It's a Trap!
ok-its_a_trap.def:
When an enemy unit performs any of the following actions, it suffers 2D6 hits with Str 5 and AP 1:

  •
  •

Resolve the hits at the end of the move or action that triggered them. No unit can be affected by It's a Trap! more than once in each Player Turn (including from different units containing It's a Trap!).

ok-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
ok-giant_see_giant_do.def:
The model gains Sons of the Avalanche and counts as a Character for the purpose of Sons of the Avalanche.
The model is a Musician. The range of the model's March to the Beat, and to enemy units that are required to take a March Test due to the Slave Giant, are both extended to 18".

ok-big_brother.title: Big Brother
ok-big_brother.def: The model's HP are set to 9, its base size is changed to 75×100 mm, and gains maximised roll on Stomp Attacks.

ok-rage.title: Rage
ok-rage.def: - Attack Attribute -- Close CombatWhenever the model loses a Health Point, it gains +1 Attack Value. Whenever it Recovers or Raises a Health Point, it suffers -1 Attack Value.

ok-troll_stew_cauldron.title: Troll Stew Cauldron
ok-troll_stew_cauldron.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains Breath Attack (Str 3, AP 1) and Fortitude (5+). If the model has used this Breath Attack, it regains Breath Attack (Str 3, AP 1) at the end of a Melee Phase during which the bearer caused at least four Health Point losses against enemy units with Close Combat Attacks and Stomp Attacks.

ok-mountain_hide.title: Mountain Hide
ok-mountain_hide.def: Attacks with Multiple Wounds (X) against the model halve their X value, rounding fractions up.

ok-touch_of_frost.title: Touch of Frost
ok-touch_of_frost.def: Enemy units suffer -1 Agi, to a minimum of 1, for each unit containing this rule it is in contact with.

ok-iron_fist.title: Iron Fist
ok-iron_fist.def:
This weapon cannot be enchanted with Weapon Enchantments from the List of Common or Shared Magic Items.
+1 Arm, +1 Att, and Parry.

ok-brace_of_ogre_pistols.title: Brace of Ogre Pistols
ok-brace_of_ogre_pistols.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Brace of Ogre PistolsX24"242Stand and Shoot, Quick to Fire
. Counts as Paired Weapons when Engaged in Combat

ok-hunting_spear.title: Hunting Spear
ok-hunting_spear.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Hunting SpearX12"1user +1user +1Quick to Fire, March and Shoot, Multiple Wounds (D3, towards Height 5)

ok-thunder_cannon.title: Thunder Cannon
ok-thunder_cannon.def:
Thunder Cannon - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Thunder Cannon436"152Artillery, Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit (D3+1)

ok-scratapult.title: Scratapult
ok-scratapult.def:
Scratapult - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Scratapult436"141Artillery, Area Attack (3×3), Lethal Strike

ok-living_avalanche.title: Living Avalanche
ok-living_avalanche.def: The model's Impact Hits gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

ok-back_to_work.title: Back to Work!
ok-back_to_work.def: The model's unit may reroll failed Discipline Tests unless Fleeing.

ok-hand_cannon.title: Hand Cannon
ok-hand_cannon.def:
Hand Cannon - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Hand Cannon430"253

ok-hoardmaster.title: Hoardmaster
ok-hoardmaster.def: +1 Arm and Weapon Master. The bearer is considered as being equipped with Hand Weapon, Great Weapon, Halberd, Paired Weapons, Iron Fist. The bearer cannot take Weapon Enchantments.

ok-headhunter.title: Headhunter
ok-headhunter.def: Roll a D6 at the end of any Melee Phase in which the bearer did not Break from combat and caused one or more HP losses on enemy models. On a roll of 3+, the bearer's model recovers 1 HP.

ok-godspeaker.title: Godspeaker
ok-godspeaker.def: Attached. The bearer and its unit gain Fearless, Unstable.

ok-firebrand.title: Firebrand
ok-firebrand.def: Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks), Flaming Attacks, Resistance (Flaming Attacks). The bearer can cast Fireball (Pyromancy) as a Bound Spell (3+) and automatically fails all Fortitude Saves.

ok-spinesplitter.title: Spinesplitter
ok-spinesplitter.def: The bearer's model part gains Devastating Charge (+1 Att, +1 Str, +1 AP).

ok-rottenjaw.title: Rottenjaw
ok-rottenjaw.def: Poison Attacks, Immune (Poison Attacks). Friendly Kin-Eater units may reroll failed Ambush rolls while the bearer is on the Battlefield.

ok-scraplord.title: Scraplord
ok-scraplord.def: Commanding Presence (12", Scrapling). As long as the model is joined to a unit of Scraplings, the model counts as being Height 1 for the purposes of allocating Ranged Attacks.

ok-children_of_umi.title: Children of Umi
ok-children_of_umi.def: All Melee Attacks against the target suffer -1 to wound.

ok-vipers_curse.title: Viper's Curse
ok-vipers_curse.def:
Poison Attacks (Melee & Shooting).
Shots set to 4, Str 4, AP 2 and always hits on 4+. It cannot benefit from Area Attack, Direct Hit if it has it.

ok-heartripper.title: Heart-Ripper
ok-heartripper.def: +1 AP, Lethal Strike and always hits at least on 3+.

ok-ritual_bloodletter.title: Ritual Bloodletter
ok-ritual_bloodletter.def: +1 Att. While the wielder's unit is Engaged in Combat, the wielder must reroll rolls of '1' for its casting attempts.

ok-wrestlers_belt.title: Wrestler's Belt
ok-wrestlers_belt.def: +1 Arm, +1 Str and Devastating Charge (+1 Arm).

ok-mammothhide_cloak.title: Mammoth-Hide Cloak
ok-mammothhide_cloak.def: +1 Arm. Attacks against the wearer can never have Str above 5.

ok-aurochs_resilience.title: Aurochs Resilience
ok-aurochs_resilience.def: Mountain Hide and +1 Res. The model automatically fails all Special Saves.

ok-banner_of_the_gyengget.title: Banner of the Gyengget
ok-banner_of_the_gyengget.def: The bearer's unit gains First Strike (re-roll natural to-hit and to-wound rolls of 1).

ok-pennant_of_the_great_grass_sky.title: Pennant of the Great Grass Sky
ok-pennant_of_the_great_grass_sky.def: One use only. May be activated when Declaring a Charge. The bearer's unit gains Swiftstride with Duration One Turn.

ok-rampagers_chain.title: Rampager's Chain
ok-rampagers_chain.def: The bearer gains Stomp Attacks (D3+1), and all models in the bearer's unit must reroll failed to-wound rolls with Stomp Attacks.

sa-rex.title: Rex
sa-rex.def: The model's base size is changed to 100×150 mm and its HP are set to 8.

sa-closely_guarded.title: Closely Guarded
sa-closely_guarded.def: The model gains Attached, Exclusive (Caiman Elders, Tegu Guards, Tegu Warriors), Stand Behind, Strider. The model can never issue nor accept Duels.

sa-mentor.title: Mentor
sa-mentor.def: No more than two models with Mentor can ever be joined to the same unit.

sa-combat_artist.title: Combat Artist
sa-combat_artist.def: The model gains <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/tooth_and_claw">Tooth and Claw</nuxt-link>, Attached, Exclusive (Skink Warriors, Caiman Warriors). Its base size is changed to 40×40mm.

sa-combat_master.title: Combat Master
sa-combat_master.def: The model gains <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/tooth_and_claw">Tooth and Claw</nuxt-link>, Halberd, Great Weapon, as well as Attached, Exclusive (Tegu Warriors), Weapon Master.

sa-combat_legend.title: Combat Legend
sa-combat_legend.def:
The model gains Tooth and Claw, Halberd, Great Weapon, as well as Exclusive (Caiman Elders), Weapon Master.
While using a Melee Weapon without a Weapon Enchantment, add the following rules:


  • Great Weapon: +2 Att, +1 to wound with attacks made by the weapon.

  • Halberd: +2 Att, Distracting (1).

  • Tooth and Claw: +3 Att.

sa-hunt_leader.title: Hunt Leader
sa-hunt_leader.def: The model becomes an Attachable Model and gains Exclusive (Raptor Pack, Raptor Riders). Model Parts with Magnasaur in the model's unit gain Fury. No more than a single model with Hunt Leader can ever be joined to the same unit.

sa-corrosive_spitter.title: Corrosive Spitter
sa-corrosive_spitter.def:
One use only. Choose one of the effects below to apply for until the end of the Player Turn. All models in the unit must choose and activate the same effect simultaneously.


  • May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities. The model gains Grind Attack (1, Str 2, AP 3). When in the second rank and not in contact with any enemy model, the model can make Grind Attack across models in the first rank directly in front of it.

  • May be activated in the Shooting Phase. The model gains the following Shooting Weapon:



NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Corrosive Spit16"223Accurate, March and Shoot

sa-master_strategist.title: Master Strategist
sa-master_strategist.def: While joined to a unit consisting entirely of Height 1 Skinks, the unit gains Feigned Flight, Vanguard.

sa-guardian_patu.title: Guardian Patu
sa-guardian_patu.def:
Counts has a Hand Weapon with the following additionnal rules: +1 Str, +1 AP, and Agi set to 0*.
* Always strike at Agility Step 0, regardless of the wielder's Agility.

sa-cantrips.title: Cantrips
sa-cantrips.def:
During Step 4 of your Magic Phase (when Casting and Dispelling Spells), a unit containing Cantrips may discard a Magic Dice to gain the rules listed below. Which rules are used depends on X (Preservation, Projection or both). The effects have Duration: One Turn, and affect all models with Cantrips in the unit.

  • Preservation: Fortitude (5+).

  • Projection: Chi Strike -- Shooting Weapon:



NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Chi Strike118"120

sa-great_protector.title: Great Protector
sa-great_protector.def: The model becomes an Attachable Model and gains Exclusive (Tegu Warriors). It loses Stubborn. All Rank-and-File models in the model's unit gain Parry. No more than a single model with Great Protector can ever be joined to the same unit.

sa-walking_mountain.title: Walking Mountain
sa-walking_mountain.def: Enemy units do not gain any Combat Score bonus for Fighting in Flanks or Rear of this model, and the model never suffers from being Surrounded. The model cannot benefit from Cover.

sa-path_of_destruction.title: Path of Destruction
sa-path_of_destruction.def: - Attack AttributeThis model can allocate Stomp Attacks onto models of Height 4 or less (rather than 1 or less). If the model's Stomp Attacks is allocated onto a unit with Height 3--4, the number of hits is halved, rounding fractions up.

sa-spearback.title: Spearback
sa-spearback.def:
The model gains First Strike (Hatred) and the following Shooting Weapon:

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Shoot Spikes312"452Stand and Shoot, Quick to Fire

sa-salamander.title: Salamander
sa-salamander.def: The model gains Resistance (Flaming Attacks), Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks).

sa-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
sa-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains +1 Armour and Cold Blooded.

sa-big_brother.title: Big Brother
sa-big_brother.def: - Universal RuleThe model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

sa-giant_club.title: Giant Club
sa-giant_club.def: - Melee WeaponAttacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

sa-pet_salamander.title: Pet Salamander
sa-pet_salamander.def: - Flamethrower. Range 18", Shots 1, Str 3 {4}, AP 1 {2}, Flaming Attacks, {Multiple Wounds (D3)}. Whenever a Misfire is rolled, instead of rolling on the Misfire Table, the model suffers D3 hits that wound automatically with no saves of any kind allowed.

sa-skink_companion.title: Skink Companion
sa-skink_companion.def: - Universal RuleThe Saurian Giant model part gains Poison Attacks. The model gains the following additional model parts:

sa-chameleon.title: Chameleon
sa-chameleon.def: The model gains Ambush (Board Edge), Hard Target (1), Scout.

sa-communal_bond.title: Communal Bond
sa-communal_bond.def:
Courage Tests taken by the model's unit are Minimised, and may use the Courage from other units within 8", following the rules below:


  • Choose a single model in the unit to take the test for the whole unit as usual.

  • Determine the model with the highest Courage value in any other friendly non-Shaken unit within 8" of the unit.

  • Set the Courage value of the model chosen in step 1 to the value determined in step 2.

sa-pack_hunter.title: Pack Hunter
sa-pack_hunter.def:
Units with Pack Hunter must reroll failed Charge Range rolls if any of the two conditions apply:


  • Their Charge is part of a Combined Charge.

  • Their Charge is directed towards a unit that is already engaged in combat.

sa-enclave_wizard.title: Enclave Wizard
sa-enclave_wizard.def:
The model is a Wizard Apprentice with access to Druidism, Shamanism, Evocation. It can select its spells from both Apprentice Spells and Adept Spells from its chosen path. This replaces the normal rules for Spell Selection connected to being a Wizard Apprentice.


Evocation=evocation, Druidism=druidism, Shamanism=shamanism

sa-lodestone.title: Lodestone
sa-lodestone.def: When allocated towards a Health Pool with Metal Armour, the attack gains +1 to hit.

sa-tooth_and_claw.title: Tooth and Claw
sa-tooth_and_claw.def: +1 Att, +1 to hit. Two-Handed. This weapon cannot be enchanted with Weapon Enchantments.

sa-poisoned_javelin.title: Poisoned Javelin
sa-poisoned_javelin.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Poisoned JavelinX12"1UserUserStand and Shoot, Poison Attacks, Quick to Fire

sa-magnetic_short_bow.title: Magnetic Short Bow
sa-magnetic_short_bow.def: Bow, AP is set to 1, Range is set to 18", Lodestone.

sa-farseeing_mastery.title: Farseeing Mastery
sa-farseeing_mastery.def: Learned Spells cast by the model gain +6" Range. Aura Spells gain +3" Range instead.

sa-forbidden_mastery.title: Forbidden Mastery
sa-forbidden_mastery.def: The model knows two additional Apprentice or Adept Spells that it must select from Pyromancy, Occultism. Casting Rolls for these spells suffer a -1 modifier.

sa-eternal_mastery.title: Eternal Mastery
sa-eternal_mastery.def: The model's Casting Rolls for Learned Spells gains a +1 modifier.

sa-invasive_mastery.title: Invasive Mastery
sa-invasive_mastery.def: Once per friendly Magic Phase, the model may choose a spell that was successfully cast by an enemy Wizard during the previous Magic Phase. Bound Spells and Hereditary Spells cannot be chosen. The model knows the chosen spell until the end of the phase.

sa-mystifying_mastery.title: Mystifying Mastery
sa-mystifying_mastery.def: The first failed Dispelling Roll during each enemy Magic Phase must be rerolled.

sa-apex_predator.title: Apex Predator
sa-apex_predator.def: The model gains Devastating Charge (+2" Adv) for Charges against units consisting entirely of models with Towering Presence.

sa-feeding_frenzy.title: Feeding Frenzy
sa-feeding_frenzy.def: While Engaged with one or more enemy units marked with , the model part gains +2 Attack Value and must reroll failed to-hit rolls with Close Combat Attacks. In addition, the model cannot benefit from Communal Bond when taking Frenzy Tests.

sa-marking_bolas.title: Marking Bolas
sa-marking_bolas.def: Range 12", Shots 1, Str 4, AP 1, , Quick to Fire.

sa-shoot_spikes.title: Shoot Spikes
sa-shoot_spikes.def: Range 12", Shots 4, Str 5, AP 2, Quick to Fire.

sa-span_classtextbfwalking_mountainspan.title: Walking Mountain
sa-span_classtextbfwalking_mountainspan.def: Enemy units do not gain any Combat Score bonus for Fighting in Flanks or Rear of this model, and the model never suffers from being Surrounded. The model cannot benefit from Cover.

sa-span_classtextbfpath_of_destructionsp.title: Path of Destruction
sa-span_classtextbfpath_of_destructionsp.def: This model can allocate Stomp Attacks onto models of Height 4 or less (rather than 1 or less). If the model's Stomp Attacks is allocated onto a unit with Height 3--4, the number of hits is halved, rounding fractions up.

sa-venomous_fortress.title: Venomous Fortress
sa-venomous_fortress.def: The model’s base size is changed to 60×100 mm and it gains 6 additional Skink Riders. If applicable, Exclusive (Tegu Warriors, Tegu Guard) is replaced with Exclusive (Skink Warriors, Skink Hunters). Model parts with Skink and without Mount in the bearer’s unit gain First Strike (Hatred), Poison Attacks.

sa-monolith_of_vitalism.title: Monolith of Vitalism
sa-monolith_of_vitalism.def: The model becomes the Battle Standard Bearer.

sa-suncatcher_crystal.title: Suncatcher Crystal
sa-suncatcher_crystal.def:
The model gains an additional model part:

&&&& &&
Suncatcher Crystal&2&3&6&3&2&Flaming Attacks, Construct

sa-lodestone_shield.title: Lodestone Shield
sa-lodestone_shield.def: Friendly units within 8" of the model gain Aegis (5+, against Ranged Attacks).

sa-magnetic_great_bow.title: Magnetic Great Bow
sa-magnetic_great_bow.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Magnetic Great Bow418"363Lodestone, Accurate, March and Shoot, Quick to Fire

sa-carved_wisdom.title: Carved Wisdom
sa-carved_wisdom.def:
Select one of the following spells as a Bound Spell, and note which on the Army List.
Fate's JudgementDivination as Bound Spell (3+),
Molten CopperAlchemy as Bound Spell (3+),
Swarm of InsectsShamanism as Bound Spell (5+),
Touch of the ReaperEvocation as Bound Spell (3+),

sa-astral_union.title: Astral Union
sa-astral_union.def: The target must reroll natural ‘1’s to hit (for both Melee and Shooting Attacks), as long as there is another friendly unit within 6" of it (when performing the attack).

sa-glory_of_the_dawn_age.title: Glory of the Dawn Age
sa-glory_of_the_dawn_age.def: +1 Str and Lethal Strike. Natural to-wound rolls of ‘6’ gain Multiple Wounds (2).

sa-serpents_nest_charm.title: Serpent's Nest Charm
sa-serpents_nest_charm.def: Att is set to 6. Poison Attacks.

sa-alchemical_arrows.title: Alchemical Arrows
sa-alchemical_arrows.def: Number of Shots is set to 4, and Str is set to 4. If the weapon inflicts one or more hits, all Shooting Attacks with Magnetic Short Bows that are simultaneously made by the bearer's unit have their Str set to 4.

sa-imbued_jade.title: Imbued Jade
sa-imbued_jade.def: Channel (+1), Cantrips (Preservation & Projection). This means that both rules for Cantrips are activated when a Magic Dice is discarded. See Tegu Mystics for rules.

sa-starfall_lodestone.title: Starfall Lodestone
sa-starfall_lodestone.def: The bearer's model gains Immune (Flaming Attacks), Hard Target (1).

sa-koru_stone.title: Koru Stone
sa-koru_stone.def: The bearer's unit gains Rally Around the Flag.

sa-obelisk_of_collaboration.title: Obelisk of Collaboration
sa-obelisk_of_collaboration.def: The bearer's unit gains Pack Hunter.

sa-te_aupouri_smokestone.title: Te Aupouri Smokestone
sa-te_aupouri_smokestone.def: May be activated when a friendly unit fails a Break Test (after any rerolls). Until the end of the phase, enemy units within 18" of the bearer have their Charge Range, Pursuit Distance, and Overrun Distance rolls Minimised.

sa-ancient_plaque.title: Ancient Plaque
sa-ancient_plaque.def: The first time each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell, if no other friendly Wizard has made a Casting Roll this Phase, the bearer may reroll all Magic Dice for this Casting Roll.

sa-stampede_resonator_crystal.title: Stampede Resonator Crystal
sa-stampede_resonator_crystal.def: May be activated at the start of any Charge Phase. Choose one friendly unit containing models with Height 4 or 5 within 18". The chosen unit loses Stomp Attacks and gains Impact Hits (X), where X is equal to its amount of hits from its Stomp Attacks. If a model already had Impact Hits, increase the number of hits by its amount of Stomp Attacks instead.

sa-carved_tablet.title: Carved Tablet
sa-carved_tablet.def: When Building your Army, the model must choose one of the spells from Carved Wisdom (see Howdah Devices). The model can cast the chosen spell as a Bound Spell. See Carved Wisdom for Casting Values.

se-dances_of_cenyrn.title: Dances of Cenyrn
se-dances_of_cenyrn.def:
When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, units with this rule must choose one of the Dances listed below and apply its effects until the end of the Round of Combat:
  •
  •
  •
  •
The unit cannot choose a Dance again until after one of the following has happened: (1) the unit is no longer Engaged in Combat, or (2) the unit has chosen a different Dance.

se-meeting_of_minds.title: Meeting of Minds
se-meeting_of_minds.def: The model gains Tree Singing and, while within 3" of a Forest, Aegis (6+, against Ranged Attacks).

se-clearing_spirits.title: Clearing Spirits
se-clearing_spirits.def: The model gains Hard Target (1), Light Troops, and Skirmisher.

se-heath_hunters.title: Heath Hunters
se-heath_hunters.def: The model gains Feigned Flight, Light Troops, Vanguard, as well as a <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/sylvan_longbow">Sylvan Longbow</nuxt-link> (3+).

se-heath_lancers.title: Heath Lancers
se-heath_lancers.def: The model gains Devastating Charge (+1 Att, +1 Str), Shield.

se-root_and_snare.title: Root and Snare
se-root_and_snare.def:
When an enemy unit performs any of the following actions, it suffers D6 hits with Str 3 and AP 3:

  •
  •

Resolve the hits at the end of the move or action that triggered them. No unit can be affected by Root and Snare more than once in each Player Turn (including from different units containing Root and Snare).

se-herald_of_sura.title: Herald of Sura
se-herald_of_sura.def: The model's unit is considered to be in Soft Cover and within 3" of a Forest for the purposes of Forest Dweller, Elven Cloak.

se-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
se-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Feigned Flight, , and Strider (Forest).

se-big_brother.title: Big Brother
se-big_brother.def: - Universal RuleThe model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

se-giant_club.title: Giant Club
se-giant_club.def: - Melee WeaponAttacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

se-sapling_bow.title: Sapling Bow
se-sapling_bow.def: - Range 30", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 3 [10], Area Attack (1×5), Quick to Fire.

se-giant_sentinel.title: Giant Sentinel
se-giant_sentinel.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains Light Troops, Poison Attacks, and Sapling Bow (4+).

se-bone_break_dancer.title: Bone Break Dancer
se-bone_break_dancer.def:
- Universal RuleAt the start of each Round of Combat, choose one of the dances listed below and apply its effects until the end of the Round of Combat. The model cannot choose this dance again until after one of the following has happened:
  • The model is no longer Engaged in Combat.
  • The model has chosen a different dance.
The TwistEnemy units in base contact do not receive any Rank Bonus to their Combat Score.Jump!+1 Armour Penetration and Lethal Strike.Belly Dancing+2 Offensive Skill and +2 Defensive Skill.Tap DancingStomp Attacks (D6+2).

se-the_forest_follows.title: The Forest Follows
se-the_forest_follows.def: During Pre-game Selections, place a single Forest on the Battlefield, so that it is at least partially inside your Deployment Zone and not in contact with any other Terrain. This Forest must fully fit inside a 10.5×7.5" rectangle and is considered Dangerous Terrain.

se-forest_dweller.title: Forest Dweller
se-forest_dweller.def: While the model's unit is within 3" of Forest Terrain, the model gains Stubborn. If the model's unit already contains Stubborn, the unit is considered Steady when rolling Break Tests.

se-tree_singing.title: Tree Singing
se-tree_singing.def:
May only be activated once during the Magic Phase. In your Magic Phase, immediately after rolling for Excess Magic, a single model with Tree Singing may move a Forest following the steps below. The owner may choose to discard a Magic Dice to increase the range by using the distances marked in square brackets [X"].

  •
  •

se-elven_cloak.title: Elven Cloak
se-elven_cloak.def:
Cannot be taken by models with Height 5.
While the model's unit is within 3" of a Field, Forest or Ruins the model gains Aegis (6+, against Ranged Attacks).

se-forests_thorns.title: Forest's Thorns
se-forests_thorns.def:
The model's part Standard Melee Attacks and Shooting Attacks with Sylvan Longbow from Short Range have their AP set to at least 3.

Note: A Pathfinder Character with Paired Weapons and Spirit of the Whirlwind has AP 3 with its Standard Melee Attacks (Forest's Thorns does not increase it to AP 5).

se-watchful_eyes.title: Watchful Eyes
se-watchful_eyes.def: Ignores to-hit modifiers from Cover caused by Forests.

se-impaling_roots.title: Impaling Roots
se-impaling_roots.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Impaling Roots312"D6+14
1
Gnarled and Knotted, March and Shoot, Quick to Fire, Watchful Eyes.


Gnarled and Knotted
If the target is within 3" of a Forest, use the Str and AP values in brackets.

se-sylvan_longbow.title: Sylvan Longbow
se-sylvan_longbow.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Sylvan LongbowX30"131Longbow, Quick to Fire, Watchful Eyes.

se-shapeshifter.title: Shapeshifter
se-shapeshifter.def: The model gains Exclusive, Fortitude (4+), Vanguard. Its Mob is set to 10". The model loses Attached (if it has it).

se-wild_hunter.title: Wild Hunter
se-wild_hunter.def: The model gains Fearless, Frenzy, Light Troops and the model part gains Devastating Charge (+1 Att, +1 Str), Fury, Lethal Strike.

se-pathfinder.title: Pathfinder
se-pathfinder.def:
The model gains Root and Snare (see Pathfinder unit), Forest's Thorns, Scout, Stand and Shoot, Vanguard.
Sylvan Longbow wielded by the model has its Shots set to 4 if a Chieftain, or 5 if a Forest Prince.

se-forest_guardian.title: Forest Guardian
se-forest_guardian.def: The model gains Vanguard. The model and Rank-and-File models in the model's unit gain First Strike (Hatred).

se-blade_dancer.title: Blade Dancer
se-blade_dancer.def: The model gains Aegis (6+), Dances of Cenyrn (see Blade Dancer unit), Exclusive (Blade Dancer Kindred, Blade Dancers), Fearless, Magic Resistance (2). The model's unit gains Swiftstride.

se-scarred_bark.title: Scarred Bark
se-scarred_bark.def: The model's unit gains First Strike (Hatred).

se-entangling_vines.title: Entangling Vines
se-entangling_vines.def: The model gains Impaling Roots if it didn't have it. When the model is fighting a Duel, enemy Melee Attacks towards it must reroll successful to-hit rolls.

se-toxic_spores.title: Toxic Spores
se-toxic_spores.def: The model's unit Standard Melee Attacks gain Lethal Strike.

se-oaken_crown.title: Oaken Crown
se-oaken_crown.def: The model's unit gains Disciplined and Fortitude (5+).

se-verdant_rebirth.title: Verdant Rebirth
se-verdant_rebirth.def:
The first time each Magic Phase that the model successfully casts a Learned Spell that targets a friendly unit, it Recovers 1 HP.
The model cannot Recover more than 1 HP per Magic Phase from this spell or Fountain of Youth (Druidism).

se-sylvan_beasts.title: Sylvan Beasts
se-sylvan_beasts.def: The sum of the <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/sylvan_beasts">Sylvan Beasts</nuxt-link> values stated in brackets of all models in the army is restricted to 1 per 1500 Army Points, rounding fractions up.

se-gnarled_and_knotted.title: Gnarled and Knotted
se-gnarled_and_knotted.def: If the target is within 3" of a Forest, use the Str and AP values in brackets.

se-forest_embrace.title: Forest Embrace
se-forest_embrace.def:
Place a Forest* underneath the target. This Forest always extends to the edges of the target's Unit Boundary (even if the unit moves or changes formation).

* You may place a marker next to the unit instead

se-watchers_woe.title: Watcher's Woe
se-watchers_woe.def: Number of Shots is set to at least 3, Poison Attacks (Shooting).

se-bough_of_wyscan.title: Bough Of Wyscan
se-bough_of_wyscan.def: Number of Shots is always set to 1, Str 3, AP 2, Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit (2).

se-hunters_honour.title: Hunter's Honour
se-hunters_honour.def: +1 Str and +1 AP. If the wielder causes at least one unsaved wound with this weapon, the wielder and all Rank-and-File models in its unit gain Distracting (1) until the end of the Round of Combat.

se-shielding_bark.title: Shielding Bark
se-shielding_bark.def: +1 HP, Aegis (5+), Fearless, Tree Singing, Weakness (Flaming Attacks). Arm is set to 4 and can never be improved beyond this.

se-banner_of_deception.title: Banner of Deception
se-banner_of_deception.def: Once the opponent has deployed their entire army, but before moving models with Vanguard, the owner may remove the bearer's unit from the Battlefield and deploy it again elsewhere. Attachable models deployed inside the unit must be redeployed inside the same unit.

se-banner_of_silent_mist.title: Banner of Silent Mist
se-banner_of_silent_mist.def: The bearer's unit gains Soft Cover. Enemy units within 3" of the bearer's unit may not gain any benefit from their Musician.

se-predator_pennant.title: Predator Pennant
se-predator_pennant.def: The bearer's unit gains Devastating Charge (Distracting (1)).

se-hail_shot.title: Hail Shot
se-hail_shot.def:
One use only. May be activated in the Shooting Phase. This is a Shooting Weapon with the following profile:
  •

Hail Shot cannot benefit from Forest's Thorns.

se-mist_walkers_mirror.title: Mist Walker's Mirror
se-mist_walkers_mirror.def:
One use only. May be activated at the end of any friendly Movement Phase if the bearer’s unit is unengaged, consists entirely of Height 1 models, and is fully inside a Forest that is not in contact with enemy models. Apply the following rules:
  • Remove the bearer's unit from the Battlefield.
  • Immediately place it back using Ambush (centre of Forest).

If the unit cannot be placed, it is considered destroyed where it was removed.

se-sacred_seeds.title: Sacred Seeds
se-sacred_seeds.def: May be activated at the end of any friendly Movement Phase. Place a Forest Terrain Feature in contact with the bearer and at least 1" away from any enemy units and other Terrain Features. This Forest remains in play until the end of the game (even if the bearer is removed as a casualty), it must fit within a circle of 6" diameter and is considered Dangerous Terrain.

se-song_of_cenyrn.title: Song of Cenyrn
se-song_of_cenyrn.def: May be activated when the bearer's unit declares a Charge. The target of the Charge may only declare Hold! as its Charge Reaction, unless it is Shaken. The enemy unit may still declare Charge Reactions as normal if it is subsequently Charged by other units.

se-horn_of_the_wild_hunt.title: Horn of the Wild Hunt
se-horn_of_the_wild_hunt.def: One use only. May be activated when a friendly unit within 8" fails a Charge Range roll. The Charge Range roll is rerolled.

se-poisoned_thorn.title: Poisoned Thorn
se-poisoned_thorn.def:
Poisoned Thorn - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Poisoned Thorn312"131Poison Attacks, Quick to Fire, Stand and Shoot

se-inside_forest_aura.title: Inside a Forest
se-inside_forest_aura.def: Half of the unit's models have the centre of their bases inside a Forest

se-dance_of_bedevilments.title: Dance of Bedevilments
se-dance_of_bedevilments.def: Fear, and enemy units in base contact with the model do not receive any Rank Bonus to their Combat Score

vc-lash_of_souls.title: Lash of Souls
vc-lash_of_souls.def: The model can cast The Devouring Dark (Occultism) as a Bound Spell (3+).

vc-aura_of_undeath.title: Aura of Undeath
vc-aura_of_undeath.def: During its Shooting Phase, the model part can make a Shooting Attack that targets all enemy units within 12" of the model (including those Engaged in Combat and outside Front Arc and/or Line of Sight). This attack can be used even if the Altar is Engaged in Combat. The targets suffer D6 hits with a Strength equal to the current Game Turn number and Armour Penetration 2.

vc-no_rest_for_the_wicked.title: No Rest for the Wicked
vc-no_rest_for_the_wicked.def:
Friendly Rank-and-File models in units within 6" gain Fortitude (6+), which can be improved in the following cases :

  • Ghasts gain Fortitude (4+) instead.

  • Models from Core gain Fortitude (+1, max. 5+) in their First Round of Combat.

vc-soul_tether.title: Soul Tether
vc-soul_tether.def: The model can cast Arise! as a Bound Spell (5+), with the following changes : its Range is set to 6", and it gains Type : Aura.

vc-unnatural_activity.title: Unnatural Activity
vc-unnatural_activity.def: Friendly units within 6" of one or more models with Unnatural Activity gains +2 Off and +2 Agi.

vc-unholy_conduit.title: Unholy Conduit
vc-unholy_conduit.def: Friendly units within 6" gain Autonomous.

vc-extended_chassis.title: Extended Chassis
vc-extended_chassis.def: The Dark Coach's base size is changed to 50×150mm, and has Phantom Host (2).

vc-great_monstrous_revenant.title: Great Monstrous Revenant
vc-great_monstrous_revenant.def: The Monstrous Revenant gains Stomp Attacks (D3) and its base size is changed to 60×100mm.

vc-lich.title: Lich
vc-lich.def:
Unless Height 5, the model gains Fortitude (5+).
When the model casts Arise!, it may choose to set the spell's Range to 6", and give it Type : Aura. This choice is declared when selecting targets.
The model has access to Cosmology in addition to its normal Paths.

vc-chilling_shriek.title: Chilling Shriek
vc-chilling_shriek.def:
Chilling Shriek can be used both as a Shooting Attack and as a Melee Attack.
  • Shooting Attack: Choose a target using the normal rules for Shooting Attacks. The attack has Range 8" and March and Shoot.
  • Melee Attack: The attack is made at the model part's Agility. Declare that you are using Chilling Shriek when allocating attacks. If used, the model part cannot perform any Standard Melee Attacks. Choose a single unit in contact as the target.
Regardless of whether it is used as a Shooting or Melee Attack, the Chilling Shriek hits automatically, and inflicts 1 hit for each HP the model with Chilling Shriek currently has. These hits always have Str 9, AP 10, and Magical Attacks. When rolling to wound with this attack, use the enemy's Courage instead of its Resilience.

vc-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
vc-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Ashes to Ashes, Fearless, and Undead.

vc-big_brother.title: Big Brother
vc-big_brother.def: - Universal RuleThe model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

vc-barrow_giant.title: Barrow Giant
vc-barrow_giant.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains a Halberd and Multiple Wounds (2, against Standard).

vc-ghoul_giant.title: Ghoul Giant
vc-ghoul_giant.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains Poison Attacks and Unholy Appetite.

vc-zombie_giant.title: Zombie Giant
vc-zombie_giant.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains Stubborn, its Reanimated is set to D6+1, and its Offensive Skill and Defensive Skill are set to 1. The model does not count as a model with Towering Presence for the purpose of Arise! (Hereditary Spell).

vc-ashes_to_ashes.title: Ashes to Ashes
vc-ashes_to_ashes.def: At the end of each of your Player Turns, if there are no friendly models with Gates of the Netherworld on the Battlefield, each unit containing Ashes to Ashes loses X HP, where X is equal to half the Resurrected value (roll any dice when needed), fractions rounded up. These hits can only be allocated onto models with Ashes to Ashes.

vc-gates_of_the_netherworld.title: Gates of the Netherworld
vc-gates_of_the_netherworld.def:
1--3 models/army. Must include at least 1.


  • If the model has chosen Evocation as its Path of Magic : Whenever the model successfully casts the Hereditary Spell, the target of the spell is considered to have +1 Rsr.

  • If the model has chosen a different path than Evocation as its Path of Magic : The model knows the Apprentice Spell (#1) in Evocation in addition to its other spells.

vc-awaken.title: Awaken
vc-awaken.def: The model can Raise Health Points above a unit's starting size for the units stated within brackets (X). However, units cannot be increased beyond twice their starting size or beyond the maximum unit size written in their unit entry. A unit's starting size is the size of the unit as written on the Army List or the size of the unit when it is Summoned.

vc-necromantic_aura.title: Necromantic Aura
vc-necromantic_aura.def: All friendly units within 6" of one or more models with Necromantic Aura reduce the number of Health Point losses caused by Ashes to Ashes and Unstable by 1.

vc-the_dead_arise.title: The Dead Arise
vc-the_dead_arise.def:
One of a Kind.

The model can cast The Dead Arise as a Bound Spell (5+).The Dead Arise: Range: 12", Type : Ground, Duration : Instant.
Summon a Skeletons or Zombies unit. Declare which when selecting the target for the spell. The unit has a number of Health Points corresponding to the Rsr value of the unit. All models must be placed within the spell's Range, with at least one model touching the target point.

vc-autonomous.title: Autonomous
vc-autonomous.def: Undead units with Autonomous may perform March Moves as normal, even when outside the range of Commanding Presence of any friendly models.

vc-meeting_of_minds.title: Meeting of Minds
vc-meeting_of_minds.def: The model gains Necromantic Aura.

vc-ghostly_form.title: Ghostly Form
vc-ghostly_form.def: The model gains Aegis (3+), which is reduced to Aegis (5+) against Magical Attacks.

vc-vampiric.title: Vampiric
vc-vampiric.def:
At the end of each Melee Phase, check and resolve the following effects for all models with Vampiric:
  • Character -- If at least one attack with Vampiric made by the Character caused an unsaved wound against enemy units, the Character can make a single Vampiric roll. If successful, the Character's model Recovers a single HP.
  • Rank-and-File model -- If at least one attack with Vampiric made by a Rank-and-File model in the unit caused an unsaved wound against enemy units, the unit can make a single Vampiric roll. If successful, the unit Raises a single HP.
A Vampiric roll is successful if the D6 scores X+, where X is the number stated within brackets. If a unit or Character has multiple model parts with this Attack Attribute that each caused unsaved wounds, use the best value.

vc-unholy_appetite.title: Unholy Appetite
vc-unholy_appetite.def: After a Round of Combat in which at least one attack with Unholy Appetite caused an unsaved wound, all attacks with Unholy Appetite from models in the same unit must reroll failed to-hit rolls until the end of the next Player Turn.

vc-unliving_shield.title: Unliving Shield
vc-unliving_shield.def: Enemy models cannot allocate Melee Attacks towards a Necromancer as long as they can allocate attacks towards a model with Unliving Shield in the same unit as the Necromancer. This rule cannot be used if there are also models with Vampiric in the same unit as the Necromancer.

vc-storm_of_wings.title: Storm of Wings
vc-storm_of_wings.def: Enemy units in contact with one or more models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/storm_of_wings">Storm of Wings</nuxt-link> suffer -1 Offensive Skill and -1 Defensive Skill.

vc-sangreal.title: Sangreal
vc-sangreal.def: The model part gains +1 Arm and Fury.

vc-lahmia.title: Lahmia
vc-lahmia.def: The bearer's Arm is set to 1, it loses Metal Armour and gains Distracting (1, if Height 1--4), Elven Finesse.

vc-strigoi.title: Strigoi
vc-strigoi.def: The bearer's Arm is set to 0 and its HP are set to 4, it loses Metal Armour and gains First Strike (Hatred). If taken on a model on foot, it gains Fortitude (4+).

vc-crimson_rage.title: Crimson Rage
vc-crimson_rage.def: The model part gains Hatred, and its Vampiric rolls are Maximised.

vc-storm_caller.title: Storm Caller
vc-storm_caller.def: All units within 12" of the bearer gains Hard Target (1).

vc-commandment.title: Commandment
vc-commandment.def: The Def and Off of Rank-and-File models in the bearer's unit are set to 6.

vc-ghoul_lord.title: Ghoul Lord
vc-ghoul_lord.def: The bearer and all Rank-and-File models in the bearer's unit gains Poison Attacks.

vc-arcane_knowledge.title: Arcane Knowledge
vc-arcane_knowledge.def: Learned Spells cast by the model gains +6" Range. Aura Spells gain +3" Range instead.

vc-eternal_duellist.title: Eternal Duellist
vc-eternal_duellist.def: The bearer's Melee Attacks ignore Parry, and must reroll natural to-hit and to-wound rolls of ‘1’.

vc-monster_hunter.title: Monster Hunter
vc-monster_hunter.def: The model part gains Multiple Wounds (2, towards Height 4--5).

vc-unbreakable_will.title: Unbreakable Will
vc-unbreakable_will.def: When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, select a single friendly unit Engaged in the same Combat as the bearer (this can be its own unit). This unit gains Stubborn until the end of the Player Turn.

vc-mesmerising_gaze.title: Mesmerising Gaze
vc-mesmerising_gaze.def:
The model must issue a Duel whenever possible. This cannot be prevented by issuing a Duel with another firendly model first. This Duel must, if possible, be accepted. When this model is a Duellist, it gains Distracting (1, against non-Duellists*).
* i.e. enemy models that ar not part of the duel.

vc-bestial_bulk.title: Bestial Bulk
vc-bestial_bulk.def: The model's Height is set to 3, and its base size to 40×40mm. The model gains Stomp Attacks (1), Attached (Ghasts, Vampire Spawn).

vc-flying_horror.title: Flying Horror
vc-flying_horror.def: The model gains Fly, Swiftstride, +2" Cha and +2" Mob.

vc-mysteries_of_the_night.title: Mysteries of the Night
vc-mysteries_of_the_night.def: The model's Path Access is replaced with Shamanism, Witchcraft.

vc-blood_magic.title: Blood Magic
vc-blood_magic.def: The first time each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell, the bearer may reroll all Magic Dice for this Casting Roll. If this option is used, the bearer chooses a Character in its unit to lose 1 HP.

vc-arise.title: Arise!
vc-arise.def:
Choose one of the following effects when resolving the spell*:
  • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Resurrected value.

  • An Attachable Model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Resurrected value.

Height 4--5 models with Exclusive, and Attachable Models cannot Recover more than 2 HP from this spell each Magic Phase.

vc-reapers_harvest.title: Reaper's Harvest
vc-reapers_harvest.def: Str is set to 10, AP is set to 10, Divine Attacks. When rolling to wound use the enemy's Courage instead of its Resilience.

vc-true_thirst.title: True Thirst
vc-true_thirst.def: +1 Str, +1 AP, Unholy Appetite, Vampiric (3+). If the wielder's model has Height 4 or more, the attacks gain Vampiric (5+) instead of Vampiric (3+).

vc-black_standard_of_zagvozd.title: Black Standard of Zagvozd
vc-black_standard_of_zagvozd.def: Melee Attacks made by Rank-and-File model parts without Mount in the bearer's unit gains +1 to hit.

vc-hypnotic_pendant.title: Hypnotic Pendant
vc-hypnotic_pendant.def: The bearer gains Parry. All Rank-and-File models with Height 2 or less in the bearer's unit gain Parry.

vc-eternity_gem.title: Eternity Gem
vc-eternity_gem.def: The bearer's model gains Immune (Lethal Strike, Poison Attacks, Multiple Wounds (X)).

vc-necromantic_staff.title: Necromantic Staff
vc-necromantic_staff.def: The bearer gains Channel (1) and can cast Arise! (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell (5+), with the following changes : its Range is 6", and it has type Aura.

vc-nights_crown.title: Night's Crown
vc-nights_crown.def: Attacks towards the bearer suffer -1 to wound.

vc-cursed_medallion.title: Cursed Medallion
vc-cursed_medallion.def: During Pre-game Selections choose a Character, or a single model unit on the opponent's Army List. The bearer must reroll failed to-hit and to-wound rolls against the chosen model.

vc-elixir_of_death.title: Elixir of Death
vc-elixir_of_death.def: The bearer's model gains Ghost Step, Ghostly Form. The model cannot join Rank-and-File units with Ghostly Form.

vc-ancient_blood_power.title: Ancient Blood Power
vc-ancient_blood_power.def: Bloodline Vampire Counts can take the <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/ancient_blood_power">Ancient Blood Power</nuxt-link> of their Bloodline instead of taking a Blood Power. All <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/ancient_blood_power">Ancient Blood Powers</nuxt-link> are .

vc-blood_ties.title: Blood Ties
vc-blood_ties.def: Certain unit entries in this Army Book include the term <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/blood_ties">Blood Ties</nuxt-link>, followed by the name of a Bloodline in brackets. If the army includes at least one Vampire Count or Vampire Courtier matching the Bloodline written in brackets in a unit entry, this unit gains access to the associated <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/blood_ties">Blood Ties</nuxt-link> option.

vc-wail_of_woe.title: Wail of Woe
vc-wail_of_woe.def:
Wail of Woe - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Wail of Woe--8"D6+241March and Shoot, Magical Attacks, Hits Automatically

vc-eternity_gem_aegis.title: Eternity Gem Aegis
vc-eternity_gem_aegis.def: One use only: Must be activated when the bearer's model suffers its first wound in the game after Armour Saves. The bearer’s model gains Aegis (2+) against this wound.
