vc-blood_ties_botd.title: Blood Ties (Brotherhood of the Dragon)
vc-blood_ties_botd.def: Devastating Charge (+1 Att) and Plate Armour

ud-sacred_ark.title: Sacred Ark
ud-sacred_ark.def: Learned Spells cast by friendly Wizards within 12" of one or more models with Sacred Ark gain +6" Range. Aura spells gain +3" Range instead.

ud-divine_light.title: Divine Light
ud-divine_light.def: Enemy Wizards within 36" of one or more Caskets of Phatep suffer a -1 modifier to their Casting Rolls.

ud-phateps_curse.title: Phatep's Curse
ud-phateps_curse.def: The model can cast Soul Blight (Evocation) as a Bound Spell (7+). The spell's Range is set to 48".

ud-scales_of_destiny.title: Scales of Destiny
ud-scales_of_destiny.def: The model gains Channel (1) and may cast Ice and Fire (Cosmology) as a Bound Spell (5+).

ud-deathless_noble.title: Deathless Noble
ud-deathless_noble.def: The model gains <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/undying_will">Undying Will</nuxt-link>, Disciplined.

ud-tomb_harbinger.title: Tomb Harbinger
ud-tomb_harbinger.def: The model gains Fury, Lethal Strike, Poison Attacks. The model counts as a Rank-and-File model for the purposes of Undying Will.

ud-tomb_architect.title: Tomb Architect
ud-tomb_architect.def: During Pre-game Selections, and at the start of each friendly Player Turn, choose a friendly unit with Ensouled Statue within 18". This unit gains Fortitude (5+) with Duration: One Turn.

ud-commander_of_the_terracotta_army.title: Commander of the Terracotta Army
ud-commander_of_the_terracotta_army.def: The model gains Terracotta Army. Other units in the Army List must be upgraded with Terracotta Army.

ud-lord_of_the_barrow_legion.title: Lord of the Barrow Legion
ud-lord_of_the_barrow_legion.def: The model gains Barrow Legion. Other units in the Army List must be upgraded with Barrow Legion.

ud-petrifying_gaze.title: Petrifying Gaze
ud-petrifying_gaze.def:
This rule can be used as a Shooting Attack and as a Melee Attack.


  • The attack has Range 12" and Shots 2.
  • The attack is made at the model's Agility Step. Each enemy unit in contact with the model suffers 2 hits.

Regardless of whether it is used as a Shooting or Melee Attack, Petrifying Gaze hits automatically, its to-wound rolls are set to 5+, and always have AP 10 and Magical Attacks.

ud-ghastly_swarm.title: Ghastly Swarm
ud-ghastly_swarm.def:
The model's Rsr value is set to 1, and gains Spirit, and Aegis (3+), which is reduced to Aegis (5+) against Magical Attacks.

The model also gains Ghost Step, Magical Attacks.

ud-eternal_guardian.title: Eternal Guardian
ud-eternal_guardian.def: Attacks with Multiple Wounds (X) against the model halve their X value, rounding fractions up.

ud-royal_chariot.title: Royal Chariot
ud-royal_chariot.def: The model's base size is changed to 100×100 mm, and it gains two additional Skeletal Horse model parts

ud-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
ud-giant_see_giant_do.def: The Ancient Giant model part gains Dust to Dust, Fearless, Lethal Strike, and Undead.

ud-big_brother.title: Big Brother
ud-big_brother.def: - Universal RuleThe model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

ud-giant_club.title: Giant Club
ud-giant_club.def: - Melee WeaponAttacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

ud-bone_chariot.title: Bone Chariot
ud-bone_chariot.def: - Universal RuleThe model part gains Harnessed, Impact Hits (D6), Swiftstride, and the model gains the following additional model parts:

ud-scarab_giant.title: Scarab Giant
ud-scarab_giant.def: - Universal RuleThe Ancient Giant model part gains Harnessed. The model gains Distracting and the following additional model part that is not affected by Undying Will:

ud-hierophant.title: Hierophant
ud-hierophant.def:
An Undying Dynasties army must include at least 1 Hierophant.


  • If the model has chosen Evocation as its Path of Magic : whenever the model casts the spell Death is Only the Beginning, you may choose to set its Range to 18" (i.e. it is not limited to targeting the same unit as the Original Spell, and may instead target any friendly unit within 18").

  • If the model has chosen a different path than Evocation as its Path of Magic : the model knows the Apprentice Spell (#1) in Evocation in addition to its other spells.

ud-dust_to_dust.title: Dust to Dust
ud-dust_to_dust.def: At the end of each of your Player Turns, if there are no friendly models with Hierophant on the Battlefield, each unit with Dust to Dust loses X HP, where X is equal to half their Resurrected value, fractions rounded up. These hits can only be allocated onto models with Dust to Dust.

ud-ensouled_statue.title: Ensouled Statue
ud-ensouled_statue.def: Units with Ensouled Statue reduce the number of HP lost due to Dust to Dust, Unstable by 1.

ud-undying_will.title: Undying Will
ud-undying_will.def: Units with Undying Will gain +2 Def, +2 Off, Magical Attacks, Lethal Strike, and replace their Shooting Weapons' Aim with (4+). Characters, models with Ensouled Statue, and model parts with Mount, Beast, Construct are not affected by Undying Will.

ud-autonomous.title: Autonomous
ud-autonomous.def: Undead, Unstable units with Autonomous may perform March Moves as normal, even when outside the range of the Commanding Presence of any friendly models.

ud-terracotta_army.title: Terracotta Army
ud-terracotta_army.def:
• The model loses Dust to Dust (if they had it).

  • Unless the model already has Statue, it gains Statue, Ensouled Statue and suffers -1 Rsr, to a minimum of 1.

  • Models that gained Ensouled Statue from this rule can benefit from Undying Will. Note: Characters and model parts with Beast, Construct, Mount are still not affected by Undying Will.


If an army includes any model with Terracotta Army, then all models in the Army List must have Terracotta Army.

ud-aspen_arrows.title: Aspen Arrows
ud-aspen_arrows.def: The model's Shooting Weapon always hits on a roll equal to or greater than its Aim.

ud-great_aspen_bow.title: Great Aspen Bow
ud-great_aspen_bow.def:
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Great Aspen BowX36"152Shoot in Extra Rank, The attack ignores friendly models for Line of Sight and Cover purposes., Aspen Arrows

ud-charnel_catapult.title: Charnel Catapult
ud-charnel_catapult.def:
Charnel Catapult -
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Charnel Catapult448"141Artillery, Area Attack (3×3), Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks, Panic Tests caused by this weapon are taken at -1 Cou.

ud-soul_conduit.title: Soul Conduit
ud-soul_conduit.def: If  one or more friendly models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/soul_conduit">Soul Conduit</nuxt-link> are  present on the Battlefield at the start of a friendly Magic Phase, you don't draw a Flux Card. Instead apply the following:5 Magic Diceboth players4+D3 Veil TokensActive Player

ud-well_of_souls.title: Well of Souls
ud-well_of_souls.def: One use only. May be activated at the start of any of your Magic Phases. Until the start of your next Player Turn, whenever either player would draw a Flux Card, they draw the <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/well_of_souls">Well of Souls</nuxt-link> Flux Card instead (if either player doesn't draw a Flux Card, that player ignores this effect).<nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/well_of_souls">Well of Souls</nuxt-link>Flux Card5 Magic Diceboth players5 Veil TokensActive PlayerWhen making a casting roll with 3 or more Magic Dice, all doubles count as triples. Note that a Caster can suffer multiple Miscast effects from a single casting roll. However, no Miscast effect can be applied more than once.

ud-bound_in_death.title: Bound in Death
ud-bound_in_death.def: Rank-and-File models in this unit must be fewer than 3 before hits can be distributed onto Characters with the same Type and Height as this unit.

ud-colossal_kopesh.title: Colossal Kopesh
ud-colossal_kopesh.def: Attacks made with this weapon gain +2 Strength, +2 Armour Penetration, and Multiple Wounds (D3, against Towering Presence).

ud-giant_aspen_bow.title: Giant Aspen Bow
ud-giant_aspen_bow.def:
Giant Aspen Bow -
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Giant Aspen Bow548"1310Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit (D3), Aspen Arrows

ud-death_is_only_the_beginning.title: Death is Only the Beginning
ud-death_is_only_the_beginning.def:
Choose one of the following effects when resolving the spell*:


  • The Rank-and-File part of the target Raises HP equal to its Rsr.

  • An Attachable Model in the target Recovers HP equal to its Rsr.


Height 4--5 models with Exclusive, and Attachable Models, cannot Recover more than 2 HP from this spell in each Magic Phase.

*If multiple targets, each target can make a different choice.

ud-godslayer.title: Godslayer
ud-godslayer.def:
+1 Att, Divine Attacks, Multiple Wounds (2, towards Aegis (X+)*).

*Note that the latter also applies against models with Aegis Saves with Conditional Applications.

ud-scourge_of_kings.title: Scourge of Kings
ud-scourge_of_kings.def: Att is set to 6. While the wielder is a Duellist, it gains Zeal.

ud-banner_of_the_entombed.title: Banner of the Entombed
ud-banner_of_the_entombed.def:
-1.The bearer count towards Entombed.

If taken by a Character, the bearer gains Ambush (Open Terrain). If taken by a Rank-and-File model, the bearer’s unit gains Ambush (Open Terrain) and additional models cannot be added to the unit during Army List creation.

ud-crown_of_the_pharaohs.title: Crown of the Pharaohs
ud-crown_of_the_pharaohs.def:
At the start of each of your Player Turns, the bearer may lose Undying Will and choose a friendly unit within 12".
This unit gains Undying Will. Both effects have Duration: One Turn.

ud-sacred_hourglass.title: Sacred Hourglass
ud-sacred_hourglass.def: The first time each Magic Phase that the bearer fails a Casting Roll for a Learned Spell that was targeting a friendly unit, the bearer may reroll all Magic Dice for this Casting Roll.

ud-book_of_the_dead.title: Book of the Dead
ud-book_of_the_dead.def: The bearer can cast Death is Only the Beginning as a Bound Spell (4+). The spell's Type is changed to: Range 12" and Aura. Note that no increase in Casting Value is required when targeting units with Height 5.

ud-steeds_of_nephetra.title: Steeds of Nephet-Ra
ud-steeds_of_nephetra.def: Skeletal Horse model parts in the bearer's unit gain Ghost Step, Grind Attack (1, Str 3, AP 0, Flaming Attacks).

ud-blessed_wrappings.title: Blessed Wrappings
ud-blessed_wrappings.def: The bearer gains +1 HP and loses Weakness (Flaming Attacks) if it had it. (Note that this does not prevent the model from gaining Weakness (Flaming Attacks) from other sources).

ud-bloodless_banner.title: Bloodless Banner
ud-bloodless_banner.def: Friendly units within 6" of the bearer's unit gain Immune (Poison Attacks).

ud-sandstorm_cloak.title: Sandstorm Cloak
ud-sandstorm_cloak.def: The bearer's Mob is set to 8, and it gains Autonomous, Fly, Swiftstride, Sweeping Attack (2D6, Str 2, AP 1).

ud-death_mask_of_teput.title: Death Mask of Teput
ud-death_mask_of_teput.def: Horror, Petrifying Gaze (See Sand Stalkers).

ud-scroll_of_desiccation.title: Scroll of Desiccation
ud-scroll_of_desiccation.def: During Pre-game Selections, choose a Field, Forest, or Water Terrain Feature. This Terrain Feature ceases to be the Terrain Feature it used to be and loses all its rules. It is treated as Dangerous Terrain for all enemy units.

vs-underworld_beast.title: Underworld Beast
vs-underworld_beast.def: The model gains Random Movement (3D6") and its Attack Value is set to 4D3. It loses the Pitmaster model part, and its base size is changed to 60×100 mm.

vs-testudo.title: Testudo
vs-testudo.def: The model gains +1 Str when using a Hand Weapon.

vs-bloodfur_praetorians.title: Bloodfur Praetorians
vs-bloodfur_praetorians.def:
The model gains Bodyguard (General) and Great Weapon, and loses Halberd.
The model does not count towards the army's model cap of max. 120 Blackfur Veterans.

vs-unstable_engines.title: Unstable Engines
vs-unstable_engines.def: Immediately before the model is removed as a casualty, it inflicts D6 hits with Str 4, AP 0 and Flaming Attacks on all other units within 6" of the model's unit.

vs-unit_of_artillery.title: Unit of Artillery
vs-unit_of_artillery.def: If one model in this unit is affected by an Engineer, all models in this unit are affected by the Engineer.

vs-fire_rats.title: Fire Rats
vs-fire_rats.def: The model gains Flaming Attacks, Weakness (Flaming Attacks), and its base size is changed to 25×50 mm. Immediately before the model is removed as a casualty as a result of any enemy Melee Attack, it inflicts 1 hit with Str 3, AP 0, and Flaming Attacks on the attacking unit.

vs-fetthis_fleshmaster.title: Fetthis Fleshmaster
vs-fetthis_fleshmaster.def: Units containing Mutant, that are within 12" of a Fetthis Fleshmaster gain Maximised (Charge Range).

vs-stygian_overseer.title: Stygian Overseer
vs-stygian_overseer.def:
Immediately after Siphon the Veil in each friendly Magic Phase, each Stygian Overseer may move a single friendly Tunnel Marker within 24" that is not in contact with any unit. Move this marker in a straight line up to 6", stopping immediately before moving into contact with any units. Each Tunnel Marker may only be moved once per Magic Phase.

In addition, each Stygian Overseer on the Army List increases the duplication limit of Legionary Drill Teams by 1.

vs-rakachit_technocrat.title: Rakachit Technocrat
vs-rakachit_technocrat.def: The model gains Engineer (Experimental Weapon Teams, Vermin Artillery).

vs-skorchit_alchemist.title: Skorchit Alchemist
vs-skorchit_alchemist.def: Height 1 models in the bearer's unit gain First Strike (Zeal, Flaming Attacks)

vs-back_to_the_burrows.title: Back to the Burrows
vs-back_to_the_burrows.def:
One use only. May be activated at the end of a friendly Movement Phase, if the model's unit:


  • Except this model, consists entirely of Height 1 models.

  • is neither Engaged nor Shaken.

  • is touching a friendly Tunnel Marker.


Effect:


  • Remove the model's unit from the Battlefield.

  • Place it back on the Battlefield with Ambush (within 1.5" of a friendly Tunnel Marker). If placement is impossible, the unit is destroyed.

vs-plague_flail.title: Plague Flail
vs-plague_flail.def: Halberd. The wielder gains Devastating Charge (Lethal Strike), Afflict (-1 Def)

vs-imperator.title: Imperator
vs-imperator.def: While within range of the model's Commanding Presence, other friendly units gain Fearless, Unstable and the number of Health Point losses ignored due to Life is Cheap is decreased by 2.

vs-girded_by_acratos.title: Girded by Acratos
vs-girded_by_acratos.def: The model's Armour is set to 5 and it gains Magic Resistance (2) and Metal Armour.

vs-enlightened_by_favana.title: Enlightened by Favana
vs-enlightened_by_favana.def: The model replaces Wizard Apprentice with Wizard Adept and can choose Witchcraft, Thaumaturgy instead of Occultism. The model cannot take Paired Weapons, Halberd, Great Weapon.

vs-fortified_by_udius.title: Fortified by Udius
vs-fortified_by_udius.def: The model gains Fortitude (4+), Distracting (1), Hard Target (1).

vs-pestilent_pulpit.title: Pestilent Pulpit
vs-pestilent_pulpit.def:
The model gains Exclusive (Plague Cultists, Plague Disciples), and the number of its Impact Hits is increased by D3.
The model's unit gains Poison Attacks.

vs-whispering_bell.title: Whispering Bell
vs-whispering_bell.def: The model knows one additional spell. The model gains Deafening Clamour, Exclusive (Blackfur Veterans, <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/bloodfur_praetorians">Bloodfur Praetorians</nuxt-link>, Vermin Legionaries).

vs-underground_arrival.title: Underground Arrival
vs-underground_arrival.def:
Once per game, at the end of the owner's Movement Phase if the model is not Engaged or Shaken you may:
  • Mark a point on the Battlefield with a Tunnel Marker touching the model, unless there are 4 friendly Tunnel Markers on the Battlefield.
  • Remove the model from the Battlefield.
  • The model is now in Ambush (within 1.5" of a friendly Tunnel Marker) and may roll Ambush rolls normally next turns.

vs-cannon_fodder.title: Cannon Fodder
vs-cannon_fodder.def: Shooting Attacks against enemy units in contact with one or more models with Cannon Fodder gain +1 to hit.

vs-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
vs-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Eagle Standard . In addition, the range of the General's Commanding Presence is always set to 18" when measured to a Verminous Giant.

vs-big_brother.title: Big Brother
vs-big_brother.def: - Universal RuleThe model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

vs-giant_club.title: Giant Club
vs-giant_club.def: - Melee WeaponAttacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

vs-living_bomb.title: Living Bomb
vs-living_bomb.def: - Universal RuleWhen the model is removed as a casualty, all units within 6" suffer 2D6 hits with Strength 4 and Armour Penetration 1.

vs-big_sneaker.title: Big Sneaker
vs-big_sneaker.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains Multiple Wounds (2, against Large, Gigantic) and Paired Weapons . In addition, while within 6" of any other Large or Gigantic unit or any Terrain Feature other than Open Terrain, the model gains Hard Target (1).

vs-callous.title: Callous
vs-callous.def:
The model may use Shooting Attacks against enemy units Engaged in Combat, with the following rules and restrictions:
  • Friendly units Engaged in this Combat are ignored for Cover purposes (but not for drawing Line of Sight).
  • Roll to hit as normal against the intended target. Immediately after determining the number of hits, roll a D6 for each hit. On a roll of 4+, the hit is distributed onto a randomly chosen friendly unit Engaged with the original target. Otherwise, proceed as normal.

vs-life_is_cheap.title: Life is Cheap
vs-life_is_cheap.def: When calculating Combat Score, ignore the first 2 Health Point losses of models with Life is Cheap per combat. Units containing Life is Cheap that are Steadfast get +2 Courage while taking Break Tests.

vs-holy_triumvirate.title: Holy Triumvirate
vs-holy_triumvirate.def:
Max. 3 models/army.
If there are at least 3 models with Holy Triumvirate on your Army List, and they all have either Caelysian Pantheon, either Cult of Errahman, each of these models knows The Awakened Swarm (Hereditary Spell) and can select spells as follows:
  • Wizard Apprentices: Select 1 spell from the Apprentice Spell and Adept Spells of their chosen Path.
  • Wizard Adepts: Select 3 spells from the Apprentice Spell, Adept Spells, and Master Spells of their chosen Path.

vs-maniacal_enthusiasm.title: Maniacal Enthusiasm
vs-maniacal_enthusiasm.def:
When the model makes a dice roll of the type defined in brackets (X), after seeing the result you may choose to add +2 to the result rolled; determine the initial rolls for number of shots and the strength of any shots fired in this way for all models in the unit before deciding whether to use Maniacal Enthusiasm for a model. If this modifier is used, immediately roll a D6 and consult the table below:

  • 1--2 Oops: Change the target of the spell or Shooting Attack being rolled for to the nearest other friendly unit (to the model making the attack. This unit does not ned to be within Line of Sight or Range.).

  • 3--4 Room for Improvement: The model's unit suffers D6 hits with Str 4 AP 1.

  • 5--6 Glorious Success!: No additional effect.

vs-cohort_coordination.title: Cohort Coordination
vs-cohort_coordination.def:
While the unit has a Standard Bearer and the General is on the Battlefield, it:


  • Gains Fight in Extra Rank.

  • May reroll a failed Command Test. If it chooses to do this, and still fails the test, the unit loses its Standard Bearer, and you must remove one Rank-and-File model from the unit as a casualty (no saves allowed).

vs-diseased.title: Diseased
vs-diseased.def: Whenever a natural ‘1’ is rolled to hit for an enemy Melee Attack allocated towards a model with Diseased, the model part inflicts 1 hit with Toxic Attacks on the attacking model's unit in the same Agility Step, before any casualties are removed.

vs-canister_launcher.title: Canister Launcher
vs-canister_launcher.def:
Max. 6 models/army.

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Canister LauncherX18"1Artillery, Area Attack (2×2), Toxic Attacks, Maniacal Enthusiasm (To-hit roll), Quick to Fire

vs-deepfire_thrower.title: Deepfire Thrower
vs-deepfire_thrower.def: The model gains Weakness (Flaming Attacks). Only one model per unit may use a Deepfire Thrower in any one Shooting Phase. Increase the Aim of the Deepfire Thrower by 1 for each other model in the unit armed with a Deepfire Thrower.

vs-rotary_gun.title: Rotary Gun
vs-rotary_gun.def:
Max. 12 models/army.

NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Rotary GunX18"D642Maniacal Enthusiasm (Roll for number of Shots), Quick to Fire

vs-plague_disciples.title: Plague Disciples
vs-plague_disciples.def: The unit replaces its Bloodpox Blades with Plague Flail.

vs-supreme_augur.title: Supreme Augur
vs-supreme_augur.def: The model gains +1 Courage while Engaged in Combat.

vs-lord_of_the_legions.title: Lord of the Legions
vs-lord_of_the_legions.def: The model's Standard Melee Attacks gains Multiple Wounds (D3).

vs-pontifex_maximus.title: Pontifex Maximus
vs-pontifex_maximus.def: The model may take (and pay the price for) one item from Artefacts or Potions and Scrolls, worth up to 50 pts, that is normally available to Vermin Swarm Characters.

vs-sic_semper_tyrannis.title: Sic Semper Tyrannis
vs-sic_semper_tyrannis.def: This model cannot issue or accept Duels, and is not subject to Restricted Attacks when it refuses one.

vs-disdain_for_plebs.title: Disdain for Plebs
vs-disdain_for_plebs.def: The model cannot be chosen by the opponent as the model that suffers the penalties for refusing a Duel.

vs-sling.title: Sling
vs-sling.def:
Sling - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Sling418"130+1 Str when shooting from Short Range., Quick to Fire

vs-fear_no_evil.title: Fear no Evil
vs-fear_no_evil.def: While the model's unit is Steadfast and does not suffer from Disrupted Ranks, it gains Unbreakable.

vs-deepfire_grenades.title: Deepfire Grenades
vs-deepfire_grenades.def:
Deepfire Grenades - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Deepfire Grenades58"262Accurate, Flaming Attacks, Quick to Fire, Deepfire Grenades


Deepfire Grenades
When shooting at an enemy unit Engaged in Combat (using the Callous rule), hits are distributed onto a randomly chosen friendly unit Engaged with the original target on a roll of 5+ instead of 4+.

vs-darkstone_generator.title: Darkstone Generator
vs-darkstone_generator.def:
Darkstone Generator - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Darkstone Generator--12"D3+1D6+13March and Shoot, Lightning Attacks, Maniacal Enthusiasm (Roll for number of Shots), Hits automatically.

vs-cult_of_errahman.title: Cult of Errahman
vs-cult_of_errahman.def:
Whenever a natural ‘1’ is rolled to hit for an enemy Close Combat Attack allocated towards a model with Cult of Errahman, the model part inflicts 1 hit with Toxic Attacks on the attacking model's unit in the same Initiative Step, before any casualties are removed.
models with Cult of Errahman cannot be joined by models without Cult of Errahman.

vs-the_awakened_swarm.title: The Awakened Swarm
vs-the_awakened_swarm.def: The target's number of Health Point losses that are ignored due to Life is Cheap is increased by 2. No model or unit can be affected by more than one instance of this spell simultaneously.

vs-swarm_master.title: Swarm Master
vs-swarm_master.def: While using this weapon, the wielder gains Grind Attack (X, Str 3, AP 1), where X is the number of Proper Ranks in the wielder's unit, up to a maximum of 10.

vs-rodentium_bullets.title: Rodentium Bullets
vs-rodentium_bullets.def: The weapon's Range is set to 18". The weapon gains +2 Shots, +1 AP, and Accurate.

vs-secrets_of_the_doom_blade.title: Secrets of the Doom Blade
vs-secrets_of_the_doom_blade.def: Strength is set to 10, AP is set to 10 and gains Divine Attacks, Fury, Frenzy, Multiple Wounds (3, against Aegis)

vs-storm_rocket.title: Storm Rocket
vs-storm_rocket.def: Aim 3+. Range is set to 24", Str is set to 5 and AP is set to 2. The weapon gains Flaming Attacks, Maniacal Enthusiasm (To-hit roll). If the weapon hits, it causes D6 hits instead of 1.

vs-bell_of_the_deep_roads.title: Bell of the Deep Roads
vs-bell_of_the_deep_roads.def: The bearer's unit gains Ambush (within 1.5" of a friendly Tunnel Marker).

vs-sacred_aquila.title: Sacred Aquila
vs-sacred_aquila.def: The bearer and Rank-and-File models in the bearer's unit gain Fury. Additionally, for each natural to-hit roll of ‘1’ with a Melee Attack made by the bearer's unit, the bearer's unit suffers 1 hit with Str 3 and AP 0 in the same Agility Step.

vs-plaguehermits_blessing.title: Plague-Hermit's Blessing
vs-plaguehermits_blessing.def: The number of HP is set to 6. Model gains the Cult of Errahman property. The model automatically fails all its Armour Saves rolls.

vs-cowl_of_the_apostate.title: Cowl of the Apostate
vs-cowl_of_the_apostate.def: If there are two other models with Holy Triumvirate on the army the list, its Path access is replaced with Occultism, Thaumaturgy, Witchcraft.

vs-crown_of_hubris.title: Crown of Hubris
vs-crown_of_hubris.def: At the start of any friendly Magic Phase, the bearer may choose to inflict 3 HP losses on its unit. If this is used, the model gains Channel (2) with Duration: One Turn.

vs-tarinas_lyre.title: Tarina's Lyre
vs-tarinas_lyre.def: Stomp Attacks made by enemy units within 8" of the bearer suffer a -2 to-wound modifier.

vs-darkstone_detonator.title: Darkstone Detonator
vs-darkstone_detonator.def:
At the end of any friendly Movement Phase after the first, the bearer may remove a single friendly Tunnel Marker within 24" of it.
If so, apply the following effects before removing the Tunnel Marker:


  • Each unengaged unit within 4" of the Tunnel Marker suffers 2D6 hits with Str 4 and AP 1.

  • If one or more units that are Engaged in the same Combat are within 4" of the Tunnel Marker, a total of 2D6 hits with Str 4 and AP 1 is inflicted.
Roll a D6 for each hit: on a roll of 4+, the hit is distributed onto a randomly chosen friendly unit; otherwise, the hit is distributed onto a randomly chosen enemy unit.

vs-favanite_powder.title: Favanite Powder
vs-favanite_powder.def: When casting a Hex spell, after seeing the result of the roll, the bearer can choose to gain Maniacal Enthusiasm (Casting Roll).

vs-potion_of_rat_form.title: Potion of Rat Form
vs-potion_of_rat_form.def: During any friendly Magic Phase, the bearer can choose to lose Attached (if they have it) and make a 6" Magical Move. They must end this move by joining another friendly unit (following the normal rules for joining units).

vs-skorchit_ordnance.title: Skorchit Ordnance
vs-skorchit_ordnance.def:
Skorchit Ordnance - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Skorchit Ordnance548"141Artillery, Flaming Attacks, Area Attack (3×3)


Rakachit Mauss Rifle - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Rakachit Mauss Rifle548"152Artillery, Lightning Attacks, Area Attack (1×5), Direct Hit (D3+1)

dh-runic_anvil.title: Runic Anvil
dh-runic_anvil.def: The model must select two Battle Runes. Note which spells are selected on the Army List. The Range of these spells are set to 36".

dh-resolute.title: Resolute
dh-resolute.def: A unit with Resolute is considered to have one additional Proper Rank for Steady, Steadfast, Surrounded, and Rank Bonus purposes.

dh-monster_seeker.title: Monster Seeker
dh-monster_seeker.def: The model gains Multiple Wounds (2, towards Height 3 or more).

dh-grim_resolve.title: Grim Resolve
dh-grim_resolve.def: The model gains +1 Att for each enemy model in contact with it (including the model it is fighting a Duel with if applicable).

dh-flaming_shot.title: Flaming Shot
dh-flaming_shot.def: The model's Shooting Attacks become Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks.

dh-rune_crafted.title: Rune Crafted
dh-rune_crafted.def:
• Dwarf Ballista: +1 to hit towards Fly

• Flame Cannon: +1 Str

• Dwarf Catapult: Area Attack (32)
• Dwarf Cannon: Direct Hit (D3+2)
towards Height 5

• Organ Gun: +1 to wound

dh-runic_engravings.title: Runic Engravings
dh-runic_engravings.def:
During Pre-game Selections, each Hold Guardians unit must choose one of the following effects. The effect is Permanent.
  • +1 Str and +1 AP

  • +3 Agi
  • Vanguard

dh-crag_warden.title: Crag Warden
dh-crag_warden.def: The model gains Hard Target (1), Light Troops, Skirmisher.

dh-rune_craft_mastery.title: Rune Craft Mastery
dh-rune_craft_mastery.def: Melee Attacks from models in a unit containing one or more models with Rune Craft Mastery gain +1 AP.

dh-brothers_of_vengeance.title: Brothers of Vengeance
dh-brothers_of_vengeance.def: The model gains Hard Target (1), Light Troops, Skirmisher.

dh-shrapnel_grenades.title: Shrapnel Grenades
dh-shrapnel_grenades.def: One use only. May be activated in the Movement Phase: when activated, the model gains Sweeping Attack (D3, Str 3, AP 1) until the end of the phase.

dh-shrapnel_bombs.title: Shrapnel Bombs
dh-shrapnel_bombs.def: The model gains Sweeping Attack (D6×2, Str 3, AP 1).

dh-whirling_chains_of_doom.title: Whirling Chains of Doom
dh-whirling_chains_of_doom.def: +1 Str, +1 AP, always strike at Agility Step 10 (regardless of the wielder's Agility).

dh-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
dh-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Hatred (against Gigantic) and Sturdy.

dh-rage.title: Rage
dh-rage.def: - Attack Attribute -- Close CombatWhenever the model loses a Health Point, it gains +1 Attack Value. Whenever it Recovers or Raises a Health Point, it suffers -1 Attack Value.

dh-big_brother.title: Big Brother
dh-big_brother.def: - Universal RuleThe model's Health Points are set to 7, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The roll for the number of hits from its Stomp Attacks is subject to Maximised Roll.

dh-giant_club.title: Giant Club
dh-giant_club.def: - Melee WeaponAttacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

dh-giant_seeker.title: Giant Seeker
dh-giant_seeker.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains Aegis (6+), Fearless, The bigger they are, Unbreakable, Yer comin' with me!, and loses Shield.

dh-giant_of_the_deep.title: Giant of the Deep
dh-giant_of_the_deep.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains Shield Wall and Light Armour.

dh-shield_wall.title: Shield Wall
dh-shield_wall.def: When a Height 1--3 model uses a Hand Weapon and a Shield simultaneously, it gains Aegis (6+, against Melee Attacks). This is improved to Aegis (5+, against Melee Attacks) if the attacking model is Charging.

dh-entrench.title: Entrench
dh-entrench.def: Right before the battle (during step 7 of the Deployment Phase Sequence), the model may <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/entrench">Entrench</nuxt-link> a single friendly War Machine. The War Machine counts as being in Hard Cover. The War Machine loses this instance of Hard Cover permanently if it performs an Advance or March Move or a Random Movement.

dh-majesty_of_high_kings.title: Majesty of High Kings
dh-majesty_of_high_kings.def: A General mounted on a War Throne gains Commanding Presence (18").

dh-engineering_rune.title: Engineering Rune
dh-engineering_rune.def: Add +4 to the model's rolls on the Misfire Table.

dh-dwarf_ballista.title: Dwarf Ballista
dh-dwarf_ballista.def: 48", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 10, Area Attack (1×5), [Multiple Wounds (D3)]

dh-flame_cannon.title: Flame Cannon
dh-flame_cannon.def: Flamethrower 24" Shots 1, Str 4 [5], AP 1 [2], [Multiple Wounds (D3)], Flaming Attacks

dh-dwarf_catapult.title: Dwarf Catapult
dh-dwarf_catapult.def: Catapult (4×4), Shots 1, 12--60", Str 3 [7], AP 0 [4], [Multiple Wounds (D3, Clipped Wings)], The model’s Height is changed to Large

dh-dwarf_cannon.title: Dwarf Cannon
dh-dwarf_cannon.def:
This Artillery Weapon can be fired in two ways:

• Cannon 60" Shots 1, Str 4, [10], AP 0 [10], Area Attack (1×5), [Multiple Wounds (D3+1)]
• Volley Gun, 12", Shots 2D6, Str 4 AP 4

dh-rune_of_revocation.title: Rune of Revocation
dh-rune_of_revocation.def: Ignore all other spell effects on the target from spells with Duration: One Turn.

dh-rune_of_resolve.title: Rune of Resolve
dh-rune_of_resolve.def: The target may perform an 4" Magical Move and gains Light Troops until the end of the Player Turn.

dh-rune_of_gleaming.title: Rune of Gleaming
dh-rune_of_gleaming.def: The target gains Distracting (1), Hard Target (1).

dh-rune_of_resilience.title: Rune of Resilience
dh-rune_of_resilience.def: To-wound rolls against the target suffer a -1 modifier.

dh-honour.title: Honour
dh-honour.def: The bearer's unit Charge Range rolls are Maximised. While Engaged with an enemy unit’s Front Facing, the bearer gains Devastating Charge (+2 Att).

dh-hewn_out_of_mountains.title: Hewn out of Mountains
dh-hewn_out_of_mountains.def: The player of this army has a +1 modifier on Dispel Rolls as long as at least one friendly model with Channel (X) from a Dwarven Holds army is on the Battlefield.

dh-ancient_grudge.title: Ancient Grudge
dh-ancient_grudge.def:
During Pre-game Selections, a Dwarven Holds army marks units on the opponent's Army List with Grudge Markers (note that Characters can be marked, too). The number of Grudge Markers placed is equal to the number of instances of Ancient Grudge on units in your Army List.
All models with Dwarf in your army gain First Strike (Hatred (towards units containing a model with a Grudge Marker)).

dh-holdstone.title: Holdstone
dh-holdstone.def:
One use only. May be activated at the start of any Round of Combat. Apply the following effects:
  • Enemy units cannot claim Combat Score bonuses for fighting the Flank or the Rear of the unit.
  • The unit cannot be Disrupted.
  • Parry, Shield Wall, and can be used in any Facing.
  • For the purpose of Supporting Attacks, all Facings are considered to be the Front Facing (i.e. a model can perform Supporting Attacks also to the Flanks and Rear).
  • The unit cannot Pursue nor Overrun.
The effects last until the unit is no longer Engaged in Combat.

dh-ancestral_memory.title: Ancestral Memory
dh-ancestral_memory.def: A General with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/ancestral_memory">Ancestral Memory</nuxt-link> affects the number of Grudges held by a Dwarven Holds army (see <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/ancient_grudge">"Ancient Grudge"</nuxt-link> above).

dh-the_bigger_they_are.title: The bigger they are
dh-the_bigger_they_are.def: The model gains Devastating Charge (Swiftstride) for Charges against units that contain at least one Large or Gigantic model.

dh-sturdy.title: Sturdy
dh-sturdy.def: The model part gains Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP) and Steady Aim.

dh-yer_comin_with_me.title: Yer comin' with me!
dh-yer_comin_with_me.def:
In order to use this Attack Attribute, the unit must be at least as wide as it is deep at the start of the Round of Combat.
Natural to-wound rolls of '4', '5', and '6' with Close Combat Attacks made by models with this Attack Attribute are always considered successful. In addition, when a model with this Attack Attribute is removed as a casualty during the Melee Phase due to an enemy Melee Attack, it must immediately, before removal, perform a single Close Combat Attack with the following rules and restrictions:
  • The attack is always resolved with Strength 5 and Armour Penetration 2.
  • The owner must choose one of the following options:
  • The attack is allocated towards the model that caused the casualty.
  • The attack is allocated towards a Rank-and-File model in that model's unit.
In either case, the model with Yer comin' with me! is considered in contact with the attacked model, and the models count as Engaged in the same Facings as their units.
  • This Attack Attribute cannot be used for casualties caused by Impact Hits.

dh-runic_weapon_enchantments.title: Runic Weapon Enchantments
dh-runic_weapon_enchantments.def:
Runic Weapon Enchantments follow the rules for Weapon Enchantments with the following differences:
  • All Runic Weapon Enchantments are enchantments for Hand Weapons and Paired Weapons.
  • Up to 3 Runic Weapon Enchantments can be applied to a single weapon.
  • Each combination of Runic Weapon Enchantments is One of a Kind.
  • Multiple instances of the same Runic Weapon Enchantments are cumulative, unless mentioned otherwise.
  • When noting Runes on the Army List, use the following format: Weapon (rune A, rune B, rune C).

dh-rune_of_smashing.title: Rune of Smashing
dh-rune_of_smashing.def: Attacks allocated towards a model with Res 5 or more have their Str set to 10 and AP set to 10.

dh-rune_of_craftsmanship.title: Rune of Craftsmanship
dh-rune_of_craftsmanship.def: The weapon follows the rules for Great Weapon instead of the original weapon's rules. This does not prevent the weapon from being engraved with additional <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/runic_weapon_enchantments">Runic Weapon Enchantments</nuxt-link>.

dh-rune_of_lightning.title: Rune of Lightning
dh-rune_of_lightning.def: Grind Attack (D3, Str 4, AP 1, Lightning Attacks). A model with two or more instances of this enchantment increases the number of hits to 2D3. Note that these hits are not affected by the effects of other Runic Weapon Enchantments.

dh-rune_of_returning.title: Rune of Returning
dh-rune_of_returning.def: Can be used as a Shooting Weapon with the following profile: Range 8", Shots 1, Str , AP , Quick to Fire, Accurate, Reload!The effects of other Runic Weapon Enchantments apply to Shooting Attacks made with this weapon (even if the effects are normally restricted to Melee Attacks).

dh-rune_of_fire.title: Rune of Fire
dh-rune_of_fire.def: When Choosing Equipment and Abilities, may gain Flaming Attacks until the end of the phase.

dh-runic_armour_enchantments.title: Runic Armour Enchantments
dh-runic_armour_enchantments.def:
Runic Armour Enchantments follow the rules for Armour Enchantments with the following differences:
  • Up to 3 Runic Armour Enchantments can be applied to a model.
  • Each combination of Runic Armour Enchantments is One of a Kind.
  • Multiple instances of the same Runic Armour Enchantments are added together, unless specifically mentioned otherwise.
  • When noting Runes on the Army List, use the following format: Runic Armour (rune A, rune B, rune C).

dh-rune_of_steel.title: Rune of Steel
dh-rune_of_steel.def: Must reroll failed Armour Save rolls.

dh-rune_of_retribution.title: Rune of Retribution
dh-rune_of_retribution.def: When rolling a successful Aegis Save from Shield Wall, the model inflicts a hit with the same Str and AP as the attack that was saved onto the Health Pool of the model that caused the wound. This occurs before any casualties are removed. These hits do not benefit from Weapon Rules or Runic Weapon Enchantments.

dh-runic_artefacts.title: Runic Artefacts
dh-runic_artefacts.def:
Runic Artefacts follow the rules for Artefacts with the following differences:
  • Up to 3 Runic Artefacts can be applied to a model.
  • Each combination of Runic Artefacts is One of a Kind.
  • Multiple instances of the same Runic Artefacts are added together, unless specifically mentioned otherwise.
  • When noting Runes on the Army List, use the following format: Runic Artefact (rune A, rune B, rune C).

dh-rune_of_denial.title: Rune of Denial
dh-rune_of_denial.def: One use only. The player may choose to use this Runic Artefact instead of performing a Dispelling Roll. The spell is automatically dispelled.

dh-rune_of_devouring.title: Rune of Devouring
dh-rune_of_devouring.def: One use only. The player may choose to use this Runic Artefact instead of performing a Dispelling Roll. The spell is cast as normal but the Caster may not cast it again for the rest of the game.

dh-rune_of_dragons_breath.title: Rune of Dragon's Breath
dh-rune_of_dragons_breath.def: Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks).

dh-rune_of_harnessing.title: Rune of Harnessing
dh-rune_of_harnessing.def: In the opponent's Magic Phase, after rolling for Excess Magic, remove one Magic Dice from the opponent's pool.

dh-rune_of_the_courage.title: Rune of the Courage
dh-rune_of_the_courage.def: One use only. May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities. For the duration of the phase, the bearer gains Stubborn.

dh-rune_of_grounding.title: Rune of Grounding
dh-rune_of_grounding.def:
One use only. May be activated when Choosing Equipment and Abilities. All spells with Duration: One Turn that affect any of the following units come to an end:
  • The bearer's unit;
  • Enemy units in contact with the bearer's unit.

dh-rune_of_readiness.title: Rune of Readiness
dh-rune_of_readiness.def: One use only. May be activated at the end of the Charge Phase, immediately after all Charge Moves have been resolved. If the bearer's unit was successfully Charged during this phase, it may perform a Combat Reform (following the normal rules for Combat Reforms).

dh-rune_of_storms.title: Rune of Storms
dh-rune_of_storms.def: One use only. May be activated at the start of the opponent's Player Turn. Choose a single enemy unit within 24" of the bearer. Until the end of the Player Turn, Cha and Mob of all models with Fly in that unit are halved, rounding fractions up.

dh-rune_of_shielding.title: Rune of Shielding
dh-rune_of_shielding.def: Aegis (+1, max. 4+). The Aegis from this Runic Artefact can only stack with itself and Shield Wall.

dh-rune_of_mastery.title: Rune of Mastery
dh-rune_of_mastery.def: One use only. A single Rune of Mastery may be activated immediately before the bearer attempts to cast a Bound Spell. The Casting Roll for this Bound Spell gains +1.

dh-rune_of_mining.title: Rune of Mining
dh-rune_of_mining.def: During Pre-game Selections, choose a Terrain Feature on the Battlefield. As long as the bearer is on the Battlefield, all friendly models may treat this Terrain Feature as Open Terrain when making a Move Maneuvre (Reform, Advance or March Move), but must still follow the Unit Spacing rule at the end of their move.

dh-rune_of_kinship.title: Rune of Kinship
dh-rune_of_kinship.def: The bearer gains Ambush (Board Edge), Scout, Vanguard.

dh-runic_banner_enchantments.title: Runic Banner Enchantments
dh-runic_banner_enchantments.def: Dwarven Holds armies may use Banner Enchantments from the list of Common Banner Enchantments as well as the <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/runic_banner_enchantments">Runic Banner Enchantments</nuxt-link> listed below.

dh-runic_standard_of_shielding.title: Runic Standard of Shielding
dh-runic_standard_of_shielding.def: The bearer's unit gains Aegis (5+, against Ranged Attacks).

dh-runic_standard_of_dismay.title: Runic Standard of Dismay
dh-runic_standard_of_dismay.def: Charge Range rolls against the bearer's unit are Minimised.

dh-runic_standard_of_steadiness.title: Runic Standard of Steadiness
dh-runic_standard_of_steadiness.def: One use only. May be activated at the start of any Movement Phase. The bearer's unit loses Unwieldy until the end of the Player Turn.

dh-runic_standard_of_the_anvil.title: Runic Standard of the Anvil
dh-runic_standard_of_the_anvil.def: Failed Charge Range rolls by other friendly units must be rerolled when directed against enemy units already Engaged in Combat with the bearer's unit.

dh-runic_standard_of_wisdom.title: Runic Standard of Wisdom
dh-runic_standard_of_wisdom.def: Select a single Battle Rune and note which one on the Army List. This Battle Rune can be cast by the bearer as a Bound Spell. It can only target the bearer's own unit.

dh-runic_standard_of_the_hold.title: Runic Standard of the Hold
dh-runic_standard_of_the_hold.def: A unit with one or more Runic Standard of the Hold are considered to have one additional Proper Rank for Steady, Steadfast, Surrounded, and Rank Bonus purposes.

dh-forge_gun.title: Forge Gun
dh-forge_gun.def:
Forge Gun - Shooting Weapon
NameAimRangeShotsStrAPAttack Attributes
Forge Gun318"140March and Shoot, Flaming Attacks, Stand and Shoot, Always hits on 3+

wdg-deeds_not_words.title: Deeds not Words
wdg-deeds_not_words.def: The model part gains Fury, Hatred while joined to one or more Rank-and-File models with Battle Fever.

wdg-beacon_of_the_dark_gods.title: Beacon of the Dark Gods
wdg-beacon_of_the_dark_gods.def:
the Wizard knows one additional spell, chosen from:
Whispers of the VeilEvocation,
The Grave CallsOccultism,
Corruption of TinAlchemy,
Wrath of God*Thaumaturgy,

*only if Wizard Master

wdg-wings.title: Wings
wdg-wings.def: The model's Mob is set to 8" and it gains Fly.

wdg-master_of_destruction.title: Master of Destruction
wdg-master_of_destruction.def: The model part can use a Shield or a <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/spiked_shield">Spiked Shield</nuxt-link> simultaneously with a Great Weapon or a Halberd. The model part counts as using a Hand Weapon while using simultaneously a Shield or a <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/spiked_shield">Spiked Shield</nuxt-link> with a Great Weapon or a Halberd.

wdg-manifestation.title: Manifestation
wdg-manifestation.def: During Pre-game Selections, each Exalted Herald must choose two different Manifestations from the list below and apply the effects during the game. The model must select two spells out of those indicated for the chosen Manifestations, Wrath of God (Thaumaturgy), and Hellfire (Hereditary Spell). This replaces the normal rules for Spell Selection connected to being a Wizard Adept.

wdg-dying_embers.title: Dying Embers
wdg-dying_embers.def: After using the Breath Attack, the model loses a Health Point with no saves of any kind allowed.

wdg-primal_legend.title: Primal Legend
wdg-primal_legend.def: While the model is on the board, friendly units with Fly may not use Flying Movement. In addition, if the model is the General, the maximum sum of Legendary Beasts (1) values in the army is increased by 1.

wdg-skinning_lash.title: Skinning Lash
wdg-skinning_lash.def: Sweeping Attack (1, Str 4, AP 0). A unit that loses one or more Health Points due to one or more Skinning Lash Sweeping Attack suffers -1 Cou until the end of its next Player Turn.

wdg-damnation.title: Damnation
wdg-damnation.def:
The unit gains Exclusive. When the unit fails a Break Test, replace each model of the unit with a Wretched One model, after taking Panic Tests:


  • The unit with Damnation is considered destroyed and its models are considered to be removed as casualties.

  • Each Wretched One model is placed in the same position and facing the same direction as the replaced model, even if the replaced model was in contact with an enemy unit. In this case, the Wretched One model is placed in contact with the enemy unit too.

  • The Wretched One models form a new unit.

  • The Wretched One unit follows the rules for Summoned Units, except that it ignores the Unit Spacing rule when placed on the Battlefield.

  • The Wretched One unit cannot perform any Combat Reforms during that Round of Combat, however the enemy units can do so as normal.

  • Note that the following Round of Combat is not considered the First Round of Combat for the Wretched One unit nor the enemy units it is Engaged with.

wdg-gateway.title: Gateway
wdg-gateway.def:
During Pre-game Selection, mark a point on the Battlefield at least 1.5" away from the opponent’s Deployment Zone with a Gateway Marker.
At the start of each friendly Magic Phase, if the model is not Engaged in Combat, you may apply one of the following effects:
  • Mark a single point on the Battlefield within 24" of the model with a Gateway Marker. Before doing so, you may remove any friendly Gateway Marker from the Battlefield that was not placed during this Player Turn. Immediately before removing the Gateway Marker, all units within 1.5" of the marker suffer 2D3 hits with Toxic Attacks. There can never be more than 4 friendly Gateway Markers on the Battlefield.
  • Target a single unengaged friendly unit within 6" of the model that does not contain any model with Height 5, and that is not Shaken. Remove the unit from the Battlefield and immediately place it back on the Battlefield with Ambush (within 1.5" of a friendly Gateway Marker that was not placed during this Player Turn). If the unit cannot be placed following these rules, it is considered destroyed where it was removed.
When all friendly Hellmaws are removed as casualties, all units within 1.5" of one or more friendly Gateway Markers suffer 2D3 hits with Toxic Attacks, and the markers are removed.

wdg-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
wdg-giant_see_giant_do.def: The model gains Battle Fever.

wdg-big_brother.title: Big Brother
wdg-big_brother.def: The model's HP are set to 9, its base size is changed to 75×100 mm, and its rolls for the number of hits for Stomp Attacks is Maximised.

wdg-monstrous_familiar.title: Monstrous Familiar
wdg-monstrous_familiar.def:
The model gains Wizard Conclave (1), and chooses its spells from the following spells:
Corruption of TinAlchemy,
Living SteelAlchemy,
HellfireHereditary Spell

wdg-tribal_warspear.title: Tribal Warspear
wdg-tribal_warspear.def: +1 Str and Multiple Wounds (D3, against Height 4, 5). The wielder is an Attachable Model and gains Exclusive (Barbarians). Max. 1 Giant may join a single Barbarians unit.

wdg-release_the_hounds.title: Release the Hounds
wdg-release_the_hounds.def: One use only. May be activated at the start of a friendly Player Turn (all models in a unit must activate this rule at the same time). The model gains +2" Mob and Devastating Charge (+1 Att, +1 Str) during this Player Turn.

wdg-additional_limbs.title: Additional Limbs
wdg-additional_limbs.def: The model's Mobility is set to 10" and its Armour is set to 3.

wdg-meeting_of_minds.title: Meeting of Minds
wdg-meeting_of_minds.def: At any time during the Movement Phase, the player can choose to lose Fly and gain +2 Mob. This lasts until the end of the Movement Phase.

wdg-writhing_mass.title: Writhing Mass
wdg-writhing_mass.def: When in the second rank and not in contact with any enemy model, the model can make Grind Attack across models in the first rank directly in front of it.

wdg-favoured_giant.title: Favoured Giant
wdg-favoured_giant.def: - Universal RuleThe model loses Battle Fever and gains Trophy Rack, Hellforged Armour, Paired Weapons, and counts as a Character for the purpose of issuing, accepting, and refusing Duels.

wdg-trophy_rack.title: Trophy Rack
wdg-trophy_rack.def:
One of a Kind

The model may take a single Banner Enchantment (using the bearer's Special Item allowance as normal). In addition, the model gains Disciplined.

wdg-veil_walker.title: Veil Walker
wdg-veil_walker.def:
When a model with Veil Walker casts a Learned Spell, you may discard a single Magic Dice when declaring the target(s) of the spell and activate the following effects:

  • Secret of Flesh: Failed to-wound rolls from this spell that occur during a Magic Phase must be rerolled.
  • Secret of Separation: The spell's Range is increased by 6". Aura Spells only gain +3" Range. Spells with Type : Caster are unaffected.

wdg-battle_fever.title: Battle Fever
wdg-battle_fever.def: Units containing a model with Battle Fever must reroll failed Courage Tests.

wdg-unburnt.title: Unburnt
wdg-unburnt.def: The wearer's model gains Resistance (Flaming Attacks). In addition, the model considers all units consisting entirely of models without Unburnt as Insignificant.

wdg-hellforged_armour.title: Hell-Forged Armour
wdg-hellforged_armour.def: The wearer's model gains Resistance (Toxic Attacks).

wdg-spiked_shield.title: Spiked Shield
wdg-spiked_shield.def: Shield. When a Height 1--3 model uses a Hand Weapon and a Spiked Shield simultaneously, whenever the bearer successfully passes an Armour Save roll on a 4+ against an enemy Melee Attack, the model part immediately inflicts 1 hit with its Str and AP towards the model that caused the wound (before any casualties are removed).

wdg-abiding_spirit.title: Abiding Spirit
wdg-abiding_spirit.def: Hard Target (1). At the end of each friendly Melee Phase, if the Exalted Herald has been on the winning side of a combat in this phase, it Recovers 1 Health Point.

wdg-brand_of_the_dragon.title: Brand of the Dragon
wdg-brand_of_the_dragon.def: Fly (7", 14"), Light Troops, Swiftstride, Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 1, Flaming Attacks)

wdg-unholy_avatar.title: Unholy Avatar
wdg-unholy_avatar.def: +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration, and Divine Attacks

wdg-daemonic_wings.title: Daemonic Wings
wdg-daemonic_wings.def: The bearer gains +3 Cha, +3 Mob, Fly, , Swiftstride.

wdg-entropic_aura.title: Entropic Aura
wdg-entropic_aura.def: Weapon Enchantments and Armour Enchantments carried by the bearer, models in the bearer's unit, and models in units that are in contact with the bearer are ignored.

wdg-luck_of_the_dark_gods.title: Luck of the Dark Gods
wdg-luck_of_the_dark_gods.def: The bearer's model gains Aegis (+1, max. 4+).

wdg-idol_of_spite.title: Idol of Spite
wdg-idol_of_spite.def: One use only. May be activated at the start of a Round of Combat. For the duration of that Round of Combat, the bearer gains +1 Att, +1 Str, and +1 AP.

wdg-dark_prelate.title: Dark Prelate
wdg-dark_prelate.def: The bearer can cast Danse Macabre (Evocation) and Chorus of the Damned (Evocation) as a Bound Spell (4+), which can only target the caster's own unit.

wdg-prized_stallion.title: Prized Stallion
wdg-prized_stallion.def: The model's March Rate is set to 16".

wdg-master_of_battle.title: Master of Battle
wdg-master_of_battle.def:
The model's maximum number of Supporting
Attacks is set to 3.

wdg-envy.title: Envy
wdg-envy.def: Charge Range and Pursue Distance rolls by units containing this Favour are Maximised.

wdg-gluttony.title: Gluttony
wdg-gluttony.def: The first time a model with this Favour is on the winning side of a combat, its model parts with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/path_of_the_favoured">Path of the Favoured</nuxt-link> gain +1 Str with Duration: Permanent.

wdg-greed.title: Greed
wdg-greed.def: The model part with Path of the Favoured gains Great Weapon, Halberd, Paired Weapons, and Weapon Master. A Chosen Lord with this Favour may take a second item from either the Artefacts category or the Potions and Scrolls category (but cannot take a second item from both categories).

wdg-pride.title: Pride
wdg-pride.def: Courage Tests taken by units containing this Favour are Minimised. Command Tests taken by units containing this Favour are Maximised.

wdg-sloth.title: Sloth
wdg-sloth.def: The model gains +1 Res. When the model's unit declares a Charge or performs a March Move, the effect is lost until the start of the Melee Phase in the next Player Turn.

wdg-wrath.title: Wrath
wdg-wrath.def: The model part with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/path_of_the_favoured">Path of the Favoured</nuxt-link> gains Fury, Frenzy, Unruly.

wdg-legendary_beasts.title: Legendary Beasts
wdg-legendary_beasts.def: The sum of the <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/legendary_beasts">Legendary Beasts</nuxt-link> values stated in brackets of all models in the army is restricted to 1 per 750 Army Points, rounding fractions up.

wdg-hellfire.title: Hellfire
wdg-hellfire.def:
The target suffers 2D6 hits with Strength 6,
Armour Penetration 0, and Magical Attacks.

wdg-burning_portent.title: Burning Portent
wdg-burning_portent.def: Flaming Attacks, Multiple Wounds (D3), AP set to 10.

wdg-icon_of_the_infinite.title: Icon of the Infinite
wdg-icon_of_the_infinite.def: The bearer can cast Hellfire (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell (5+).

wdg-zealots_banner.title: Zealots' Banner
wdg-zealots_banner.def: Models in the second rank of the bearer's unit gains Extra Support (2).

wdg-wasteland_torch.title: Wasteland Torch
wdg-wasteland_torch.def: The bearer's unit gains Strider (Ruins). During your Spell Selection (step 8 of the Pre-game Sequence), you may choose a single Field or Forest that becomes Ruins. The bearer's unit gains Flaming Attacks in the First Round of Combat.

wdg-ledger_of_souls.title: Ledger of Souls
wdg-ledger_of_souls.def: After removing a friendly model without Insignificant in a unit within 9" of the bearer's model due to enemy attacks, you gain one Magic Dice at the start of Siphon the Veil of your next Magic Phase. No more than 2 Magic Dice can be gained this way in a Magic Phase.

wdg-veilgate_orb.title: Veilgate Orb
wdg-veilgate_orb.def: During Excess Magic the player only discards the Magic Dice  on ‘1’ and ‘2’ instead of ‘1’, ‘2’ and ‘3’.

wdg-immortal_gauntlets.title: Immortal Gauntlets
wdg-immortal_gauntlets.def: At the start of any Round of Combat that the bearer is fighting, you may discard a stored Magic Dice. If so, choose either Divine Attacks, Flaming Attacks, Magical Attacks. The bearer's Melee Attacks gain the chosen Attack Attribute. The chosen effect lasts until the end of the phase.

wdg-lord_of_the_damned.title: Lord of the Damned
wdg-lord_of_the_damned.def: Friendly units with Irredeemable within 18" of the bearer, before rolling the Random Movement distance in the Movement Phase, may choose to apply either Minimised or Maximised to the roll.

wdg-wyrd_stone.title: Wyrd Stone
wdg-wyrd_stone.def: The bearer’s model gets Hard Target (2).

mh-wings.title: Wings
mh-wings.def: The model's March Rate is set to 16" and it gains Fly (8", 16") and Light Troops.

mh-follow_the_herd.title: Follow The Herd
mh-follow_the_herd.def: The unit can never benefits from Commanding Presence or Rally Around the Flag. The unit gains +1 Discipline for each Full Rank.

mh-stampede.title: Stampede
mh-stampede.def: If the model's unit has at least one Full Rank, the model's Impact Hits cause an additional D3 hits for each model in the same file behind it (normally 2D3/3D3/etc. instead of D3).

mh-karkadan_bulls.title: Karkadan Bulls
mh-karkadan_bulls.def: The model's base size is changed to 50×75mm and its Discipline is set to 7.

mh-beast_taker.title: Beast Taker
mh-beast_taker.def: Close Combat Attacks and Shooting Attacks from Short Range made by the model part gain Lethal Strike (against Beast, Cavalry).

mh-deeds_not_words.title: Deeds not Words
mh-deeds_not_words.def: The model part gains Fury and Hatred while joined to one or more models with Makhar Battle Fever.

mh-stallions_tempest.title: Stallion's Tempest
mh-stallions_tempest.def: The Makhar Gyula gains +1 Attack Value and may take Special Items for an additional 50 pts. Model parts with Makhar Battle Fever and without Harnessed in a unit that contains Stallion's Tempest gain Battle Focus.

mh-mares_shelter.title: Mare's Shelter
mh-mares_shelter.def: The Makhar Gyula gains +1 Attack Value and may take Special Items for an additional 50 pts. The model's Commanding Presence range is increased by 6".

mh-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
mh-giant_see_giant_do.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains Makhar Battle Fever.

mh-big_brother.title: Big Brother
mh-big_brother.def: The model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The model gains Maximised (Stomp Attacks).

mh-giant_club.title: Giant Club
mh-giant_club.def: Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

mh-tribal_warspear.title: Tribal Warspear
mh-tribal_warspear.def: Attacks with a Tribal Warspear gain +1 Strength and Multiple Wounds (D3, against Towering Presence). Charging enemy units in base contact with the wielder suffer -1 Agility. The wielder gains Exclusive (Tamyr Vassals), Not a Leader, and War Platform.

mh-giant_recurve_bow.title: Giant Recurve Bow
mh-giant_recurve_bow.def: - Artillery WeaponRange 48", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 10, Area Attack (1×5), [Multiple Wounds (D3)], Quick to Fire.

mh-fist_of_the_makhar.title: Fist of the Makhar
mh-fist_of_the_makhar.def:
- Artillery WeaponCatapult (4×4), Range 12--48", Shots 1, Str 3 [7],
AP 0 [4], [Multiple Wounds (D3)], Quick to Fire.

mh-hellforged_armour.title: Hell-Forged Armour
mh-hellforged_armour.def: Plate Armour. The wearer's model gains Aegis (5+, against Toxic Attacks).

mh-path_of_the_favoured.title: Path of the Favoured
mh-path_of_the_favoured.def: Units with more than half of their models with Path of the Favoured must reroll failed Break Tests. In addition, model parts with Path of the Favoured upgraded to a Champion additionally gain +1 Health Point to a maximum of 3, and their Discipline is set to 9.

mh-additional_limbs.title: Additional Limbs
mh-additional_limbs.def: The model's March Rate is set to 20" and its Armour is set to 3.

mh-makhar_battle_fever.title: Makhar Battle Fever
mh-makhar_battle_fever.def: Units with more than half of their models with Makhar Battle Fever must reroll any natural rolls of ‘1’ when rolling for Charge Range. In addition, the model gains Devastating Charge (Fearless, Hard Target (1)).

mh-parting_shot.title: Parting Shot
mh-parting_shot.def: As a special Charge Reaction, a unit containing at least one model with this rule may declare a <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/parting_shot">Parting Shot</nuxt-link> Charge Reaction. All models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/parting_shot">Parting Shot</nuxt-link> in the unit perform a Stand and Shoot Charge Reaction. Immediately after this, the unit performs a Flee Charge Reaction.

mh-recurve_bow.title: Recurve Bow
mh-recurve_bow.def: Bow. Attacks made with a Recurve Bow gain Quick to Fire. Furthermore, when shooting from Short Range, they gain +1 to hit and +1 Armour Penetration.

mh-makhar_lance.title: Makhar Lance
mh-makhar_lance.def: Lance. Attacks made with a Makhar Lance gain Fight in Extra Rank and Two-Handed.

mh-lamellar_barding.title: Lamellar Barding
mh-lamellar_barding.def: The bearer's model gains +1 Armour, up to a maximum of Armour 4, and -2" March Rate.

mh-breath_of_the_steppe.title: Breath of the Steppe
mh-breath_of_the_steppe.def:
Place a round Tornado Marker with a 3" diameter with its centre on the target point. The Tornado Marker must be placed more than 1" away from any unit. The marker is considered Covering Terrain for units inside and/or behind them that contributes to ⟨Soft⟩ {Hard} Cover.
The Tornado Marker is Dangerous Terrain (⟨2⟩ {3}), even for models with Strider.

mh-wildfire_burst.title: Wildfire Burst
mh-wildfire_burst.def: This weapon has Shots 4, Str 4, AP 1 and always hits on 3+. Attacks made with this weapon gain Flaming Attacks and Magical Attacks. A unit that is hit by these attacks loses Soft Cover until the end of the Player Turn (if it had it). If the enemy unit was in Hard Cover, it is now considered to be in Soft Cover until the end of the Player Turn.

mh-hawthorne_curse.title: Hawthorne Curse
mh-hawthorne_curse.def: Attacks made with this weapon gain Devastating Charge (+2 Str, +2 AP) and become Magical Attacks. The weapon can be used as a Shooting Weapon (3+) with the following profile: Range 18", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 10, Area Attack (1×5), Reload!, [Multiple Wounds (D3)]. This Shooting Attack never suffers negative to-hit modifiers.

mh-symbol_of_slaughter.title: Symbol of Slaughter
mh-symbol_of_slaughter.def: When using this weapon, the wielder gains +2 Attack Value, +2 Agility, and Magical Attacks. Close Combat Attacks made against the wielder's model gain +1 to hit.

mh-wasteland_torch.title: Wasteland Torch
mh-wasteland_torch.def: The bearer's unit gains Strider (Ruins). After determining Deployment Zones (at the end of step 6 of the Pre-Game Sequence), you may choose a single Field or Forest Terrain Feature that becomes Ruins. The bearer's unit gains Flaming Attacks in the First Round of Combat.

mh-mammothhide_cloak.title: Mammoth-Hide Cloak
mh-mammothhide_cloak.def: The wearer gains +1 Armour. Attacks against the wearer can never have a Strength above 5.

mh-spirit_of_the_herd.title: Spirit of the Herd
mh-spirit_of_the_herd.def: Model parts without Harnessed in the bearer's unit gain Devastating Charge (Lightning Reflexes).

mh-turul_radiant_headdress.title: Turul Radiant Headdress
mh-turul_radiant_headdress.def: The bearer gains Distracting and Terror.

al-deeds_not_words.title: Deeds not Words
al-deeds_not_words.def: The model part gains Fury and Hatred while joined to one or more models with Åsklander Battle Fever.

al-jarl.title: Jarl
al-jarl.def: The Åsklander Chief gains +2 Attack Value and may take Special Items for an additional 50 pts.

al-longship_raid.title: Longship Raid
al-longship_raid.def:
The model gains Ambush. During step 8 of the Pre-Game Sequence, nominate a unit of Åsklanders, Huskarls, or Berserkers that includes no more than 30 models if Åsklanders and no more than 20 models if Huskarls or Berserkers. This unit gains Ambush, with the following exceptions:

  • The model with Longship Raid must either be deployed in this unit or Ambush in this unit.
  • Units using Longship Raid do not roll for Ambush but automatically enter the Battlefield in the owner's second Player Turn.

al-skinning_lash.title: Skinning Lash
al-skinning_lash.def: A unit with at least one model with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/skinning_lash">Skinning Lash</nuxt-link> can make a Sweeping Attack against a single unengaged enemy unit when passing within 1" (it does not need to and cannot move through or over that unit). The enemy unit suffers 1 hit with Strength 4 and Armour Penetration 0 for each model with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/skinning_lash">Skinning Lash</nuxt-link> in the unit. A unit that loses one or more Health Points due to the <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/skinning_lash">Skinning Lash</nuxt-link> Sweeping Attack suffers -1 Discipline until the end of its next Player Turn.

al-wings.title: Wings
al-wings.def: The model's March Rate is set to 16" and it gains Fly (8", 16") and Light Troops.

al-stupid.title: Stupid
al-stupid.def: At the start of each friendly Player Turn, each unengaged non-Fleeing unit with one or more models with Stupid must take a Discipline Test. If the test is failed, all models in the unit become Shaken until the end of the Player Turn, with the following exception: in the Movement Phase, directly after Rallying Fleeing units, the unit must perform an Advance Move of D6" as far directly forwards as possible.

al-troll_belch.title: Troll Belch
al-troll_belch.def: At the model part's Initiative Step, the owner may choose an enemy unit Engaged in Combat that the model part is able to attack with Close Combat Attacks. If so, this unit suffers a hit, which is resolved with Strength 5 and Armour Penetration 10, and the model part with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/troll_belch">Troll Belch</nuxt-link> may not perform any Close Combat Attacks.

al-freezing_aura.title: Freezing Aura
al-freezing_aura.def: The model can cast Savage Fury (Shamanism) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8). Enemy units within 9" of one or more Jötunns suffer -3 Agility. While in base contact with one or more Jötunns, enemy units that Break from Combat gain Minimised (Flee Distance).

al-coastal_predator.title: Coastal Predator
al-coastal_predator.def:
The model gains Strider (Water Terrain). In addition, units gain Devastating Charge (+2" Cha) and Hard Target (1) while both the following conditions are met:

  • More than half of their models have Coastal Predator.

  • More than half of their models have the centre of their base inside a Water Terrain Feature.


Characters without Coastal Predator that Charge out of a unit do not benefit from Coastal Predator.

al-giant_see_giant_do.title: Giant See, Giant Do
al-giant_see_giant_do.def: - Universal RuleThe model gains Åsklander Battle Fever and Shield.

al-big_brother.title: Big Brother
al-big_brother.def: The model's Health Points are set to 8, and its base size is changed to 75×100 mm. The model gains Maximised (Stomp Attacks).

al-giant_club.title: Giant Club
al-giant_club.def: Attacks made with this weapon gain +1 Strength and +1 Armour Penetration.

al-monstrous_familiar.title: Monstrous Familiar
al-monstrous_familiar.def: The model gains Wizard Apprentice. Instead of selecting spells as normal, it must select one of the following spells (during Spell Selection): Holy Affliction (Thaumaturgy), Evil Eye (Witchcraft), or Frostbite (Hereditary Spell).

al-tribal_warspear.title: Tribal Warspear
al-tribal_warspear.def: Attacks with a Tribal Warspear gain +1 Strength and Multiple Wounds (D3, against Towering Presence). Charging enemy units in base contact with the wielder suffer -1 Agility. The wielder gains Exclusive (Åsklanders, Huskarls), Not a Leader, and War Platform.

al-release_the_hounds.title: Release the Hounds
al-release_the_hounds.def: One use only. May be activated at the start of a friendly Player Turn (all models in a unit must activate this rule at the same time). The model gains +6" March Rate and Devastating Charge (+1 Att, +1 Str) during this Player Turn.

al-hellforged_armour.title: Hell-Forged Armour
al-hellforged_armour.def: Plate Armour. The wearer's model gains Aegis (5+, against Toxic Attacks).

al-spiked_shield.title: Spiked Shield
al-spiked_shield.def:
Models on foot only.

Shield. For each successful Armour Save roll of 4+ made by the bearer against a Melee Attack while using a Spiked Shield, the bearer immediately inflicts 1 hit with the bearer's Strength and Armour Penetration against the model that caused the wound, before any casualties are removed, distributed onto the model's Health Pool. This is considered a Special Attack.

al-path_of_the_favoured.title: Path of the Favoured
al-path_of_the_favoured.def: Units with more than half of their models with Path of the Favoured must reroll failed Break Tests. In addition, model parts with Path of the Favoured upgraded to a Champion additionally gain +1 Health Point to a maximum of 3, and their Discipline is set to 9.

al-additional_limbs.title: Additional Limbs
al-additional_limbs.def: The model's March Rate is set to 20" and its Armour is set to 3.

al-sklander_battle_fever.title: Åsklander Battle Fever
al-sklander_battle_fever.def:
Infantry models in units with at least 10 models gain the following effects:
  • Fight in Extra Rank if using a Close Combat Weapon with Two-Handed
  • +1 Armour if using a Shield
This cannot be used while the model's unit is Engaged in its Flank or Rear Facing.

al-unburnt.title: Unburnt
al-unburnt.def: Successful to-wound rolls of attacks that are Flaming Attacks made against the model must be rerolled. In addition, the model considers all units consisting entirely of models without Unburnt as Insignificant.

al-berserkers_bear_pelt.title: Berserker's Bear Pelt
al-berserkers_bear_pelt.def:
Light Armour. The bearer gains Swiftstride and Unstable.
In addition, at the start of any of your Player Turns, all models with Berserker's Bear Pelt in a unit may choose to lose their Shield and gain +1 Strength, Fury, Fearless, Frenzy, and Lightning Reflexes. The effects last for the remainder of the game.

al-legendary_beasts.title: Legendary Beasts
al-legendary_beasts.def: The sum of the <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/legendary_beasts">Legendary Beasts</nuxt-link> values stated in brackets of all models in the army is restricted to 1 per 750 Army Points, rounding fractions up.

al-frostbite.title: Frostbite
al-frostbite.def: If this spell targets a friendly unit, the target gains +1 Armour. If this spell targets an enemy unit, the target suffers -1 Armour. {This spell may target two units instead of one (declare the additional target before the Casting Attempt).}

al-byargfylli.title: Byargfylli
al-byargfylli.def: Attacks made with this weapon become Divine Attacks and Magical Attacks, and gain Lethal Strike and Lightning Reflexes.

al-eyratki.title: Eyratöki
al-eyratki.def: The wielder gains Crush Attack, and can perform two Crush Attacks instead of one (provided it declared the use of its Crush Attack at the end of step 4 of the Round of Combat Sequence as usual).

al-symbol_of_slaughter.title: Symbol of Slaughter
al-symbol_of_slaughter.def: Attacks with this weapon become Magical Attacks. While using this weapon, the wielder gains +2 Attack Value and +2 Agility. Close Combat Attacks made against the wielder's model gain +1 to hit.

al-raven_banner.title: Raven Banner
al-raven_banner.def: The bearer's unit gains Fury, Fearless, and Frenzy.

al-gunagrs_armour.title: Gunagr's Armour
al-gunagrs_armour.def: The bearer gains Fearless and can never be wounded on better than 4+.

al-norns_bones.title: Norn's Bones
al-norns_bones.def: The Wizard can select its spells from all the Learned Spells of its chosen Path and the Hereditary Spell. This rule overrides the Spell Selection rules connected to being a Wizard Apprentice or Adept.

al-harp_of_bragi.title: Harp of Bragi
al-harp_of_bragi.def: The range of the bearer's Commanding Presence or Rally Around the Flag is always 18".

hg-slingers.title: Slingers
hg-slingers.def: The model gains Hard Target (1), Insignificant, Skirmisher, and Sling (3+).

hg-disciples.title: Disciples
hg-disciples.def: The model gains Swiftstride.  In addition, while the model's unit is Engaged with an enemy unit's Flank or Rear Facing, the model's Close Combat Attacks gain +1 to hit and +3 Armour Penetration.

hg-sling.title: Sling
hg-sling.def: The attack gains +1 Strength when shooting from Short Range.

hg-ballista.title: Ballista
hg-ballista.def: - Artillery WeaponRange 48", Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 10, [Multiple Wounds (D3)], Area Attack (1×5).

hg-loyal_lieutenant.title: Loyal Lieutenant
hg-loyal_lieutenant.def: The model can only join units that contains at least one R&F model with the same Height and Type and that do not contain any other models with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/loyal_lieutenant">Loyal Lieutenant</nuxt-link>.

hg-royal_gogyag_barding.title: Royal Gogyag Barding
hg-royal_gogyag_barding.def: When the model suffers a wound from an attack with Multiple Wounds, (X) halve X, rounding fractions up.

hg-cavalry_commander.title: Cavalry Commander
hg-cavalry_commander.def: The model must take a mount. The model's unit must reroll any natural rolls of '1' when rolling for Charge Range in the Charge Phase.

hg-archery_commander.title: Archery Commander
hg-archery_commander.def: The model's unit gains Quick to Fire.

hg-shah.title: Shah
hg-shah.def: The model part gains Hatred, its Special Item allowance is increased to 200 pts, and its Discipline is set to 9.

hg-saddle_cannon.title: Saddle Cannon
hg-saddle_cannon.def: - Shooting WeaponRange 24", Shots D6, Str 4, AP 2, Quick to Fire.

hg-hob_cohesion.title: Hob Cohesion
hg-hob_cohesion.def: For the purpose of receiving Commanding Presence and Rally Around the Flag from friendly models, the model counts as 6" closer to those models.

hg-iron_rain.title: Iron Rain
hg-iron_rain.def:
If one or more of the following conditions are met, the Shooting Attack gains +1 to hit and always has at least Armour Penetration 1 :


  • The attacker is located in the target's Flank or Rear Arc.

  • The target has suffered one or more hits from Slings earlier in the same Shooting Phase, and no other Shooting Attack has hit the unit since then.

hg-infernal_armour.title: Infernal Armour
hg-infernal_armour.def: Plate Armour. The wearer gains Aegis (5+, against Flaming Attacks).

hg-flintlock_axe.title: Flintlock Axe
hg-flintlock_axe.def: Counts as a Halberd in close combat.

hg-infernal_lackey.title: Infernal Lackey
hg-infernal_lackey.def: The model gains Infernal Armour and Flintlock Axe (3+). Its Discipline is set to 8, and it must choose Pyromancy as its Path of Magic.

hg-boiling_oil.title: Boiling Oil
hg-boiling_oil.def: If one or more simultaneous attacks with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/boiling_oil">Boiling Oil</nuxt-link> hit, after resolving these attacks, the target unit gains one <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/boiling_oil">Boiling Oil</nuxt-link> marker. If a unit with one or more <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/boiling_oil">Boiling Oil</nuxt-link> markers is targeted by Shooting Attacks with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/iron_rain">Iron Rain</nuxt-link>, the shooting models are considered to be Located in the target's Rear Arc for the purpose of <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/iron_rain">Iron Rain</nuxt-link> (not for the purpose of other rules like Area Attack). Remove all markers from a unit when it is hit by one or more attacks with <nuxt-link class="ruleLink" to="/app/rule/iron_rain">Iron Rain</nuxt-link> or at the end of the Shooting Phase, whichever comes first.

hg-warrior_vassals.title: Warrior Vassals
hg-warrior_vassals.def: The total Combat Score bonus from each player gained in Duels (from lost Health Points on enemy units and Overkill), is reduced by 1, to a minimum of 0.

hg-hob_war_cry.title: Hob War Cry!
hg-hob_war_cry.def:
One use only. May be activated at the start of any friendly Player Turn, provided the General is on the Battlefield and not Fleeing. Apply the following effects until the end of the Player Turn:


  • All friendly units gain +1" Advance Rate, +2" March Rate, and Hold the Line.

hg-regimental_mascot.title: Regimental Mascot
hg-regimental_mascot.def: The model must be deployed in, and can only join a Hob Levies unit. The model can never voluntarily leave its unit.

hg-chains_of_pride.title: Chains of Pride
hg-chains_of_pride.def: The target gains Unstable and Fearless. {Targets with Supernal cannot take Break Tests.}

hg-wicked_serrations.title: Wicked Serrations
hg-wicked_serrations.def: While using this weapon, the wielder gains Lightning Reflexes and +1 Attack Value. In addition, single model units that have suffered one or more hits from this weapon suffer -1 Resilience and -1 Attack Value until the end of the Combat Phase.

hg-rocket_arrows.title: Rocket Arrows
hg-rocket_arrows.def: Shots 1, Str 3 [6], AP 2 [10], Area Attack (1×5), [Multiple Wounds (2)], Reload!

hg-deaths_head_aura.title: Death's Head Aura
hg-deaths_head_aura.def: If on foot, the wearer gains +2 Armour. If mounted, the wearer gains +1 Armour instead. In addition, the wearer gains Aegis (3+, against Special Attacks).

hg-predator_pennant.title: Predator Pennant
hg-predator_pennant.def: The bearer's unit gains Devastating Charge (Distracting).

hg-baited_banner.title: Baited Banner
hg-baited_banner.def: Model parts with Harnessed in the bearer's unit gain Hatred.

hg-green_tide.title: Green Tide
hg-green_tide.def: The bearer's unit gains Fight in Extra Rank.

hg-breath_of_the_brass_bull.title: Breath of the Brass Bull
hg-breath_of_the_brass_bull.def: The bearer's model gains +1 Health Point and the bearer gains Breath Attack (Toxic Attacks).

hg-zartoshts_chains.title: Zartosht's Chains
hg-zartoshts_chains.def: Enemy units in base contact with the bearer's model suffer -2 Defensive Skill. The roll for Flee Distance of enemy units in base contact with the bearer's model is subject to Minimised Roll.

ls-falling_star.title: Falling Star
ls-falling_star.def:
The model's Offensive Skill and Defensive Skill are set to twice the model's current number of Health Points.
The model counts as a Character for the purpose of issuing, accepting, and refusing Duels. When the model fights a Duel during a Round of Combat, it gains Stubborn until the end of the Round of Combat.
